review_text: GGfasf
review_translated: GGfasf

review_text: 很細心乾淨，服務態度也很好，位置很不錯的，天天向上都是美好的事物呀，我們要好好學習哦，加油加油努力奮鬥
review_translated: Very attentive and clean, the service attitude is also very good, the location is very good, every day is a good thing, we must study hard, come on, work hard

room_type: Sands Premier Double Queen Gardens By The Bay View
review_text: 這次和兒子新加坡觀看Lady Gaga演唱會。4天三晚都選擇在金沙酒店。前台、管家有中文服務，溝通無障礙。作為全球頂尖的地標酒店，位置一流，設施一流，環境一流，衞生一流，風景一流。物有所值。
review_translated: My son and I went to Singapore to see a Lady Gaga concert. We stayed at the Marina Bay Sands for three nights and four days. The front desk and housekeeping staff spoke Chinese, making communication seamless. As a world-class landmark hotel, it offers a superb location, excellent facilities, a superb environment, excellent cleanliness, and exceptional views. It was truly worth the money.

room_type: Sands Premier Double Queen Gardens By The Bay View
review_text: 一切都是那麼的完美
review_translated: Everything is so perfect

review_text: 感覺不錯，餐飲味道不錯
review_translated: Feel good, food tastes good

review_text: 房價寬敞，設施完善，景觀一流，交通方便，頂層泳池無敵景觀，不愧是新加坡的地標建築。到濱海灣花園、摩天輪、金沙**等景點步行可達，去其他景點也可以打車或者地鐵，交通選擇較多。相對比較欠缺親子元素，沒有小童遊樂設施，客房也沒有專門準備小童用品。
review_translated: The hotel offers spacious rooms, complete facilities, first-class views, and convenient transportation. The rooftop pool offers breathtaking views, making it a true Singapore landmark. It's within walking distance of attractions like Gardens by the Bay, the Ferris Wheel, and the Marina Bay Sands. Other attractions are accessible by taxi or subway, providing ample transportation options. However, the hotel lacks family-friendly amenities, with no children's play equipment and no dedicated children's amenities in the rooms.

review_text:
也算是新加坡地標之一，入住時間辦理時間等候了很久，預計20分鐘左右…

設施：設施設備齊全，洗浴用品：祖馬龍。

衞生：乾淨整潔。

環境：吃喝玩樂一體化，非常方便。

服務：整體還不錯。
review_translated: It's also considered a Singapore landmark. Check-in took a long time, estimated at about 20 minutes... Facilities: Complete facilities and amenities, Jo Malone toiletries. Hygiene: Clean and tidy. Environment: Integrated dining, entertainment, and entertainment, very convenient. Service: Overall good.

review_text: 裝修風格比較樸實。屋頂泳池的景觀確實不錯。距離濱海灣花園很近，很方便。屋頂觀光電梯也對住客優先開放，下來不必排隊。
review_translated: The decor is rather simple. The rooftop pool has a nice view. It's very close to Gardens by the Bay, making it very convenient. The rooftop elevator is also open to guests first, so there's no need to queue.

room_type: Sands Premier Double Queen Gardens By The Bay View
review_text: 風景沒得説特別好，服務非常周到，做了客房升級，絕對的頂級酒店，無論哪一間哪一個景觀視野都無敵，每次來坡都必打開的地方
review_translated: The scenery is amazing, the service is very thoughtful, and the rooms have been upgraded. It is definitely a top-notch hotel. No matter which room you choose, the view is unbeatable. It is a must-visit place every time you come to Slope

review_text: 酒店的房間真的一般。這個價錢有點不值。但是樓頂的泳池特別好。訂的時候要看描述中的樓層，房型太多，低的真的什麼也看不到。樓下的自助餐很好。下一層還有**。
review_translated: The hotel rooms are really average. The price isn't worth it. However, the rooftop pool is fantastic. When booking, pay attention to the floor in the description. There are so many different room types, and the lower floors offer absolutely nothing to see. The buffet downstairs is excellent. There's also a restaurant on the next floor.

review_text: 不愧是金沙酒店，沒啥可挑剔的，景觀無敵，房間寬敞乾淨，樓頂無邊泳池無敵。房間裏送糖又送了好多咖啡，服務配得上這個星級標準。
review_translated: As expected of a Sands hotel, there's nothing to fault. The view is incredible, the room is spacious and clean, and the rooftop infinity pool is incredible. The room was filled with sugar and plenty of coffee, and the service was worthy of this star rating.

review_text: 房間在3號樓 12層 窗外風景很棒哦 能直接在房間裏看對面的supre tree燈光秀 不用人擠人哈
review_translated: The room is on the 12th floor of Building 3. The view from the window is great. You can watch the supre tree light show opposite directly from the room without having to squeeze in with other people.

review_text:
住過最棒的酒店！服務非常好，從進入大堂開始，每個服務人員都十分熱情，人雖然多但秩序感很強，即便排隊也不會焦躁。
房間非常大，整潔漂亮，窗外景觀也可以，晚上更美一點～
無邊泳池白天晚上都值得去，景色各有千秋，晚上氛圍很好
非常不錯的一家酒店！
review_translated: This is the best hotel I've ever stayed in! The service was excellent, and from the moment I entered the lobby, every staff member was very welcoming. Although it was crowded, the atmosphere was very orderly, and I didn't feel anxious even when waiting in line. The room was very large, clean, and beautiful. The view from the window was also good, and it was even more beautiful at night. The infinity pool is worth visiting both day and night, with different views. The atmosphere at night was very nice. A truly wonderful hotel!

review_text: 強烈推薦，無論服務還是硬件都非常好，住在這裏真正能感受到什麼是不虛此行，前台小姐姐熱情且貼心，辦完入住在等待房間時為我們提供了臨時的放卡去上面參觀，2點收到email説房間已經準備好了，喜歡陽台視野開闊，早上可以看到日出，minibar是免費的，床品也很舒服，skypark有專門為住店客人設定的通道，不用和參觀的遊客一起排隊等電梯（另一邊隊伍很長很長，我們這邊衹有8個人），泳池更是從早6到晚12點都是開放的，還有免費的水果和芒果汁提供，池邊點餐價格也合理，總之一切都剛剛好。
review_translated: Highly recommended, both the service and the facilities are excellent. Staying here really makes you feel what a worthwhile trip is. The front desk lady is enthusiastic and considerate. After checking in, she provided us with a temporary card to visit the upstairs while waiting for the room. We received an email at 2 o'clock saying that the room was ready. I like the wide view from the balcony. You can see the sunrise in the morning. The minibar is free and the bedding is very comfortable. Skypark has a passage specially set up for hotel guests, so you don't have to queue up for the elevator with the tourists (the line on the other side is very long, and there are only 8 people on our side). The swimming pool is open from 6 am to 12 pm, and free fruit and mango juice are provided. The price of ordering poolside meals is also reasonable. In short, everything is just right.

review_text: 酒店地理位置好，環境也不錯，早餐很豐富各種各樣的看着很不錯，服務人員態度很好大家都很熱情，特別是很專業，房間很寬敞，住的也不錯，早餐豐富種類多吃的也很好，有健身房洗衣房這些都很方便本次出行五星好評
review_translated: The hotel has a good location and a good environment. The breakfast is rich and varied and looks very good. The service staff are very friendly and enthusiastic, especially very professional. The room is spacious and the stay is also good. The breakfast is rich and varied and the food is also very good. There is a gym and laundry room, which are very convenient. This trip is a five-star rating.

review_text: 這次入住的是二號樓新裝修的樓層 酒店管家為每一位尊貴的客人都準備了joLoves這樣的香水品牌 足可以看出酒店的誠意 這次的入住體驗甚至遠超嘉佩樂以及萊佛士，下次來新加坡首選 唯一不足的是前台的中文水平需要提高下
review_translated: This time I stayed in the newly renovated floor of Building 2. The hotel butler prepared perfume brands such as joLoves for each distinguished guest, which shows the sincerity of the hotel. This stay experience is even better than Capella and Raffles. I will choose it next time I come to Singapore. The only shortcoming is that the Chinese language level of the front desk needs to be improved.

review_text:
賣點57層無邊泳池 風景不錯 體驗也不錯 尤其夜景 俯瞰整個城市  晚上十一點去的 差不多包池
房間訂的是濱海灣花園景觀  俯瞰濱海灣花園和Marina Bay
其他都那樣 豪華酒店麼 不及各種新建酒店 畢竟科技日新月異  尤其未翻新的房間更是差了一些
因為與地鐵 商場 ******連接 加上是前往56層空中觀景平台的入口  酒店大堂可以説是人潮熙攘 
早餐  可以1層或tower2 57層任選 ，前台告知1層種類多但我沒去 怕吵，57層有一些景觀 半露天 通風舒服 種類確實不多 不過我一貫烤吐司 雞蛋 咖啡 足夠了
總之，可以體驗
review_translated: The 57th-floor infinity pool is a selling point. The view is great, and the experience is excellent, especially the night view overlooking the entire city. We arrived around 11 PM and booked a room with a pool view, overlooking the Gardens by the Bay and Marina Bay. Other luxury hotels aren't as good as newer hotels, given how rapidly technology advances. The unrenovated rooms are even worse. Because it's connected to the subway mall and serves as the entrance to the 56th-floor skydeck, the hotel lobby is incredibly crowded. Breakfast is available on the first floor or on the 57th floor of Tower 2. The front desk told me there's more variety on the first floor, but I didn't go because it was too noisy. The 57th floor offers some views, is semi-open-air, airy, and comfortable. The variety isn't great, but I usually settle for toast, eggs, and coffee. Overall, it's worth the experience.

review_text: 真的很棒，前台幫我免費升級房間，態度很好，小朋友的用品很齊全，無邊泳池還是那麼美，每次來都會住。。。
review_translated: It's really great. The front desk helped me upgrade the room for free. The attitude was very good. The children's supplies were very complete. The infinity pool is still so beautiful. I will stay here every time I come...

review_text: 前台一般，明明會漢語，非要説英文，後來看到箇中國遊客是説中文，前台就用中文回答了，很流利。看不懂，5000多一晚的房費，開局就不太滿意，其他方面都很滿意。有酒店房卡出入樓頂可以走快捷通道，不用另外排隊。
review_translated: The front desk was average. They insisted on speaking English, even though they knew Chinese. Later, when they noticed the Chinese tourists were speaking Chinese, they responded fluently in Chinese. I couldn't understand it. For a room costing over 5,000 yuan per night, I wasn't satisfied from the start, but everything else was satisfactory. The hotel room card allows for express access to the rooftop, so you don't have to wait in line.

review_text: 絕對是新加坡最棒的酒店，前台服務周到親和力強，辦理入住全中文，三四個人為我們服務，蜜月旅行，房間做了升級窗户大視野好，送了隨手小禮品，無邊泳池是看公園和無人機表演的最佳位置，整個城市和海峽一覽無餘，酒店環境非常好，入住滿意！
review_translated: This is definitely the best hotel in Singapore. The front desk service is thoughtful and friendly. Check-in is done entirely in Chinese. There were three or four people serving us. We were on our honeymoon, and the room was upgraded with large windows and a great view. They also gave us a small gift. The infinity pool is the best spot to watch the park and drone show, with an unobstructed view of the entire city and the strait. The hotel environment is very good and I was very satisfied with my stay!

review_text: 房間設施，客房服務，購物餐飲配套齊全，周圍環境優美舒適，確實配得上這個級別的酒店
review_translated: The room facilities, room service, shopping and dining facilities are complete, and the surrounding environment is beautiful and comfortable. It is indeed worthy of this level of hotel.

review_text: 裝修有點陳舊了，電視機信號不好，其他還行
review_translated: The decoration is a bit old, the TV signal is not good, but other things are ok

review_text:
服務體現在小細節裏，排隊check in的時候，服務生託着裝滿MM豆和棒棒糖的託盤給客人挑選，看到小朋友也會給新加坡的手工製作卡紙書，讓帶娃的住店客人瞬間心情大好。
房間設施無驚喜也沒有驚嚇，據説是因為tower 3是老樓，不是新裝修的，所以就中規中矩吧，不知道tower1和2是不是會好一些，據説是新裝的。
無邊泳池大概都是用來打卡拍照的，很少有人會在那裡麪游來游去，哈哈哈～晚上俯瞰濱海灣神樹的夜景還是很美的。
金沙的商場和**也是狠狠展現了紙醉金迷，在這裏像一個幻境，海市蜃樓般的幻境，彷彿這裏就是一個虛擬世界😄
review_translated: The service is reflected in the small details. When waiting in line to check in, the waiter brought a tray full of MM beans and lollipops for guests to choose from. When they saw children, they would also give them handmade cardboard books from Singapore, which instantly made guests with children feel happy. The room facilities were neither surprising nor shocking. It is said that this is because Tower 3 is an old building and not newly renovated, so it is just average. I wonder if Tower 1 and 2 are better, as they are said to be newly renovated. The infinity pool is probably used for taking pictures, and few people swim around in it. Hahaha~ The night view overlooking the Marina Bay Tree is still beautiful. The shopping malls and hotels in the Marina Bay Sands also show the extravagance and decadence. It is like a fantasy, a mirage, as if this is a virtual world 😄

review_text: 前台基本是英文接待，提前到可以辦理預入住，給臨時房卡可到37層參觀。下午兩點提前辦理的入住，因為3棟裝修噪音問題協商升級到1棟新裝修的房間。1月底的無邊泳池人不太多，分別在下午4點和晚上7點去小童區域泳池，下午陽光很好，水温合適。晚上有風，出水有些冷了，需要到旁邊的小温泉池暖和一下。房間用品有需要派送很快，客服人員態度都很好，地下商場購物很方便，兩個孩子都很滿意。
review_translated: The front desk spoke mostly English. Arriving early allowed pre-check-in and a temporary room card for a tour of the 37th floor. We checked in early at 2:00 PM and negotiated an upgrade to the newly renovated room in Building 1 due to noise issues from renovations in Building 3. The infinity pool wasn't very crowded in late January. We visited the children's area at 4:00 PM and 7:00 PM, respectively. The afternoon sun was bright and the water temperature was just right. In the evening, the wind made the water a bit chilly, so we warmed up in the small hot spring pool next door. Room amenities were delivered quickly, and the customer service staff were very friendly. The basement shopping mall is very convenient, and both children were very satisfied.

review_text:
環境和服務都很好，但是泳池不乾淨，去遊了兩天泳，感染了黴菌性**炎，建議大家不要￼使用泳池，人太多了，什麼人都有。
一樓的自助餐不要去吃，好看，不好吃，龍蝦尤其難吃。
review_translated: The environment and service are very good, but the swimming pool is not clean. I went there for two days and got a fungal infection. I recommend that you do not use the swimming pool. It is too crowded and there are all kinds of people. Do not eat at the buffet on the first floor. It looks good but the food is not good. The lobster is especially unpalatable.

review_text: 吃住行相當方便，也去感受了一下無邊泳池，一切都好，就是有點小貴
review_translated: Food, accommodation and transportation are quite convenient. I also went to experience the infinity pool. Everything is good, but it is a bit expensive.

review_text: 運氣爆好，前台給升級了新裝修的塔樓，房間非常新裝修也很好，小吧枱茶是TWG的，洗浴用品也都是祖馬龍的很喜歡，超出預期的效果。
review_translated: I was very lucky. The front desk upgraded me to the newly renovated tower. The room was very newly renovated and very nice. The tea in the mini bar was from TWG, and the toiletries were all from Jo Malone. I loved it and it exceeded my expectations.

review_text: 個人認為帶家人在新加坡最好的選擇。吃喝住行購物都方便，在一個酒店都解決。想要去其他地方遊玩，走路都可以。或者打車都方便。**酒店設施都很不錯，還會選擇。
review_translated: I personally think this is the best choice for a family stay in Singapore. It's convenient for dining, accommodation, transportation, and shopping, all within one hotel. If you want to go somewhere else, you can walk or take a taxi. The hotel facilities are excellent and I would definitely choose it again.

review_text: 給升級了套房，太滿意了！服務員小姐姐貼心地送上福袋，濱海灣花園盡收眼底，零點的鞭炮攝入鏡頭。在這裏度過了快樂的除夕，迎來了美好的新年！下次的首選！
review_translated: We were upgraded to a suite, and we were so happy! The waitress thoughtfully gave us a lucky bag. The view was breathtaking, and we even caught a glimpse of the firecrackers at midnight. We had a wonderful New Year's Eve here, and we welcomed a wonderful new year! It will definitely be our first choice next time!

review_text: 相當值得打卡，讓人很震撼，好好好好好好好好好好好好好好好好好好好好好好好好好好好好好好好好好哦？我在。
review_translated: It's quite worth checking in, it's very shocking, good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good oh? I'm here.

review_text: 非常滿意，酒店給升級了套房，大大的驚喜，陽台就可以看到馬六甲，滿足了孩子的願望，無邊泳池也很棒，金沙購物中心相當方便，早起正好看到日出，完美，下次還會再來
review_translated: Very satisfied. The hotel upgraded us to a suite, which was a big surprise. The balcony offers a view of Malacca, which fulfilled the child's wish. The infinity pool is also great. The Marina Bay Sands shopping mall is very convenient. I woke up early to see the sunrise. It was perfect. I will come again next time.

review_text: 畢竟也是遊玩景點，人太多了，辦理入住很慢。窗景很好
review_translated: After all, it is a tourist attraction. There are too many people and check-in is very slow. The window view is very good.

review_text: 新加坡要挑酒店還真的衹有金沙酒店了，服務好、設施好、位置好、酒店美食多、泳池觀景台好，酒店可以造一天，周邊逛逛也方便，無可挑剔
review_translated: If you want to choose a hotel in Singapore, the only one that can be compared is the Marina Bay Sands. It has good service, good facilities, a good location, a lot of delicious food in the hotel, and a good swimming pool viewing platform. The hotel can be used for a whole day, and it is also convenient to walk around. It is impeccable.

review_text: 夜景很漂亮 環境超級棒
review_translated: The night view is beautiful and the environment is great

review_text: 忘記照房間裏了，房間從設施、衞生到服務都無可挑剔。升級了樓層，選擇的濱海灣花園景觀這邊，各方面的體驗感都超級棒！
review_translated: I forgot to take a photo of the room, which was impeccable from the facilities, cleanliness to the service. I upgraded to a higher floor with a view of Gardens by the Bay, and the experience was fantastic in every way!

review_text: 酒店硬件不能與之價格相匹配，主要是為了酒店頂樓的無邊泳池和其景色買單。
review_translated: The hotel hardware does not match its price, and the main reason for paying is the infinity pool on the rooftop and its view.

review_text: 房間很大，酒店服務也非常好，提供中文服務，還為我們免去了酒店按金，方便我們用現金購物考慮很周到，幫助指引辦理金沙尊享會員便捷通道￼
review_translated: The room is large and the hotel service is very good. They provide Chinese service and waived the hotel deposit for us, making it convenient for us to shop with cash. It is very thoughtful and helped guide us to apply for the convenient channel for Sands VIP membership.

review_text: 酒店很大，憑付款寶鉑金會員可以升級金沙會員卡，免費領取船票。空中花園景觀很贊，體驗了無邊泳池。裏面有商場和堵場，到濱海灣花園很方便。
review_translated: The hotel is huge, and Alipay Platinum members can upgrade to a Sands membership card, which includes free ferry tickets. The view from the sky garden is stunning, and we enjoyed the infinity pool. There's a shopping mall and casino nearby, making it convenient to Gardens by the Bay.

room_type: Sands Premier Double Queen Gardens By The Bay View
review_text: 景觀好，服務好，超級享受
review_translated: Great view, great service, super enjoyment

review_text: 酒店價格雖然不便宜，但頂樓的觀景平台和無邊泳池都很棒，整體服務也很不錯，來新加坡建議一定要體驗一下。
review_translated: Although the hotel is not cheap, the rooftop viewing platform and infinity pool are great, and the overall service is also very good. I recommend you to experience it when you come to Singapore.

review_text:
交通：出行購物便捷
環境：環境優美，新加坡首選
服務：工作人員很熱情
設施：購物娛樂設施都很完善，商場可逛性也很高，晚上也很美
review_translated: Transportation: convenient for travel and shopping Environment: beautiful environment, the first choice in Singapore Service: the staff are very enthusiastic Facilities: shopping and entertainment facilities are very complete, the mall is also very walkable, and it is also beautiful at night

review_text:
設施衞生環境都很好，電梯速度快，房間大，落地窗觀景視野棒。
不足之處是辦理入住耗時很久，要求的客房服務速度也稍慢。
review_translated: The facilities and sanitation are very good, the elevator is fast, the room is large, and the floor-to-ceiling windows have a great view. The downside is that check-in takes a long time, and the room service is also a bit slow.

review_text: 環境很好，價格也漂亮
review_translated: Nice environment, good price

room_type: Sands Premier Double Queen Gardens By The Bay View
review_text: 非常好的體驗
review_translated: Very good experience

review_text: 景觀太棒了，免費升級，前台小姐姐很nice
review_translated: The view is great, free upgrade, the front desk lady is very nice

review_text: 作為新加坡地標性酒店，雖然建成已有多年，但酒店維護良好，這次我們入住的房型就是裝修過的，雙床房的床睡一大一小也沒問題，房間較大，適合親子。
review_translated: As a landmark hotel in Singapore, although it has been built for many years, the hotel is well maintained. The room we stayed in this time was renovated. The twin bed in the room can accommodate one adult and one child. The room is large and suitable for families.

review_text: 除了大堂比較喧鬧，整體感覺很棒，連接未來館，商場還有娛樂設施都很方便，早餐確實要爭取9點之前不然會排隊，無邊泳池很值得打卡，推薦
review_translated: Except for the noisy lobby, the overall feeling is great. It is very convenient to connect to the Future Museum, shopping malls and entertainment facilities. You really have to try to have breakfast before 9 o'clock or there will be a queue. The infinity pool is worth checking in. Recommended

review_text: 入住新裝修的金沙尊貴房是我喜歡的裝修風格，洗漱用品的品質也很不錯，房間視野開闊，城景盡收眼底👍👍
review_translated: The newly renovated Sands Premier Room is the one I like. The quality of the toiletries is also very good. The room has a wide view and a panoramic view of the city.

review_text: 房間很大很乾凈，外面風景賊好。服務態度也很好。完美。。
review_translated: The room was large and clean, with a great view. The service was excellent. Perfect.

review_text: 房間超級舒服，無邊泳池視野中是新加坡霓虹閃爍∽夜景，趴在泳池邊欣賞無人機表演，完美∽體驗
review_translated: The room was super comfortable. The view of the infinity pool was of Singapore's neon lights at night. Lying by the pool and watching the drone show was a perfect experience.

review_text: 57層樓頂無邊泳池，yyds。旁邊商場負二層有美食街。味道還可以。還有特色娛樂場，新加坡合法的。量力而行😎
review_translated: The infinity pool on the 57th floor is amazing. There's a food court on the basement level of the adjacent shopping mall. The food is pretty good. There's also a specialty casino, legal in Singapore. Just do what you can.

room_type: Sands Premier King Gardens By The Bay View
review_text: 可以體驗一下 頂層景色恨好 周圍環境很好
review_translated: You can experience the top floor view. The surrounding environment is very good.

review_text: 房型選了最普通的真的很一般，但是頂層無邊泳池的景色真的太美了
review_translated: The room type I chose was the most ordinary one, which was really average, but the view from the rooftop infinity pool was really beautiful.

review_text: 好好好好好好好好好好好，除了人很多，房間、服務都很好。環境很好，地理位置非常方便。度假就新加坡金沙！
review_translated: Very good, very good, very good, very good. Apart from the crowds, the rooms and service were all very good. The environment is great and the location is very convenient. The Singapore Sands is the perfect place for vacation!

review_text: 超級滿意，晚上早上都去游泳了，窗外就是濱海灣花園，海，景色特別漂亮
review_translated: Super satisfied, went swimming in the evening and morning, the view outside the window is the Gardens by the Bay, the sea, the scenery is very beautiful

review_text: 酒店非常漂亮啊，57樓的露天花園游泳池，可以一邊游泳一邊俯瞰整個城市夜景，度假放鬆的好去處。酒店環境也好，檔次高，房間大，前台給升級了房型，住的很舒心啊。房間對面就是魚尾獅公園，超大落地窗，簡直不要太享受。
review_translated: The hotel is absolutely stunning. The outdoor garden pool on the 57th floor offers a breathtaking view of the city at night, perfect for a relaxing getaway. The hotel is also beautiful and upscale, with spacious rooms. The front desk even upgraded us, making our stay incredibly comfortable. Our room was across from the Merlion Park, and the large floor-to-ceiling windows were a true delight.

review_text: 環境好，出入方便，服務周到。設施可以。陽台上看出去夜景很美，無邊泳池是一大亮點。點贊！
review_translated: The environment is good, access is convenient, and the service is attentive. The facilities are good. The night view from the balcony is beautiful, and the infinity pool is a highlight. Thumbs up!

review_text:
房間景色特別好
服務和硬件也好 完全不老久，套房空間很大
酒店的早餐和正餐也非常好
屋頂泳池尤其出彩 景色絕了
review_translated: The view from the room was particularly good. The service and facilities were excellent. It was not outdated at all. The suite was spacious. The breakfast and dinner at the hotel were also very good. The rooftop pool was particularly good. The view was amazing.

review_text: 基本上可以，設施有點老舊了
review_translated: Basically OK, the facilities are a bit old

review_text:
去吃早飯，因為帶的寶寶感冒，所以在吃早飯期間沒吃幾口，我們為了不耽誤酒店餐廳收拾桌椅，也本着不浪費糧食的心態，就決定把寶寶吃剩的半碗粥帶走房間吃，也方便我們大人收拾行李準備退房。但是遭到餐廳經理的極力反對，説食物帶出去會有安全問題，那我也可以理解。我就和那位女經理説，那可不可以麻煩申請他們餐廳同事幫我們送一小份粥上來，因為寶寶生病要吃一點東西，這樣他們自己同事送上來也不會有安全問題。但是那位女經理態度很堅決並且有點不耐煩，説小孩生病也説不行，完全沒有商量的餘地。我覺得這麼高星級的酒店，好的口碑都是好的設施加好的服務以及處理問題的能力做出來的，而不是靠死板的規矩吧。如果這點體諒都沒有的話，真的讓人很難再次選擇貴酒店。後面我覺得和她溝通無果，和她説想找經理協商，她説她就是經理。我説那我投訴，後面她找了另外一個經理。那個男經理態度很好，和我説明情況，然後有了解我們的需求，説會叫同事送一份粥去房間。最後我們等了快一個小時也沒有收到粥，最後就退房了。但是這位男經理的態度以及解決問題的方式我都比較滿意。
房間各方面環境衞生都不錯，就是房間沒有高一點的電插頭能提供給寶寶的自帶熱水壺燒水，插頭都比較矮，燒熱水很怕寶寶會碰到。
最後其實我想説酒店是給客人提供家一樣環境的地方，讓客人在酒店感受到的是舒適，而不是任何事情就沒得商量，並且不人道的。
review_translated: We went to breakfast. My baby had a cold, so we didn't eat much during breakfast. To avoid delaying the hotel restaurant's clearing of the tables and chairs, and out of a desire to avoid wasting food, we decided to take the baby's half bowl of porridge to the room to eat while we packed and checked out. However, the restaurant manager strongly objected, saying it would be a safety issue to take food out. I understand. I asked the female manager if they could ask a staff member to bring a small portion of porridge up for us, since the baby needed something to eat, and it wouldn't be a safety issue if their staff brought it themselves. However, the female manager was adamant and a bit impatient, saying even a sick child wouldn't work, with no room for negotiation. I believe a hotel with such a high star rating earns its reputation through excellent facilities, excellent service, and problem-solving skills, not rigid rules. If they don't even show this level of understanding, it's hard to choose your hotel again. Feeling my communication was fruitless, I told her I wanted to speak with the manager, but she said she was the manager. I said I'd file a complaint, and she contacted another manager. The manager was very friendly. He explained the situation to me, understood our needs, and said he would have a colleague bring some porridge to our room. We waited almost an hour but it still didn't arrive, so we checked out. However, I was quite satisfied with the manager's attitude and the way he resolved the issue. The room was clean and tidy in every way, except that there wasn't a high electrical outlet for our baby's kettle. The outlets were quite low, and I was worried the baby would touch them. Ultimately, I think a hotel is a place that provides guests with a home-like environment and a sense of comfort, not an uncompromising and inhumane approach.

review_text: 無邊遊池和空中花園絕了，孩子們都很喜歡，看到了新加坡的繁榮，文明
review_translated: The infinity pool and sky garden are amazing. The children love it and see the prosperity and civilization of Singapore.

review_text: 酒店裝修，給了二樓，有點遺憾，出行和購物很方便，下次旅遊還會來住
review_translated: The hotel is renovated and I was given the second floor, which is a bit regrettable. It is very convenient for travel and shopping. I will stay here again next time I travel.

review_text: 前台幫忙升級了親子套房，設施完善、非常完美！
review_translated: The front desk helped upgrade the family suite, which was well-equipped and perfect!

review_text: 景色絕佳，無邊際泳池一直躺着都不會膩（衹要不下雨
review_translated: The view is amazing, and you won’t get tired of lying in the infinity pool (as long as it doesn’t rain).

review_text: 酒店設施齊全，配套商場各種奢侈品大牌應有盡有，服務人員態度非常熱情、講解細緻，雖然酒店開業年份已久但是維護非常完好、很新，保潔人員衞生打掃到位，衞生間配套的產品很高端很細節，頂層無邊泳池堪稱全球最頂尖，俯瞰新加坡全景，彙集全球精英時尚達人，酒店配備專業攝影師提供專業攝影服務，早餐設定在一樓跟頂層供客人各種需求的選擇
review_translated: The hotel is well-equipped with amenities and a shopping mall stocked with luxury brands. The staff are very welcoming and attentive. Although the hotel has been open for a long time, it is very well-maintained and looks brand new. The cleaning staff is very thorough and the bathrooms are equipped with high-end and detailed products. The rooftop infinity pool is considered one of the best in the world, overlooking Singapore and attracting the world's elite fashionistas. The hotel is equipped with professional photographers to provide professional photography services. Breakfast is set on the first and top floors to provide guests with various choices.

review_text: 物有所值，體驗感很好
review_translated: Good value for money, great experience

review_text: 地標酒店，眾所皆知，不必多説，先住為敬。
review_translated: The Landmark Hotel is well-known to everyone, so there is no need to say more. Let me show my respect by staying here first.

review_text:
環境：非常棒的入住體驗
服務：很專業，入住辦理快速
review_translated: Environment: Very good check-in experience Service: Very professional, fast check-in

review_text: 很不錯，滿意
review_translated: Very good, satisfied

review_text:
花園景觀非常好，還有小部分海景。服務人員很有禮貌，效率很高，不愧是新加坡地標景點。
美中不足是陽台門衹要稍微打開一兩分鐘，房間就會自動斷電，雖然關門後會立刻恢複電力，但是洗手間所有燈都要重新手動打開。
review_translated: The garden view is stunning, with a small ocean view. The staff are polite and efficient, making it a truly Singaporean landmark. The only downside is that if the balcony door is left open for even a minute or two, the room's power goes out. While power returns immediately after closing the door, you still have to manually turn on all the lights in the bathroom.

review_text: 房間的設施很普通，就是無邊泳池這些設施是稀缺的。景觀真是無敵，尤其是夜晚，對面cbd燈火一覽無餘。
review_translated: The facilities in the room are very ordinary, but the infinity pool is rare. The view is really unbeatable, especially at night, when you can see the lights of the CBD opposite.

review_text: 非常好的酒店🏨，景色設施一流，值得推薦
review_translated: Very good hotel🏨, first-class scenery and facilities, highly recommended

review_text: 景色好，服務周到。
review_translated: Nice view and attentive service.

review_text: 房間很大，環境優美，視野開闊。泳池很豪華。
review_translated: The room is large, the environment is beautiful, the view is wide, and the swimming pool is luxurious.

review_text: 周邊環境超好，交通方便。辦理預入住可去觀景台和泳池。
review_translated: The surrounding environment is super good and the transportation is convenient. You can go to the observation deck and swimming pool after checking in.

review_text: 付費升級了房間，提前入住發現衞生間垃圾筒滿的未收拾，燒水壺倒不出水，用棉簽捅了一下才發現是壺嘴裏堵着一團不知何物很噁心的東西，反映給客房，來了打掃了説反映給上級，後面倒是來了一個人看了一下就走了，然後就沒有然後了，出現這種低級問題與酒店定位嚴重不符。住四十多層也挺潮濕，也就是到此一遊吧，不會推薦給其他人
review_translated: I paid for an upgraded room, checked in early, and discovered the bathroom trash can was full and untied. The kettle wouldn't pour water. I poked it with a cotton swab and found a disgusting mass of something stuck in the spout. I reported it to housekeeping, who came and cleaned it, and said they'd report it to a supervisor. Someone did come and take a look, then left, and nothing more happened. This kind of low-level problem is seriously inconsistent with the hotel's positioning. It was quite humid even on the 40th floor. It was just a visit, and I wouldn't recommend it to anyone else.

review_text: 景觀非常好，但是內部設施很一般。
review_translated: The view is very good, but the interior facilities are very average.

review_text: 除了價格高點些，其它還接受
review_translated: Except the price is a bit higher, the others are acceptable

review_text: 空中泳池🏊孩子們的最愛😍
review_translated: Sky pool 🏊Kids' favorite 😍

review_text: 酒店服務很好，還有吸煙房
review_translated: The hotel service is very good and there are smoking rooms

review_text: 房間不是很大，樓頂無邊泳池很美，我女兒生日還送了蛋糕
review_translated: The room is not very big, but the rooftop infinity pool is beautiful. My daughter even got a cake for her birthday.

review_text: 房間乾淨整潔美觀
review_translated: The room is clean, tidy and beautiful

review_text: 非常滿意，設施服務都很完美！
review_translated: Very satisfied, the facilities and services are perfect!

review_text: 頂樓的泳池夜景不錯，值得一遊
review_translated: The rooftop swimming pool has a nice night view and is worth a visit

review_text: 房間乾淨，景觀很美，服務很好
review_translated: Clean room, beautiful view, good service

review_text: 不到無邊際泳池不算到新加坡
review_translated: No visit to Singapore is complete without a visit to the infinity pool

review_text: 服務很好、游泳池很漂亮、值得推薦
review_translated: Great service, beautiful swimming pool, highly recommended

room_type: Sands Premier King Gardens By The Bay View
review_text: 中文溝通沒壓力，很不錯
review_translated: Chinese communication is stress-free, very good

review_text: 很棒的房間，很好的服務，很好的娛樂，很好的體驗，很滿意的旅程，很難忘的經歷，很值得推薦，大家都去啊！
review_translated: Great room, great service, great entertainment, great experience, very satisfying journey, very unforgettable experience, highly recommended, everyone should go!

review_text: 服務體驗和房間景觀對得起這個價位了
review_translated: The service experience and room view are worth the price.

review_text: 服務員很熱情，樓頂拍照很好看
review_translated: The waiters are very enthusiastic and the rooftop photos are great.

review_text: 七年前來過，現在價格飛漲，但漲了服務沒跟上啊，對國人比較傲慢，前台聲稱6000多的房型均在未裝修樓棟中，並有噪音，並詢問我是否付費升級，同時表示升級後樓層低或者沒有陽台，看基本把歐美及日韓遊客均安排在新裝修樓棟，是否國人預訂的均在未裝修樓棟？也並未事先告知，有歧視嫌疑，後在攜程協調下升級更換，感受頗差。自助餐廳部分服務員在明知是🇨🇳人前提下依然假裝聽不懂用英語，總之金沙感覺不咋地，性價比最低，希望大家避雷
review_translated: I came here seven years ago, and prices have skyrocketed, but the service hasn't kept up. They're quite rude to Chinese people. The front desk claimed that rooms priced over 6,000 were all in unrenovated buildings and were noisy. They asked if I wanted to pay for an upgrade, but also said that the upgraded floor would be lower or without a balcony. It seems that European, American, Japanese, and Korean tourists are basically placed in the newly renovated buildings. Are Chinese people booking in unrenovated buildings? They didn't inform me in advance, which seemed discriminatory. Later, with the coordination of Ctrip, I upgraded and changed, but the experience was quite poor. Some waiters in the buffet restaurant pretended not to understand English even though they knew I was a 🇨🇳 person. Overall, Sands is not very good, and the value for money is the lowest. I hope everyone will avoid it.

review_text: 非常非常滿意
review_translated: Very very satisfied

review_text: 房間不錯，位置好，剛到的時候被奢華的裝修、硬件吸引，後來被服務吸引，房間陽台看出去的景觀、頂樓的泳池都是獨一無二的存在。
review_translated: The room is nice and the location is good. When I first arrived, I was attracted by the luxurious decoration and hardware, and later I was attracted by the service. The view from the balcony of the room and the swimming pool on the rooftop are unique.

review_text:
辦理入住時候客服將我安排在3號樓並且告訴我們該棟樓在裝修，會有一點點吵。
入住後才知道是地震般的震動並不是一點點吵。完全有理由猜測在安排樓棟的時候是有被欺騙的成分。
後來和客服投訴幫我們換到了1號樓。雖然樓層低了，但沒有了喧鬧。而且是全新裝修。
友情提示各位旅客 後瞭解得知，1和2號樓是新裝修。3正在裝修 千萬不可選
review_translated: When I checked in, the customer service assigned me to Building 3 and told me it was under renovation and would be a bit noisy. After checking in, I realized it was shaking like an earthquake, not just noisy. I have every reason to suspect they were deceived when assigning me a building. After complaining to customer service, they moved us to Building 1. While it's a lower floor, it's less noisy and newly renovated. A friendly reminder to all travelers: Buildings 1 and 2 are newly renovated. Don't choose Building 3, which is under renovation.

review_text: 這次住了2晚，我們定了3間房。比較遺憾的是沒能住到新裝修的，前台跟我説要加錢。但總體來説金沙的服務真的很好！雖然3號樓有點舊，但面積很大，有陽台，也能看到海景，還是很美的！早餐也不錯，晚上的自助餐廳也很好吃，我們連着吃了2晚，12歲以下的小朋友都免費很人性化。唯一缺點的話就是一樓大廳太多了，太鬧騰！
review_translated: We stayed for two nights this time and booked three rooms. Unfortunately, we didn't get the newly renovated rooms; the front desk told me it would cost extra. Overall, the service at Sands is excellent! Although Building 3 is a bit dated, it's spacious, has a balcony, and offers a beautiful sea view. The breakfast was also excellent, and the evening buffet was delicious. We ate there two nights in a row. Children under 12 eat free, which is very user-friendly. The only downside is that the first floor lobby is too crowded and noisy!

review_text:
來新加坡必須住一晚金沙
無邊泳池空中花園
步行去周邊景點也很方便
推薦
review_translated: You must stay one night in Singapore. The Golden Sands Infinity Pool and Sky Garden are also very convenient for walking to the surrounding attractions. Recommended

review_text:
第二次入住這裏 十年前還沒帶娃來 這次帶孩子 體驗感十足 房間夠大 無邊泳池永遠的經典
設施：豪華
衞生：很優秀
服務：很友善
特別表揚行李部 
特別表揚besh 入住辦理很好 中文很好
review_translated: My second time staying here. I didn't bring my kids here ten years ago. This time I brought my kids and it was a great experience. The room is big enough and the infinity pool is a timeless classic. Facilities: luxurious. Cleanliness: excellent. Service: very friendly. Special praise for the bellhop. Besh. Check-in was very good. Chinese is very good.

review_text: 購物中心方便、吃飯也方便、服務好、房間乾淨整潔，裏面設施新、非常滿意、下次還會來、裏面工作人員服務態度熱情、有會中文、非常方便
review_translated: The shopping mall is convenient, the dining area is also convenient, the service is good, the room is clean and tidy, the facilities are new, very satisfied, will come again next time, the staff are friendly and can speak Chinese, very convenient

review_text: 房間很好風景很棒
review_translated: Nice room with great view

review_text:
我們三個房間，酒店居然給我們升級成了總統套房…
套房裡包含了三個房間，每個房間都有衣帽間、衞生間。
還有書房，小型健身房，按摩房和K歌房，太豪橫了，不得不點贊這次住宿體驗！
前台説平時這個房間是20000新元…
review_translated: We had three rooms, and the hotel unexpectedly upgraded us to a presidential suite. The suite includes three bedrooms, each with a dressing room and bathroom. There's also a study, a small gym, a massage room, and a karaoke room. It was truly luxurious! I have to give this stay a thumbs up! The front desk said this room normally costs 20,000 Singapore dollars.

review_text: 風景太美了，泳池超讚👍服務也很到位，有孩子的拖鞋，浴袍，游完泳孩子餓了還可以點餐，送餐有餐桌，使用完房門口按鈴即可。
review_translated: The scenery is so beautiful, the swimming pool is amazing 👍The service is also in place, there are slippers and bathrobes for children, and if the children are hungry after swimming, they can order food, and there is a dining table for delivery. Just ring the bell at the door after use.

review_text:
多年以來我寫的點評幾乎都是正能量，寫的也短，今天第一次來個負能量+長篇
1.入住  手機電量要足——因為你需要排隊至少二十分鐘，不刷手機真是難熬。兩個入住手續辦理前台，取決於你住塔1，2還是3。否則你要拖着行李步行五分鐘，穿過大堂到另一邊辦手續。你在穿越過程中，還會驚喜地發現來來往往的人流巨多，賭客、購物客、遊客和住客人流交雜在酒店大堂，各種大聲喧嘩，腦仁兒疼。好不容易快輪到你了，你會發現一個前台辦理入住的平均時間為十分鐘，再加上有的話嘮前台和客人愛聊天，等着吧。
2.房間。儘管來之前就知道沒有浴缸，但衝著其它硬件和位置，以為四千多一晚的酒店還能説得過去，哪想到——沒有浴液和洗髮水，要打電話要；一次性拖鞋的容貌堪比國內快捷酒店；衞生間沒有乾濕分離，一人如廁，全家需要外面耐心等待；牙刷更是讓人歎為觀止，目測成本不超幾塊錢人民幣，快捷酒店都不如。好歹也是金沙，有必要這麼不堪嗎？
3.所謂的網紅無邊泳池。記得不要白天去，否則一個卧榻都搶不到，衹能像服務生送飲料一樣滿世界找啊找，半小時都沒找到，回去了，不遊了。晚上八點以後稍微好點。
4.退房。通過攜程和自己打電話，晚一分鐘退房也不行。
總結：永不再來，這點錢住洲際和凱賓不香嗎？無邊泳池新加坡好多酒店都有啊？有人説智商税是窮人的偽概念，但是貨不對版花冤枉錢有意思嗎？
這種酒店就不要放在黃金位置推薦了，想送錢的自然會去秀朋友圈。更好的體驗不值得去這裏。

For years I've written reviews that are almost always positive and short, but today for the first time I'm going to post negative + long one.
1. check in. Your Cell phone power should be sufficient - because you need to queue for at least twenty minutes, it is really hard to get through without refresh your phone. There are two check-in desks, depending on whether you're in Tower 1, 2 or 3, otherwise you'll have to walk five minutes with your luggages in tow across the lobby to the other side to check in. You'll also be pleasantly surprised at the sheer volume of people coming and going, gamblers, shoppers, tourists, and residents mingling in the hotel lobby with all sorts of loud noises that make your brain hurt. Finally it's your turn, you will find a front desk check-in average time of ten minutes, plus there are nagging front desk and guests love to chat, justwait for it.
2.Room. Although before coming to know there is no bathtub, but rushed to other hardware and location, thought more than four thousand a night hotel can still say, which thought - no bath gel and shampoo, to call to be; disposable slippers looks comparable to domestic fast hotels; The toilet and the shower are interconnected, if one person goes to toilet, the whole family need to wait patiently outside; toothbrush It is even more breathtaking, the cost is not more than a few RMB, the express hotel is not as good. At least it is Sands, is it necessary to be so bad?
3. The so-called net red infinity pool. Remember not to go during the daytime, otherwise a couch can not be grabbed, you look like a waiter to send drinks all over the world, half an hour later, I did not find, so went back. After eight o'clock in the evening is slightly better.
4. Check out. Through Ctrip and my own phone calls, a minute late cannot be dalayed, you have to go on time.
Summarize: never come back again, the same amount of money for staying in the Intercontinental and Kempinski is much better than here. Some people say that the IQ tax is a poor man's pseudo-concept, but the goods are not the right version of the money spent in vain is still so rediculious.
This kind of hotel should not be placed in the golden position recommended, sb who wants to give away money will naturally go to show friends circle by Wechat. A better experience is not worth going here.
review_translated: For years, my reviews have been mostly positive and short. Today, for the first time, I'm going to write a long, negative review. 1. Make sure your phone is fully charged when you check in—you'll have to wait in line for at least twenty minutes, and it's incredibly difficult to not check your phone. There are two check-in desks, depending on whether you're staying in Tower 1, 2, or 3. Otherwise, you'll have to walk five minutes, dragging your luggage through the lobby, to the other side. As you make your way through, you'll be surprised by the sheer volume of people coming and going: gamblers, shoppers, tourists, and guests mingling in the hotel lobby, the noise is so loud it's a headache. When your turn finally arrives, you'll find that the average check-in time per desk is ten minutes, and some of the chatterboxes love chatting with guests. Just wait. 2. The room. Although I knew there was no bathtub before arriving, I still thought a hotel costing over 4,000 yuan a night was reasonable considering the other amenities and location. But I was surprised—there was no shower gel or shampoo, and I had to call to get them. The disposable slippers looked like those in a budget hotel in China. The bathroom had no dry/wet separation, so if one person went to the toilet, the whole family had to wait patiently outside. The toothbrush was even more appalling, costing no more than a few yuan, even worse than a budget hotel. It's Sands after all, so why should it be so awful? 3. The so-called internet-famous infinity pool. Remember not to go during the day, or you won't be able to get a single bed. You'll be searching like a waiter delivering drinks, searching everywhere. After half an hour, I couldn't find one, so I went back and didn't swim anymore. It's a little better after 8 PM. 4. Check-out. I called Ctrip and myself, and even a minute later, I couldn't check out. Bottom line: Never come back. For this price, isn't staying at the InterContinental or Kempinski better? Many hotels in Singapore have infinity pools. Some say the "IQ tax" is a misconception for the poor, but is it really worth wasting money on something you don't like? This kind of hotel should not be recommended in a prime location. Those who want to give money will naturally show it on their social circle. A better experience is not worth going here.
