review_text: 酒店確實不錯，房間也很棒，但是就是要下午2-3:00 後才能入住，早上11:00 就要 走人。確實有點不合理。
review_translated: The hotel is indeed nice, and the rooms are great, but the only thing is that you can only check in after 2-3:00 pm, and you have to check out at 11:00 am. This is really a bit unreasonable.

review_text: 風景特別漂亮
review_translated: The scenery is particularly beautiful

review_text: 迎來送往服務熱情耐心 房間景色很美 早餐可在食閣 乾淨品種多樣化味道不錯經濟實惠 可以省早餐 逛街方便很好的選擇
review_translated: The welcoming service was warm and patient. The room had a beautiful view. Breakfast was available in the food court. It was clean, varied, and tasted good. It was economical and affordable. You can save on breakfast and go shopping. It was a great choice.

room_type: Sands Premier Double Queen Gardens By The Bay View
review_text: 環境衞生設施都很好，就是拿房太慢，早上十點就過來開房，到下午四點才拿到房間，旅途本身就很累打算到房間休息一會再出去玩的，結果等幾個小時
review_translated: The sanitation and facilities are all very good, but the room was too slow to be taken. I came to check in at 10 am, but I didn't get the room until 4 pm. I was very tired from the journey and planned to rest in the room for a while before going out to play. In the end, I had to wait for several hours.

review_text: 總的來説不錯，唯一就是舊房間真的舊了，還賣六千多不説，房間被褥浴袍洗漱用品，和新裝修的全部不一樣，確定是一家酒店嗎？這樣子還賣這麼貴太不值了，唯一就是泳池和樓下商場和******真的太方便，趕緊裝修吧，六千多訂新裝修還可以，一定要訂新裝修的呀！！！！早餐不錯，很豐富。前台服務很差，效率極其低，很慢很慢，但是禮賓另外服務還是不錯的，大廳人很多，禮賓部的工作人員會四處走動問拿着行禮的客人要不要幫忙，特別是退房那天，Edgardo在大廳遇到我們把所有行李裝上行李車，問我們是checkin還是out，還幫我們叫車，看我們人多給我説他叫一輛大車就行，還把所有行李裝上車，讓人覺得在人潮湧動的金沙還是能享受到服務的。
review_translated: Overall, it's a good hotel. The only thing is that the old room is really old. Not only is it priced at over 6,000, but the bedding, bathrobes, and toiletries are completely different from the newly renovated ones. Are you sure it's a hotel? It's so overpriced for something like this, it's a steal. The only thing is that the pool, the shopping mall downstairs, and ****** are really convenient. They should renovate it quickly. It's okay to book a newly renovated one for over 6,000. You absolutely must book a newly renovated one! The breakfast was good and plentiful. The front desk service was terrible, extremely slow, and inefficient. However, the concierge service was quite good. The lobby was crowded, and the concierge staff would go around asking guests with their luggage if they needed help. On check-out day, Edgardo met us in the lobby as we loaded our luggage onto a luggage cart. He asked if we were checking in or out, and even called a taxi for us. Seeing how many people we were, he told me to just call a large one. He even loaded all our luggage into the car. It felt like you could still enjoy service in the crowded Sands.

review_text:
房間設施很好，衞生乾淨，有專門的客房服務人員，房間外面的大陽台真是超愛，外景很好～
人很多，入住一定要等3點以後～
早飯要9點後去要排隊，品種很多，水果特別新鮮～
review_translated: The room facilities are very good, clean and hygienic, with dedicated room service staff. I love the large balcony outside the room, with a great view. It's very crowded, so you have to wait until after 3 o'clock to check in. You have to queue for breakfast after 9 o'clock, but there are many varieties and the fruit is especially fresh.

review_text: 這個必須點評一下，環境不用説，位置風景絕佳，無邊泳池我是沒玩夠啊，隨便發幾張，感受一下啊，下次再來，對了，酒店直通奢侈品店，太nice了。
review_translated: I have to comment on this. Needless to say, the environment is great, the location and scenery are superb, and I haven't had enough of the infinity pool. I'll just post a few pictures for you to feel. I'll come again next time. By the way, the hotel is directly connected to the luxury store, which is very nice.

review_text: 設施先進，環境優美
review_translated: Advanced facilities and beautiful environment

review_text:
設施：好
衞生：好
環境：好
服務：好👌👌好喜歡好贊確實優點多好好👍好喜歡好期待好喜歡美美美好😊好喜歡好期待好喜歡好棒好棒
review_translated: Facilities: Good Hygiene: Good Environment: Good Service: Good👌👌 I like it very much. It is indeed very good. There are many advantages. Good👍 I like it very much. I look forward to it. I like it very much. It is beautiful and beautiful😊 I like it very much. I look forward to it. I like it very much. It is great.

review_text: Perfect,一生必住一次
review_translated: Perfect, a must-stay in your lifetime

review_text:
連住三天還是不夠，下次還來。
從老到小住了一圈（萊佛士、嘉佩樂）還是最喜歡金沙。感覺太太太太讚了。當然房間不算大，但真的衹有睡覺才在房間裏，其他時候都太太太太太讚了！！
無邊泳池yyds！早餐廳樓頂的視野絕絕子，樓下的好吃種類多（建議還是吃樓下的哈哈）。
去濱海灣花園太方便（濱海灣花園每次玩完回去打車都不方便，體驗了兩次都是打不到車，大排隊，所以還是住金沙步行最方便）。圖上就是在金沙坐電梯上空中花園，走到濱海灣的那個路，真的建議走這條，美很多。

房間夜景很好，能直接看到魚獅尾，入住時給免費升級了城市夜景房（後來賊後悔，想要濱海灣花園景色，但是房間全滿了換不了）

提醒：會中文的不多，很多印度服務員。不過還是可以溝通的，求助時也能找到中文的。
review_translated: Three days wasn't enough, so I'll be back next time. After staying at a variety of hotels, from the oldest to the youngest (Raffles, Capella), I still love the Sands the most. It's absolutely amazing. Sure, the room isn't huge, but I only use it when I sleep. Otherwise, it's absolutely amazing! The infinity pool is amazing! The view from the rooftop breakfast restaurant is incredible, and there's a wide variety of delicious food downstairs (I recommend eating downstairs, haha). It's so convenient to Gardens by the Bay (it's always hard to get a taxi back after visiting the Gardens by the Bay. I tried it twice and couldn't get one, there were huge lines, so it's more convenient to walk from the Sands). The picture shows the path from the Sands elevator up to the SkyPark and then to Marina Bay. I highly recommend taking this route; it's so much more beautiful. The night view from the room is amazing, with a direct view of the Merlion's Tail. We were given a free upgrade to a City Night View room upon check-in (which I later regretted; I wanted a Gardens by the Bay view, but they were all booked up and couldn't change). A word of caution: there aren't many Chinese-speaking staff, and many of the staff are Indian. However, it's still possible to communicate, and you can find Chinese speakers when you need help.

review_text: 超級不錯的體驗，超級喜歡的酒店，金沙酒店無邊泳池打卡，服務超級棒，住着非常舒服還乾淨，下次來還要選擇這裏
review_translated: Super good experience, I like this hotel very much, check in the infinity pool of Sands Hotel, the service is superb, the stay is very comfortable and clean, I will choose here next time

review_text: 可能運營時間太長，設備裝璜有點陳舊，酒店服務有點跟不上五星標準
review_translated: Maybe it has been in operation for too long, the equipment and decoration are a bit old, and the hotel service is a bit behind the five-star standard.

review_text: 房間做了升級，很舒適，特別給Hui Ying一個好評，吃早餐出房門正好遇上，很迅速的做好了房間保潔，並且非常細心觀察到我們帶了孩子，主動提供了小童洗漱用品、小拖鞋以及薯片飲料等小零食，是個對工作很用心的姑娘。
review_translated: The room has been upgraded and is very comfortable. I would like to give a special praise to Hui Ying. I met her when I was leaving the room after breakfast. She cleaned the room very quickly and noticed that we had a child with us. She took the initiative to provide children with toiletries, small slippers, and snacks such as chips and drinks. She is a girl who is very dedicated to her work.

review_text: 新加坡最好的酒店
review_translated: Best hotels in Singapore

review_text: 景觀無敵。。。房間也非常好
review_translated: The view is amazing... The room is also very good

review_text: 第四次來住金沙了，一如既往的優質服務，房間景觀也不錯，下次來還會選擇金沙。
review_translated: This is my fourth time staying at Sands. The service is excellent as always and the view from the room is also nice. I will choose Sands again next time.

review_text: 酒店內部裝修一般般，但是環境真的沒話説。難得跑一趟，奢侈一下吧。可能是暑假尾部了，人還好。小朋友玩的很開心
review_translated: The hotel's interior decoration is average, but the environment is really amazing. It's a rare trip, so let's splurge a little. Maybe it's the end of summer vacation, so people are okay. The kids had a lot of fun.

review_text: 新加坡的地標酒店，定的高級房，入住人數實在是太多了，辦理入住都排了好久，樓頂泳池人實在是太多，但我還是比較喜歡小池的哈哈，下次要去體驗下酒店的spa，這次時間太緊了，之後一定要再去好好享受一次
review_translated: I booked a superior room at the Landmark Hotel in Singapore, but there were so many people staying there that I had to wait in line for a long time to check in. The rooftop pool was really crowded, but I still prefer the smaller pool. I'm going to try the hotel's spa next time, as I was too tight on time this time. I'll definitely go back and enjoy it later.

review_text: 新加坡必住酒店之一，那麼多年依然嶄新整潔，樓下的食閣也是很方便的。
review_translated: One of the must-stay hotels in Singapore. It is still brand new and clean after so many years, and the food court downstairs is also very convenient.

review_text: 酒店是老牌子，管理很規範，每個人都各司其職。有種態度熱情，又很專業規範。頂樓的早餐上菜很快，味道不錯，但是礙於位置，種類有限。酒店位置很好，去哪裡都很方便。頂樓拍照很美，上去也有優先，很棒。
review_translated: This established hotel is well-managed, with everyone fulfilling their roles. The staff are both welcoming and professional. Breakfast on the rooftop was served quickly and was delicious, but the selection was limited due to the location. The hotel is in a great location, convenient for everything. The rooftop is beautiful for taking photos, and you get priority access, which is great.

review_text: 房間有免費升級到看植物園的景觀。樓頂泳池氛圍非常棒，地理位置很好，出行方便。酒店前台服務態度很好。
review_translated: The room was upgraded to a botanical garden view for free. The rooftop pool was wonderful, and the location was excellent for easy travel. The front desk service was excellent.

review_text:
設施：好
衞生：棒棒！
環境：棒棒棒！
服務：一級捧！
review_translated: Facilities: Good, Hygiene: Great! Environment: Great! Service: First-class!

room_type: Sands Premier Double Queen Gardens By The Bay View
review_text: 非常好的體驗，升級了家庭房，無敵景觀，來新加坡必住的酒店，房間還贈送了一對獅子小書包，對面就是植物園，非常方便。
review_translated: Very good experience, upgraded to a family room with an unbeatable view. It's a must-stay hotel in Singapore. The room also comes with a pair of lion backpacks. It's opposite the Botanical Gardens, which is very convenient.

review_text:
早餐好好吃，房間很大景色很好，員工服務都很熱情。步行通往濱海灣花園燈光秀值得一看，門前噴泉一般啦。
裝修風格略舊。無邊泳池人比較多。
review_translated: The breakfast was delicious, the room was spacious with a great view, and the staff were very friendly and helpful. The walk to the Gardens by the Bay light show is worth seeing, and the fountain in front of the entrance is just okay. The decor is a bit dated. The infinity pool was quite crowded.

review_text: 太舒服了！就是入住時間太晚了 4點才給我打電話可以入住
review_translated: It's so comfortable! But the check-in time is too late. They called me at 4 o'clock to let me check in.

review_text: 一流的酒店，一生值得住一次，房間面對花園，高樓層，漂亮，酒店泳池是大大的大亮點，可以呆一天，晚上也非常漂亮。
review_translated: A first-class hotel, worth staying in once in a lifetime. The room faces the garden, is on a high floor, and is beautiful. The hotel swimming pool is a big highlight. You can stay there for a whole day, and it is also very beautiful at night.

review_text: 第二次入住金沙、沒想到暑假那麼多人、第一次辦理入住還排隊、不過總體服務還是不錯的、樓頂的泳池也一如既往的好風景！
review_translated: This is my second time staying at Sands. I didn't expect there to be so many people during the summer vacation. I had to queue up to check in the first time, but the overall service was good, and the rooftop swimming pool had the same great view as always!

review_text: 房間不錯，窗外的風景也非常漂亮，存放行李，方便安全，服務人員態度很好，
review_translated: The room is nice, the view outside the window is also very beautiful, the luggage storage is convenient and safe, the service staff are very friendly,

review_text:
老牌酒店了
四處可見的綠植令人心情大好
review_translated: The old hotel is full of green plants that make you feel good.

review_text: 絕對是新加坡的地標，窗外景色一流，周邊全部都是網紅打卡地，旁邊植物園散散步，湖邊走一走，樓頂空中花園，無邊泳池超靚。房間設施還沒達到天花板，還有改善空間
review_translated: It is definitely a landmark in Singapore. The view from the window is first-class. The surrounding area is full of popular check-in spots. You can take a walk in the botanical garden next to it, walk by the lake, and the rooftop sky garden and infinity pool are super beautiful. The room facilities are not up to the ceiling, and there is room for improvement.

review_text: 太美了，房間乾淨整潔。服務也很好
review_translated: It's beautiful, the room is clean and tidy. The service is also very good

review_text: 非常慶幸選擇了這家酒店！前台服務熱情，房間視野開闊，城市一覽無餘。頂層的無邊泳池，令人心曠神怡，上面除了可以游泳休閑，還有三家餐廳，可以不出門就悠閑享受。不愧是地標性酒店，環境非常好！酒店對面就是著名的魚尾獅身像，大堂下面是個大商廈，富麗堂皇、奢侈品牌雲集、美食令郎滿目--第一次我感覺到選擇困難。大廈直通輕軌站，到牛車水唐人街三個站，到聖淘沙景點不到10站，非常便利。
review_translated: I'm so glad I chose this hotel! The front desk service was friendly, and the room had a stunning view of the city. The rooftop infinity pool was a delight, and besides relaxing, there were three restaurants, allowing you to relax without leaving the house. As expected of a landmark hotel, the ambiance was fantastic! Across from the hotel is the famous Merlion, and below the lobby is a large shopping mall, opulent, packed with luxury brands, and a wealth of delicious food—for the first time, I felt overwhelmed by the choice. The building is directly connected to the Light Rail (LRT), just three stops to Chinatown and less than 10 stops to Sentosa. It's incredibly convenient.

review_text: 交通發達，購物極其方便，各種美味佳餚都不錯，中餐稍微差一丟丟，一個字就是貴！三個字就是超級貴！景觀超一流，非常棒！
review_translated: Well-developed transportation, extremely convenient shopping, all kinds of delicious food are good, the Chinese food is a little bit worse, in one word, expensive! In three words, super expensive! The scenery is superb, very good!

review_text:
金沙酒店服務到位
衞生、環境、設施一流。
review_translated: The service at the Sands Hotel is excellent, and the sanitation, environment and facilities are first-class.

review_text: 位置很好找，周圍離著名的景點都很近，酒店服務好會華語的很多，能兑換外幣。樓下大商場和美食攤，購物吃飯都很方便。建議選高點的樓層，景色更美
review_translated: The location is easy to find, and it's close to famous attractions. The hotel service is good, many of the staff can speak Chinese, and they can exchange foreign currency. There's a large shopping mall and food stalls downstairs, making it very convenient for shopping and dining. I recommend choosing a higher floor for a better view.

review_text: 住金沙住的不是房間，而是一睹眼福的景觀，不論是新加坡海峽還是新加坡CBD,也或者是最美無邊泳池，總讓你有種相見恨晚的感覺！
review_translated: When you stay at the Sands, you don’t live in the room, but in the view. Whether it’s the Singapore Strait, Singapore CBD, or the most beautiful infinity pool, you will always feel that you haven’t seen it earlier!

review_text: 新裝修的房間 實至名歸 各方面服務都好到爆
review_translated: The newly renovated rooms are well-deserved and the service in all aspects is excellent.

review_text: 很滿意，服務和各種設施都很好，住的很放心。窗外正對着魚尾獅，風景很贊。頂樓無邊泳池水温剛好，水很乾凈。
review_translated: Very satisfied. The service and facilities were excellent, and I felt very safe staying here. The view from the window was stunning, facing the Merlion. The rooftop infinity pool was the perfect temperature, and the water was very clean.

review_text: 當屬新加坡最有特色的酒店了，空中泳池最受歡迎，每天都很多人，小孩子很喜歡，連續泡了三次，每天開到晚上11點非常不錯。
review_translated: It is undoubtedly the most distinctive hotel in Singapore. The sky swimming pool is the most popular one. There are many people every day. Children like it very much. We soaked in it three times in a row. It is open until 11pm every day, which is very nice.

review_text: 環境非常好，房間很大，泳池必打卡，附近逛街非常方便，酒店除了貴沒毛病，哈哈！
review_translated: The environment is very good, the rooms are very big, the swimming pool is a must-visit, and shopping nearby is very convenient. There is nothing wrong with the hotel except that it is expensive, haha!

review_text: 雖春節價格上漲，但絕不讓人失望的選擇，出照率超高，衹是57層早餐桌子對我這種身材高大來來説有點矮，況且無空調有點熱，但比一層人滿為患排長隊就餐要好
review_translated: Although the price increased during the Spring Festival, it is definitely a choice that will not disappoint you. The photo rate is very high. The only difference is that the breakfast table on the 57th floor is a bit short for a tall person like me, and it is a bit hot without air conditioning. But it is better than the crowded first floor with long queues for dining.

review_text: 風景優美  位置非常好 海景漂亮 食物美味
review_translated: Beautiful scenery, great location, beautiful sea view, delicious food

review_text: 環境不錯，服務也非常的不錯，位置特好，遊玩很方便，吃喝不錯，尤其打卡點也不錯，有點小問題，最後結帳時少找了錢
review_translated: The environment is good, the service is also very good, the location is very good, it is very convenient to play, the food and drink are good, especially the check-in point is also good, there is a small problem, the final checkout was short of money

review_text:
環境：非常好
服務：很滿意
設施：還可以
review_translated: Environment: Very good Service: Very satisfied Facilities: OK

review_text: 五年前來住過，但當時的裝修很普通，這次入住裝修過的房間，很漂亮，但價格就翻倍啦，天際泳池還是一如既往的靚，但真的很貴，衹敢住二晚，其他時間就改住便宜一點的酒店
review_translated: I stayed here five years ago, but the decoration was very ordinary. This time I stayed in a renovated room, which was very beautiful, but the price was doubled. The sky pool was still as beautiful as before, but it was really expensive. I only dared to stay for two nights and stayed in a cheaper hotel for the rest of the time.

review_text: 房間環境好，景觀好，對待小朋友非常友好
review_translated: The room is nice, the view is good, and it is very child-friendly

review_text: 非常不錯，給的房間也很好👍
review_translated: Very nice, the room was also very good👍

review_text: 絕對的王者，景色和環境就不説了，整個渡假區讓你沒有住酒店的感覺，就像在家一樣，有公園，有商場，有飯店，可以隨意的逛街，給人一種輕鬆而又歡快的感覺！
review_translated: The absolute king, not to mention the scenery and environment, the entire resort makes you feel like you are at home instead of staying in a hotel, with parks, shopping malls, restaurants, and you can go shopping at will, giving people a relaxed and cheerful feeling!

review_text: 住的49層天際房，房間很大 視野無敵，辦理入住後就可以先遊玩天空花園和無邊泳池。工作人員很熱情，不錯的體驗
review_translated: I stayed in a sky room on the 49th floor. The room was very large with an unbeatable view. After checking in, I could visit the sky garden and infinity pool. The staff were very welcoming and it was a good experience.

review_text: 房間非常大，在陽台就能看到下面的花園，絕美的海景，整個酒店內吃喝玩太好了，樓頂的無邊泳池看日落太美了！
review_translated: The room is very large, and you can see the garden below from the balcony. There is a beautiful sea view. The whole hotel is great for eating, drinking and playing. The sunset at the infinity pool on the roof is so beautiful!

review_text: 房間很大，設施齊全，免費的小茶點，飲品。位置超讚，灣景超美！定的灣景房免費升級成套房。海灣景色非常美！辦理入住，退房手續很快捷。
review_translated: The room was spacious, well-equipped, and included complimentary refreshments and drinks. The location was fantastic, and the bay view was stunning! We got a free upgrade from our bay-view room to a suite. The bay view was stunning! Check-in and check-out were quick and easy.

review_text: 到新加坡一定要體驗一下的金沙，連住了兩天，雖然價錢是貴，但旺季可以理解。酒店周邊風景優美，無邊泳池，小朋友超級喜歡，都不想走了！
review_translated: The Golden Sands is a must-see when visiting Singapore. I stayed there for two days. Although the price is expensive, it's understandable given the peak season. The hotel is surrounded by beautiful scenery and has an infinity pool. The kids loved it and didn't want to leave!

review_text: 感受非常好👌🏻頂層的無邊泳池體驗非常好，孩子玩不夠。
review_translated: The feeling is very good 👌🏻The infinity pool on the top floor is very good and the children can't play enough.

review_text: 非常滿意，值得入住
review_translated: Very satisfied, worth staying

review_text: 39層的房間 觀景效果非常好，晚上在房間窗台直接可以看到濱海灣的燈光秀.酒店服務很貼心，孩子生日送了個蛋糕
review_translated: The view from the room on the 39th floor is very good. At night, you can see the light show of Marina Bay directly from the window of the room. The hotel service is very considerate and a cake was given on the child's birthday.

review_text: 金沙是真的帥，奔着網紅無邊泳池去的，房間尚可，畢竟來住這個酒店的都奔着泳池去的吧，雖然5000出頭一晚的價格也是巨貴無比，但總體來説到了新加坡還是要住一晚金沙的
review_translated: The Sands is really cool. I went there for the internet-famous infinity pool. The room is okay. After all, most people who come to this hotel go there for the pool. Although the price of just over 5,000 a night is extremely expensive, I still have to stay at the Sands for a night when I come to Singapore.

review_text: 真的很值得
review_translated: It's really worth it

review_text: 超大超豪華，窗外的風景超讚，對面吃飯購物都特方便，晚上，在頂樓的無邊泳池看夜景超讚。兩個吃早餐的餐廳，人很多，頂樓的人相對少些，品中也相對少些，但景色很好👍
review_translated: It's super large and luxurious, the view outside the window is amazing, and it's very convenient to eat and shop across the street. At night, the night view from the infinity pool on the rooftop is amazing. There are many people in the two breakfast restaurants. There are relatively few people on the top floor and the middle floor, but the view is great👍

review_text: 前台服務員很熱情 （雖然忘記她的名字）主動介紹周邊景點 看我們倆娃 原來定的房間床太小 還幫忙升級房型 真是非常貼心 對酒店好感度瞬間飆升
review_translated: The front desk clerk was very enthusiastic (though I forgot her name). She took the initiative to introduce the surrounding attractions. Seeing that the bed in the room we originally booked was too small, she helped us upgrade the room type. It was very thoughtful and my favorability towards the hotel soared instantly.

review_text: 服務很不錯，交通方便
review_translated: Very good service and convenient transportation

review_text:
房間一般般，但外面的景色非常漂亮
早餐非常豐富
樓頂全球最大的無邊泳池，確實很適合拍照
在sands的商場還是有很多牌子
review_translated: The room was average, but the view outside was beautiful and the breakfast was very rich. The rooftop infinity pool, the world's largest, was really great for taking photos. There were many brands in the Sands shopping mall.

review_text: 網紅酒店，早餐很豐富。游泳池人太多，都是玩水拍照的。
review_translated: Internet celebrity hotel, the breakfast is very rich. The swimming pool is too crowded, all of them are playing in the water and taking pictures.

review_text: 環境超好，景色應該是新加坡最好的了，無邊泳池拍出來的照片很絕，配上那天的落日，很出片，很安靜，就是新加坡的管理有丶嚴格
review_translated: The environment is super good, the scenery is probably the best in Singapore, the photos taken by the infinity pool are amazing, coupled with the sunset that day, it is very photogenic, very quiet, but the management in Singapore is strict.

review_text: 物超所值，很滿意！
review_translated: Excellent value for money, very satisfied!

review_text: 環境美，地段好
review_translated: Beautiful environment, good location

review_text:
設施：非常不錯
衞生：乾淨
環境：完美
服務：非常好
review_translated: Facilities: Very good Hygiene: Clean Environment: Perfect Service: Very good

review_text: 老有名的渡假勝地了
review_translated: A famous old resort

review_text: 除了高級酒店的功能性，還兼顧了非常強的娛樂性。57層的無邊泳池會讓你覺得這個房費簡直物有所值！
review_translated: In addition to the functionality of a luxury hotel, it also offers a strong sense of entertainment. The infinity pool on the 57th floor will make you feel that the room rate is worth it!

review_text: 房間一般，服務確實很好，如果不是為了頂樓的無邊泳池，沒必要，一晚價格太高。早餐也是半自助的，種類比較少。
review_translated: The room was average, the service was really good, but if it weren't for the infinity pool on the rooftop, it wouldn't be necessary, the price per night was too high. The breakfast was also semi-buffet, with limited variety.

review_text: 新加坡金沙酒店，果然名不虛傳。頂級酒店了，屋頂泳池夜景無敵。房間給升級成了御匾套房。
review_translated: The Marina Bay Sands Singapore lives up to its reputation. It's a top-tier hotel, and the rooftop pool offers incredible night views. I was upgraded to a Royal Suite.

review_text: 吃東西，逛街都很方便，帶孩子去周邊玩也很方便，晚上看夜景散步都還蠻不錯的。住這裏訂海景房或者花園房都很有必要。
review_translated: It's very convenient to eat and shop, and it's also very convenient to take the children to play around. It's also very nice to take a walk at night to see the night view. It's necessary to book a sea view room or a garden room when staying here.

review_text: 誰能拒絕金沙酒店的無邊泳池，那是你來新加坡必去的地方。物超所值。除了貴沒毛病！
review_translated: Who can resist the infinity pool at the Marina Bay Sands? It's a must-see when you're in Singapore. Excellent value for money. Nothing wrong with it except the price!

review_text: 酒店大氣，房間寬敞明亮，酒店服務優質，市區景色優美，夜景更是迷人。早餐也很好，周邊各類名牌商店，總有一款適合你
review_translated: The hotel is spacious and bright, the hotel service is excellent, the city view is beautiful, and the night view is even more charming. The breakfast is also very good, and there are various brand-name stores around, there is always something suitable for you

review_text:
服務好
環境好
衞生好
review_translated: Good service, good environment and good hygiene

room_type: Sands Premier Double Queen City View Room
review_text: 房間環境翻新過，十分乾淨。環境不錯，樓頂無邊際是一絕。
review_translated: The room was renovated and very clean. The environment was great, and the endless view of the rooftop was a must.

review_text:
完美的不行不行
不想錯過
喜歡
下次還來
review_translated: Perfect, no, no, I don't want to miss it, I like it and will come again next time

review_text:
本以為會很舊了，住進去發現依舊保養的非常好！
孩子很喜歡，下次繼續！
review_translated: I thought it would be old, but after moving in, I found it was still very well maintained! My kids love it and I will definitely stay there next time!

review_text: 服務態度和設施無敵的好
review_translated: Excellent service and facilities

review_text: 位置絕佳，走路去濱海灣花園和魚尾獅都方便，又近，頂樓泳池更加沒得説，夜景絕美
review_translated: The location is excellent, it's convenient and close to the Gardens by the Bay and the Merlion. The rooftop swimming pool is even better, with a beautiful night view.

review_text: 金沙酒店真的是除了貴沒毛病，無敵巨樹景觀，早餐豐富，無邊泳池美極了，酒店服務也特別好，總之樣樣滿意，就是4k多的價格太高了。
review_translated: There is really nothing wrong with the Marina Bay Sands Hotel except that it is expensive. It has an unparalleled view of giant trees, a rich breakfast, a beautiful infinity pool, and excellent hotel service. In short, I am satisfied with everything. It’s just that the price of more than 4,000 is too high.

review_text: 還行，衹是人太多了，已經是旅遊打卡勝地了
review_translated: It's ok, but there are too many people. It has become a tourist attraction.

review_text: 這次住新加坡金沙酒店非常滿意，酒店服務人員彬彬有禮，服務周到，主動幫助提取行李送到房間，還幫我們升級了房間。
review_translated: I was very satisfied with my stay at the Marina Bay Sands Singapore this time. The hotel staff were polite and attentive. They took the initiative to help us pick up our luggage and deliver it to our room, and even helped us upgrade our room.

review_text: 非常滿意，酒店服務非常周到，到店就有人幫忙拿行李。酒店房間設備也非常新一點都不想很老的酒店，來這裏度假非常滿意。
review_translated: Very satisfied, the hotel service is very thoughtful, someone helped with the luggage when I arrived. The hotel room facilities are also very new and don't look like an old hotel at all. I am very satisfied with my vacation here.

review_text: 這次給免費升級了房型，高樓層，房間景色一流，房裝修新設施齊全，體驗感很好
review_translated: This time I was given a free room upgrade. The room was on a high floor with a great view. The room was newly decorated and fully equipped. The experience was great.

review_text:
豪華
衞生：棒
環境：amazing
review_translated: Luxurious hygiene: good environment: amazing

review_text: 服務真的太好了旁邊是商場
review_translated: The service is really great. There is a shopping mall next to it.

review_text: 房間乾淨整潔、環境優美、購物方便，下次還會入住
review_translated: The room is clean and tidy, the environment is beautiful, and shopping is convenient. I will stay here again next time

review_text: 港灣景觀房間最近有施工，如果白天要在酒店睡覺的人一定要慎重，施工的時候電鑽噪音比較嚴重，除了這個，沒什麼缺點
review_translated: There has been construction work in the harbour view rooms recently. If you want to sleep in the hotel during the day, be careful. The electric drill noise is quite severe during the construction. Apart from this, there are no other disadvantages.

review_text: 氛圍超讚，泳池視野絕了，下次一定再來
review_translated: The atmosphere is great, the view of the swimming pool is amazing, I will definitely come again next time

review_text: 房子很大，衞生不錯。新加坡值得去的地方都在周邊，非常便捷
review_translated: The house is large and clean. All the places worth visiting in Singapore are nearby, very convenient

review_text: 環境不錯，體驗很好，服務也不錯，泳池很有感覺
review_translated: Nice environment, good experience, good service, and the swimming pool is great

review_text: 新加坡不二選擇！
review_translated: Singapore is the only choice!

review_text: 房間非常乾淨舒適，因為有陽台，早上起來坐陽台上喝茶感覺太滿足了。酒店設施齊全，聯着百貨大樓，世界一流大牌幾乎都能找到，晚上樓預的無邊泳池，城市美景一覽無餘。
review_translated: The room was very clean and comfortable. The balcony was perfect for sipping tea in the morning. The hotel is well-equipped and connected to a department store, so you can find almost any world-class brand. At night, the infinity pool on the upper floor offers sweeping views of the city.

review_text: 非常好的體驗，就是入住時間較晚，但酒店還是提前辦理了類似通行卡可以先去樓頂泳池玩
review_translated: Very good experience, although the check-in time was late, but the hotel still handled a similar pass in advance so that we could go to the rooftop swimming pool first

review_text: 堪稱完美，服務非常周到 設施完備 周邊環境舒適優美 商品品牌齊全 可以及時積分 客人感覺很便利！
review_translated: It's perfect, the service is very thoughtful, the facilities are complete, the surrounding environment is comfortable and beautiful, the product brands are complete, and guests can earn points in time, which is very convenient!

review_text: 購物非常方便，那無邊泳池也很贊，唯一不足就是設施實在有點舊了，在房間陽台盡攬植物園，晚上的夜景超讚。
review_translated: Shopping is very convenient, and the infinity pool is also great. The only drawback is that the facilities are a bit old. The balcony in the room overlooks the botanical garden, and the night view is amazing.

review_text: 非常滿意！
review_translated: Very satisfied!

review_text: 新加坡地標性酒店，2次出遊，2次入住，一如既往的服務好，環境好
review_translated: Singapore's landmark hotel, 2 trips, 2 stays, as always good service, good environment

review_text: 風景很好， 早餐各方面也很好，泳池沒得説，下樓就是商場，除了價格貴一點，節假日下面人有點多其他沒缺點
review_translated: The view is great, the breakfast is also very good, the swimming pool is excellent, and there is a shopping mall downstairs. Except for the price being a little high and the fact that there are a lot of people down there during holidays, there are no other disadvantages.

review_text: 新加坡標誌性建築 網紅打卡點 無邊框泳池太棒了
review_translated: Singapore's iconic landmark, the borderless swimming pool, is amazing!

review_text:
對此次入住非常滿意。
下午3點入住，可能因為我們預訂的房型沒有出來空房，等了有10多分鐘後，前台小姐姐給主動升級了豪華大套房，衹比頂層低了兩層。

這個房型面朝大海，有兩個房間，一個大客廳，一個睡房，都有陽台，雖然陽台外面很穿窄，但站一個上去，吹吹海風，欣賞一下一覽無垠的大海還是相當愜意的。
衞生間也非常大，還有專門的穿衣間。

下午17點左右，還有專門的服務員，説是提供夜床服務，給過來專門拉窗簾和鋪床，這大概是頂級酒店的待遇。

冰箱裏有免費的堅果零食，還有水果汁，免費的瓶裝水，這個瓶裝水不知道什麼牌子，入口很好喝，沒有了還可以繼續要，仍給免費提供。
也有各種咖啡和茶點。

無邊泳池非常好，，我們入住這天天氣晴朗，安頓好了正值傍晚時分，所以趴在泳池邊上，記錄了整個落日的全過程。
早上，在房間就可以欣賞到海上的日出，新加坡臨近赤道，晝夜平分，7點多太陽才出來，不用起很早就可以在房間看到海上的日出。
但如果想要景觀更遼闊一些，還是要上到57樓的頂樓去看日出，我是在房間看了一會，又跑到頂樓去看了，這邊的泳池早上6點就開放了，我上去時已經有不少人在水裡泡着欣賞早上的美景了。

相比下來，我還是更喜歡早上海上日出的景像，三三兩兩的漁船擱置在平靜的海面上，金色澄澈的陽光灑滿整個海平面，火紅的太陽在海平面冉冉升起，非常美麗。

金沙酒店雖然是貴了一些，但其本身就是一大景點，還是值得揮霍一晚。
review_translated: I was very satisfied with my stay. We checked in at 3 PM. Perhaps because our reserved room type wasn't available, after waiting for over 10 minutes, the receptionist proactively upgraded us to a deluxe suite, just two floors below the top floor. This ocean-facing room has two rooms: a large living room and a bedroom, both with balconies. Although narrow, it was quite pleasant to stand on one, enjoy the sea breeze, and admire the endless ocean views. The bathroom was also very large, and there was a dedicated dressing room. Around 5 PM, a dedicated attendant arrived to offer turndown service, drawing the curtains and making the bed—perfect amenities expected of a top-tier hotel. The refrigerator contained complimentary nuts, fruit juice, and free bottled water. I don't know the brand, but it was delicious. If it ran out, we could always request more, and they would provide it. There was also a variety of coffee and tea options. The infinity pool was fantastic. The weather was beautiful the day we checked in, and after settling in, it was dusk, so I spent the evening by the poolside, capturing the entire sunset. In the morning, you can enjoy the sunrise over the sea from your room. Singapore is near the equator, so the sun doesn't rise until after 7 a.m., so you can watch it from your room without getting up too early. However, for a more expansive view, you'll want to go up to the 57th floor rooftop. I watched it from my room for a while, then went up to the rooftop. The swimming pool opens at 6 a.m., and when I got there, quite a few people were already enjoying the morning view. I preferred the sunrise over the sea in the morning. Fishing boats were stranded on the calm sea, the golden sunlight bathed the horizon, and the fiery red sun rose slowly above the water. It was truly beautiful. While the Marina Bay Sands is a bit pricey, it's a major attraction in itself and well worth the splurge for a night.

review_text: 非常非常滿意！冬天找機會再過來！
review_translated: Very, very satisfied! I'll come back in the winter!

review_text: 通過攜程，旅行很行！
review_translated: Traveling is great through Ctrip!

review_text: 這個酒店位置太棒啦，植物園都景點都特別近，還有57樓的無邊泳池，風景超級贊，下次帶孩子再去住。
review_translated: The location of this hotel is amazing. It's very close to the botanical gardens and other tourist attractions. There's also an infinity pool on the 57th floor with amazing views. I'd definitely stay there again with my kids next time.

review_text: 這個酒店除了位置好以外，其他與5星級酒店差的太多了，比起我們國家的差太多了。
review_translated: Apart from its good location, this hotel is far inferior to 5-star hotels and much worse than those in our country.

review_text: 夜景很好，其他都很普通，服務為0
review_translated: The night view is good, everything else is average, the service is 0

review_text: 房間視野非常棒
review_translated: The room view is great

review_text: 雖然酒店比較老了，但床品是可以換的。沒想到這麼貴的酒店床墊會凹陷，連睡幾晚腰疼，枕頭也不舒服，衹能看在無邊泳池和購物便利的份上給它加點分，不過話説回來，現在無邊泳池也舊了，真的對不起這個房費。下次應該不會再住了。
review_translated: Although the hotel is older, the bedding could be replaced. I didn't expect such an expensive hotel to have a sagging mattress. My back ached after a few nights, and the pillows were uncomfortable. I can only give it a few points for the infinity pool and the proximity to shopping. But then again, the infinity pool is old now, and the room rate is really not worth it. I probably won't stay here again.

review_text: 很多年前來住過一次，房間翻新過，新加坡地標，朋友強烈要求一定要來體驗一次。整體都滿意
review_translated: I stayed here once many years ago. The room was renovated. It is a landmark of Singapore. My friends strongly suggested that I come here to experience it. I am satisfied with it overall.

review_text: 酒店最後一天又收信用卡4600多新元房費。我一次性付了攜程的。明天要與酒店交涉。
review_translated: On our last day, the hotel charged my credit card over 4,600 Singapore dollars for the room. I paid the full amount through Ctrip. I will be negotiating with the hotel tomorrow.

review_text: 酒店景觀非常棒，服務也比較周到
review_translated: The hotel has a great view and the service is quite thoughtful

review_text: 我們是提前一個月預訂的花園房間，入住登記的時候，前台服務人員明顯區別對待，別的接待客人check in就幾分鐘，這邊的一直拖延，我們站了快一小時，前台居然説給我們換城市房間，我們當然拒絕！一會又來一個人，1分鐘辦理完入住，你説這是什麼服務！
review_translated: We booked a garden room a month in advance. When we checked in, the front desk staff treated us differently. While other guests only checked in a few minutes, ours dragged on. We stood there for almost an hour. The front desk staff even offered to switch us to a city room, which we refused. A short while later, another person came in and checked us in in just one minute. What kind of service is that?

review_text: 環境非常不錯的一家酒店
review_translated: A hotel with a very nice environment

review_text: 非常值得入住的酒店，景色非常美
review_translated: Very worthwhile hotel to stay in, the scenery is very beautiful

review_text:
設施：設施完善
衞生：整潔清爽
環境：安靜舒適
服務：貼心細緻
總體感覺很好，舒心的住宿體驗，下次出差旅行首選的酒店，非常好，強烈推薦！
review_translated: Facilities: Complete facilities, Hygiene: Clean and fresh, Environment: Quiet and comfortable, Service: Intimate and meticulous, The overall feeling is very good, comfortable accommodation experience, the hotel is the first choice for the next business trip, very good, highly recommended!

review_text: 非常好的體驗，與朋友一起來遊玩
review_translated: Very good experience, come and play with friends

room_type: Sands Premier King Gardens By The Bay View
review_text: 酒店很好，適合度假，超愛的，以後還來呀呀呀呀呀哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈
review_translated: The hotel is very good, suitable for vacation, I love it, I will come again in the future hahahahahahahahahahaha

review_text: 這個價格給住個2樓，挨着馬路很吵，好不容易溝通很久換了五樓，2點後入住十一點要退房，如果這個價格住新裝修30樓以上還可以考慮！入住這個酒店攜程沒優勢
review_translated: For this price, I was given a room on the 2nd floor, which was next to the road and very noisy. After a long negotiation, I was finally moved to the 5th floor. I checked in after 2 pm and had to check out at 11 pm. If I could stay on the newly renovated 30th floor or above at this price, I would consider it! Ctrip has no advantage in staying in this hotel.

review_text: 酒店外觀是真的奢華，在房間可以看見獅子吐水，但是房間設施真的一般，畢竟5***價格，感受過住過就可以。但是真的不值得多住但是服務真的一般，談不上服務可言，我訂的是濱海景觀，硬性給我城市景觀的，並且5點多才給我房間。不過入住人太多，算了，酒店57樓的無邊泳池很長達150米，基本在拍照，游水的我是奇葩。另外一邊可以看見馬六甲海峽，曬曬太陽還是不錯的。不過人太多，好像旅遊景點，我覺得不太適合親子。酒店樓下就是MRT.去牛車水就2-3個站，想去試試天天海南雞，建議坐腙色線到MAXWELL站，一出站左邊就是天天海南雞。確實好吃，但是要排長龍，並且沒有空調，有風扇。對面就是什麼寺。
review_translated: The hotel's exterior is truly luxurious, and you can see the Lion's Spit from your room, but the amenities are quite average. After all, for a 5* price, you should experience it once and stay there. It's not worth staying longer, and the service is truly average. I booked a waterfront view, but they insisted on a city view, and I wasn't given a room until after 5:00. However, there were so many people checking in, so forget it. The infinity pool on the 57th floor is a whopping 150 meters long, and most people were taking photos. I was the only one swimming. On the other side, you can see the Strait of Malacca, which is nice for soaking up the sun. However, it was so crowded, like a tourist attraction, that I don't think it's suitable for families. The hotel is right downstairs from the MRT, just two or three stops from Chinatown. I'd like to try Tiantian Hainan Chicken, so I recommend taking the MAXWELL Line to the station. Tiantian Hainan Chicken is on the left as soon as you exit. It's delicious, but there's a long line, and there's no air conditioning, just fans. There's a temple across the street.

review_text: 一切都還可以，不過性價比不高，相反的是我住過性價比最低的酒店，沒有之一
review_translated: Everything is OK, but the price/performance ratio is not high. On the contrary, it is the hotel with the lowest price/performance ratio that I have ever stayed in.

review_text: 很漂亮的酒店，符合網紅標準
review_translated: Very beautiful hotel, in line with the standards of Internet celebrities

review_text: 地標，必須體驗，但如果是碰上展會或什麼重要節日，就真的太多人了。
review_translated: It's a landmark and a must-see, but if it's during an exhibition or an important festival, there will be too many people.

review_text: 環境非常好，出行也方便！唯一早餐人太多，排隊時間比較長。
review_translated: The environment is very good and it is convenient to travel! The only problem is that there are too many people at breakfast and the queue is quite long.

review_text: 房間設定比較陳舊，吹風機電線的外包都有裸露，和之前入住金沙比感受不佳，這次入住20層，發現貌似陽台往裡縮進，導致房間很小，陽台的椅子和枱子也比較臟，比較失望的。但是酒店服務還是很優秀的。
review_translated: The room was quite dated, with the hair dryer cord exposed, which was a disappointing experience compared to my previous stay at Sands. This time, I stayed on the 20th floor and noticed the balcony seemed to be recessed, making the room very small. The balcony chairs and table were also quite dirty, which was quite disappointing. However, the hotel service was excellent.

review_text: 除了游泳池都泛善可陳，設施老舊，還碰到門鎖沒電了，進不了房間，前前後後修了一個小時，酒店也沒有任何錶示。晚飯前在游泳池看看落日還是不錯的，偶有雲霧繚繞。第二天早上暴雨，樓頂都不開了。
review_translated: Aside from the swimming pool, everything else was just okay. The facilities were old, and the door lock had a dead battery, preventing me from getting into my room. I spent an hour trying to fix it, but the hotel didn't respond. Watching the sunset from the pool before dinner was quite nice, with occasional clouds and mist. The next morning, there was a heavy rainstorm, and the rooftop was closed.

review_text: 服務非常滿意，特別是晚上送餐到房間，連餐桌都送來了，餐桌上還擺的有小花盆，特別温馨！
review_translated: The service was very satisfactory, especially the evening meal delivery to the room. They even brought a dining table with small flower pots on it, which was very warm!

review_text: 很滿意地理位置，環境。希望多增加會中文服務的員工。服務很貼心。
review_translated: Very satisfied with the location and environment. I hope to have more Chinese-speaking staff. The service is very considerate.

review_text: 酒店環境非常好，吃喝玩樂都搞定👍
review_translated: The hotel environment is very good, eating, drinking and having fun are all available👍

review_text: 最方便的酒店，房間很大，服務很贊，購物風景美食集齊一身，到哪都方便
review_translated: The most convenient hotel, with large rooms, great service, and a great shopping, scenery, and food all in one, making it convenient to get around.

review_text: 房間比較大，景色優美，但是第二天下雨，遺憾沒去游泳。酒店在裝修，偶爾可以聽見施工聲音。
review_translated: The room was quite large and had a nice view, but it rained on the second day so I didn't go swimming. The hotel was under renovation and you could occasionally hear construction noise.

room_type: Paiza Premier Suite King City View
review_text: 非常好👍👍
review_translated: Very good 👍👍

room_type: Sands Premier Double Queen Gardens By The Bay View
review_text: 房間燈壞了，晚上關不上影響休息和心情。座機電話上全是油脂灰層。
review_translated: The light in the room was broken and I couldn't turn it off at night, which affected my rest and mood. The landline phone was covered in grease and dust.

review_text: 房間很好，非常值得入住，不管是硬件還是服務都非常不錯，比東方文華強的不是一點啊！
review_translated: The room is very good and worth staying in. Both the hardware and the service are very good, much better than the Mandarin Oriental!

review_text: 房間比較老舊，但是好在服務佳，位置優越。可以滿足各種需求。超級方便。強烈推薦。
review_translated: The rooms are a bit dated, but the service is excellent and the location is great. It meets all your needs and is super convenient. Highly recommended.

review_text: 洗漱用品都是菲拉格慕的，居住體驗還不錯
review_translated: The toiletries are all from Ferragamo, and the living experience is pretty good.

review_text: 酒店還是蠻好的，就是人太多了。
review_translated: The hotel is pretty good, but it's too crowded.

review_text: 很不錯，出行也很方便
review_translated: Very good, very convenient for travel

review_text: 頂層泳池超chill
review_translated: The rooftop pool is super chill

review_text: 這次的體驗非常差！之前每次去新加坡都要住在金沙。這次到後沒有房間，一直等到差不多六點鐘才辦好入住，而且樓層給的超級低（三樓）。可能是因為人太多了，服務也一般。下次不會再住了，因為已經住過多次，不需要再體驗，住的是環境和服務！
review_translated: This experience was absolutely terrible! I always stay at the Sands every time I visit Singapore. This time, there were no rooms available. I had to wait until almost 6:00 PM to check in, and the floor I was given was incredibly low (the third floor). It might have been because there were so many people, but the service was also average. I won't stay there again, as I've been there many times and don't need to experience it again. I live for the environment and service!

review_text:
設施：很完整
衞生：很乾凈
環境：很不錯
服務：很好
review_translated: Facilities: Very complete Hygiene: Very clean Environment: Very good Service: Very good

review_text: 很滿意，前台客服很熱情，主動升級房間，頂樓空中花園景觀很好，無邊泳池很棒
review_translated: Very satisfied, the front desk customer service was very enthusiastic and took the initiative to upgrade the room. The rooftop sky garden has a great view and the infinity pool is great

review_text: 泳池確實不錯，就是華人太多了秩序亂，服務好。但也架不住華人太多過來參觀的人多。沒辦法。不過景色真好哈哈哈。特別喜歡泡池。
review_translated: The pool is really nice, but there are too many Chinese people, which makes it messy. The service is good, but it can't handle the large number of Chinese people visiting. It can't be helped. The view is beautiful, though, hahaha. I really enjoyed the pool.

review_text: 第二次來新加坡依然選擇金沙酒店，服務特別好，還給我升級了房間！贊👍👍👍
review_translated: The second time I came to Singapore, I still chose the Marina Bay Sands. The service was excellent and they even upgraded my room! Great!

review_text: 因為有點發燒生病和酒店協調延遲到2點退房，酒店説不可以，説加費用都不可以，人性在哪裡？
review_translated: Because I was sick with a slight fever, I asked the hotel to postpone my check-out to 2 o'clock. The hotel said no, and said they would charge an additional fee. Where is the humanity?

review_text: 淋浴房的花灑全部在2米左右高度是固定的，沒有手持花灑，這對於幼兒洗澡來説特別不方便，前台説所有房型都是如此，也無語了。
review_translated: The shower heads in the shower room are all fixed at a height of about 2 meters, and there is no handheld shower head, which is particularly inconvenient for young children to bathe. The front desk said that all room types are like this, and I was speechless.

review_text: 早餐非常值得，泳池風景很棒，客房已經翻新都很好，房間還有咖啡機，零食免費。雖然價位不低，但是值得體驗一下
review_translated: The breakfast is worth it, the pool view is great, the rooms have been renovated and are very good, there is also a coffee machine in the room, and snacks are free. Although the price is not low, it is worth experiencing

review_text: 酒店前台很好給做了升級成套房，夜景非常美，房間設施也很新，很嗲
review_translated: The hotel front desk was very good and upgraded to a suite. The night view was very beautiful and the room facilities were also very new.

review_text: 位置環境很好，酒店早餐巨贊，頂層露天泳池無敵，客房面積大，裝修太老，中規中矩，舊版的皇冠假日的即視感
review_translated: The location is great, the hotel breakfast is amazing, the rooftop outdoor pool is incredible, the rooms are large, but the decoration is old and standard, giving it the look of an old Crowne Plaza.

review_text: 相當不錯，服務周到，設施齊全，尤其是屋頂泳池，太有特色了！
review_translated: Very good, attentive service, complete facilities, especially the rooftop swimming pool, so unique!

review_text: 世界名店，名不虛傳！就一個豪，就一個貴，貴就對了，能連續住幾天的人。也是裝到了。
review_translated: This world-famous hotel lives up to its reputation! It's luxurious, expensive, and that's why it's so expensive. Anyone who can stay here for several days straight is definitely looking impressive.

review_text:
附近好玩的挺多哈哈哈
很喜歡頂樓的泳池 安保做得也挺好
review_translated: There are a lot of fun things to do nearby. Hahaha. I like the swimming pool on the rooftop and the security is also very good.

review_text:
2大2小，帶孩子們的出遊，好，好，好
非常好！
到底是地標，就是不一樣
review_translated: 2 adults and 2 children, a great trip with the kids, great, great, great! After all, it's a landmark, it's different

review_text: 酒店除了坐享獨一無二的地標建築之外，其他的很一般。
review_translated: Apart from being a unique landmark building, the hotel is pretty average.

review_text: 風景很好，房間也很好，電視機很大，無邊泳池非常好看
review_translated: The view is great, the room is nice, the TV is big, and the infinity pool is beautiful

review_text: 一共定了兩個房間，房間比較大風景也很美，特別頂樓的無邊際泳池！早餐時間可以從頂樓欣賞一下海景，雖然有點貴，但是旅遊總也的嘗試嘗試！
review_translated: We booked two rooms in total. The rooms are quite large and the views are beautiful, especially the infinity pool on the rooftop! You can enjoy the sea view from the rooftop during breakfast. Although it is a bit expensive, it is always worth trying when traveling!

review_text: 很不錯，來新加坡金沙應該是最好的選擇，預算夠的話
review_translated: Very good, coming to Singapore Sands should be the best choice if the budget is enough
Facilities: Good Hygiene: Very good Environment: OK Service: 66666666666666666666666666666666666666666666666

review_text: USB插口這麼多，這麼高級酒店客户要求充電線，一條也沒辦法給。
review_translated: There are so many USB ports in such a high-end hotel, and the customers asked for charging cables, but we couldn’t provide them with even one.

review_text: 環境是沒話説，風景是真的美，地點和位置也是很好的地方，值得推薦和收藏，房間設施舒適，是新加坡的不二之選
review_translated: The environment is amazing, the scenery is really beautiful, the location and position are also very good, it is worth recommending and collecting, the room facilities are comfortable, it is the best choice in Singapore

review_text: 景色特別好，服務很貼心，辦理入住隊伍稍微有點長的時候，前面就幾個人，就把我請到邊上的房間單獨辦理入住了。退房特別方便，直接卡扔到電梯口的退房機器裏。酒店和商場連在一起，逛街也很方便。
review_translated: The view was stunning, and the service was attentive. When the check-in line was a little long, there were only a few people ahead of me, so they invited me to a nearby room for a private check-in. Check-out was incredibly convenient; I simply dropped my card into the check-out machine at the elevator entrance. The hotel is connected to a shopping mall, making it convenient for shopping.

review_text: 房間的景觀很美，正好既能看到樓下的燈光秀，也能看到海港。樓頂的泳池夜景特別美，可惜水不是很乾凈，可能是人太多了，維持不了乾淨的水吧。樓下有吃的，很方便。
review_translated: The view from the room was beautiful, perfect for both the light show downstairs and the harbor. The rooftop pool was especially beautiful at night, though the water wasn't very clean. Perhaps it was too crowded and couldn't maintain cleanliness. There were food options downstairs, which was very convenient.

room_type: Sands Premier Double Queen Gardens By The Bay View
review_text: 奢華，房間非常大，無敵海景，入住退房都很體貼，頂層無邊泳池非常棒！tower 2 頂層的 早餐服務也是棒極了。
review_translated: Luxurious, very large room, unbeatable sea view, very considerate check-in and check-out, the rooftop infinity pool is amazing! The breakfast service on the top floor of Tower 2 is also great.

review_text: 方便偏小了點，沒有浴缸，是意料之外的，不過可以瞭解，總體還是不錯的，房間設計感很好，其他功能都還不錯
review_translated: The room is a bit small and there is no bathtub, which is unexpected, but I understand. Overall it is good. The room design is very good and other functions are also good.

review_text: 長輩們去旅遊，定了三晚，住的非常安逸，説是比金沙好
review_translated: The elders went on a trip and booked three nights. They stayed very comfortably and said it was better than Sands.

review_text: 金沙一如既往的好，衹要預算夠閉眼入
review_translated: Sands is as good as ever, as long as the budget is enough, you can go there

review_text: 入住體驗一般
review_translated: Average stay experience

review_text: 總體滿意，不過在早餐廳的服務一般，點個咖啡，服務員都能忘記。再次提醒要冰的，端上來熱的。
review_translated: Overall, I was satisfied, but the service in the breakfast room was average. The waiter even forgot to order coffee. I asked for iced coffee, but it was served hot.

review_text: 雖然貴，但是平均在遊、購、吃、住、行中就不貴了。
review_translated: Although it is expensive, it is not expensive when compared with the average cost of sightseeing, shopping, food, accommodation and transportation.

review_text: 非常的不錯，下次來還是會繼續入住金沙酒店
review_translated: Very good, I will continue to stay at the Sands Hotel next time

review_text: 這是非常完美的住宿體驗，在五星級裏體驗過最好的酒店服務了。硬件很好，服務非常貼心，kiki 仇經理和所有工作人員都非常細心，幫我免費升級海景房，真的非常感謝!酒店地理位置很好，特別優美，景觀很好，早餐出品很棒，健身房設施也還⻬全。續住房間依然仇經理可以快速且温潤的幫忙更新房卡，很愉快的一次住宿體驗，，員工培訓的非常到位!以後還會再來滴。
review_translated: This was a truly wonderful stay, the best service I've ever experienced in a five-star hotel. The facilities were excellent, and the service was incredibly attentive. Manager Kiki Qiu and the entire staff were incredibly attentive, even upgrading me to a sea view room free of charge. Thank you so much! The hotel is in a fantastic location, with a beautiful view, excellent breakfast, and a fully equipped gym. When I extended my stay, Manager Qiu was still quick and helpful in updating my room card. It was a truly enjoyable stay, and the staff training was excellent! I'll definitely be back.

room_type: Sands Premier King Gardens By The Bay View
review_text: 服務很周到，衞生棒棒噠，設施很完善，交通很便利，總體很滿意
review_translated: The service is very thoughtful, the hygiene is great, the facilities are complete, the transportation is very convenient, and I am generally satisfied

review_text:
這酒店不用説也知道，新加坡的標誌性建築，非常不錯，暑期價格也是非常高，下次應該還會入住該酒店
成人早餐:不錯。孩子很喜歡
review_translated: This hotel is well-known, Singapore's landmark building, very nice, the summer price is also very high, next time I will stay in this hotel adult breakfast: good. The children like it very much

review_text: 暑假帶小朋友一起去的酒店 暑假的價格水漲船高 定的有點晚了 安排的房間在一樓 比較吵 後來和酒店溝通了 然後也提出換房間
review_translated: I took my kids to a hotel during the summer vacation. The prices were very high during the summer vacation. I booked a little late and was given a room on the first floor. It was quite noisy. I later discussed it with the hotel and asked to change rooms.

review_text: 酒店周邊環境與地理位置都不錯，沒得挑，前台也有中文服務。
review_translated: The hotel's surroundings and location are both good, nothing to complain about, and there is also Chinese service at the front desk.

review_text: 房間很寬敞 前台服務熱情周到 頂樓無邊泳池太美了
review_translated: The room is spacious. The front desk service is warm and thoughtful. The rooftop infinity pool is beautiful.

review_text: 房間設施還可以，跟國內酒店1000多的差不多，沒有浴缸，主要是樓頂無邊泳池不錯，帶孩子來是一定要來的，全球最大的無邊泳池，
review_translated: The room facilities are OK, similar to those in domestic hotels over 1,000 yuan. There is no bathtub, but the rooftop infinity pool is nice. It is a must-see if you bring your children. It is the largest infinity pool in the world.

review_text: 整體滿意 服務很貼心 就是丟了比較貴重的東西在泳池 酒店還是要加強下監管 畢竟全世界最貴的酒店就該確保可以有能力找到客户的丟失物品
review_translated: Overall, I was satisfied with the service. The only problem was that I lost something valuable near the pool. The hotel needs to strengthen supervision. After all, the most expensive hotel in the world should ensure that it can find customers' lost items.

room_type: Sands Premier Double Queen Gardens By The Bay View
review_text: 硬件不錯，小酒吧免費的食物多一些就更加對得起這個價格了
review_translated: The hardware is good, and the price would be more justified if there were more free food in the small bar

review_text: Tower3除了房間內部設施老了一點其他都很滿意，尤其服務很耐心很親切！
review_translated: Tower 3 is very satisfactory except for the old facilities in the room. The service is very patient and friendly!

review_text: 泳池環境很好 房間不太大 但是有貼心的免費飲料提供 退房時間有點早 11點就要退房了
review_translated: The pool is nice. The room is not very big, but there are free drinks provided. Check-out time is a bit early, as we have to check out at 11 o'clock.

review_text: 金沙酒店配套設施齊全 出行方便 旁邊的商場餐飲行業齊全 頂層的無限泳池也是太好看啦 簡直美不勝收 有機會大家一定要去體驗一次
review_translated: The Sands Hotel has complete supporting facilities and is convenient for transportation. The nearby shopping malls and restaurants are well-equipped. The infinity pool on the top floor is also very beautiful. If you have the chance, you must experience it once.

review_text: 在新加坡最滿意的酒店之一，住的新裝修的樓，沒有味道，連裝飾品都很精緻，喜歡。視野很開闊，一眼就能看見濱海花園
review_translated: One of the most satisfying hotels in Singapore. The newly renovated building I stayed in has no smell and even the decorations are very exquisite. I like it. The view is very wide and you can see the Gardens by the Sea at a glance.

review_text: 除了57樓景無敵，其他就那樣吧。主要人實在太多了
review_translated: Except for the invincible view on the 57th floor, the rest is just like that. There are too many people.

review_text: 服務很一般 幫我處理問題説回電話直接沒有回
review_translated: The service was average. They helped me solve the problem and said they would call me back, but they didn't.

review_text: 辦理入住沒到三點，酒店方提供了臨時卡，可以到57層去，用臨時卡上去，去時陽光燦爛，可惜沒帶泳衣！三點辦入住，下起了大雨，放晴後，在無邊泳池游泳有點冷！幸好酒店讓提前上去了，57層觀濱海灣，美景盡收眼裡！
review_translated: Check-in wasn't until 3:00 AM, so the hotel provided a temporary pass that allowed us to go up to the 57th floor. It was sunny when we arrived, but unfortunately, I didn't bring my swimsuit! Check-in was at 3:00 AM, and it started to rain heavily. When it cleared up, it was a bit cold to swim in the infinity pool! Luckily, the hotel let us go up early, and we were treated to a breathtaking view of Marina Bay from the 57th floor!

review_text: 不愧是金沙！給我們升級了家庭房，超級好的服務和房間。
review_translated: As expected of Sands! We were upgraded to a family room, with superb service and room.

review_text: 其他體驗感覺都好，唯一就是辦理入住時間的等待太長了，不滿意！曾入住其他國家酒店，大多五星級酒店都是秒入住。
review_translated: The other aspects of the experience were good, except for the long check-in time. I was not satisfied with it. I have stayed in hotels in other countries before, and most five-star hotels allow you to check in within seconds.

review_text: 房間很大，好像少了一套沙發，酒店服務設施，人員態度非常好👍
review_translated: The room is very big, but it seems to be missing a sofa. The hotel service facilities and staff attitude are very good👍

review_text: 一次美好的回憶，值得再次入住～～～
review_translated: A wonderful memory, worth staying again~~~

review_text: 房間寬大舒適，樓頂無邊泳池超棒，非常適合帶小朋友
review_translated: The room is spacious and comfortable, and the rooftop infinity pool is great, perfect for bringing children

review_text:
設施：不錯
衞生：不錯
環境：很好
服務：很好
review_translated: Facilities: Good Hygiene: Good Environment: Very good Service: Very good

review_text: 從房間的窗户看到的夜景很美
review_translated: The night view from the room window is beautiful

review_text:
設施：還行
衞生：可以
環境：很好
服務：很好
review_translated: Facilities: OK Hygiene: OK Environment: Very good Service: Very good

review_text: 性價比不高，住一晚上體驗下可以，去購物中心和藝術中心很方便。前台有中文翻譯。
review_translated: The price/performance ratio is not high, but it is ok to stay for one night to experience it. It is very convenient to go to the shopping mall and art center. There is a Chinese interpreter at the front desk.

review_text: 窗外風景特別漂亮，正對着濱海灣花園
review_translated: The view outside the window is very beautiful, facing the Gardens by the Bay

review_text: 名不虛傳，風景一流；服務周到，周邊購物、遊玩都非常方便。
review_translated: The hotel is well-deserved of its reputation, with first-class scenery, considerate service, and convenient shopping and sightseeing in the surrounding area.

review_text: 服務滿意，但二樓房間太吵，晚上都沒辦法入睡。
review_translated: The service was satisfactory, but the room on the second floor was too noisy and I couldn't sleep at night.

review_text: 服務到位，位置優越，安排的樓層也不錯。
review_translated: Good service, great location, and a good floor.

review_text:
新加坡的地標建築了，樓頂的游泳區沒有想象的大，但風景無敵。
新加坡這個地方適合親子旅行
review_translated: Singapore's landmark building, the rooftop swimming area is not as big as expected, but the scenery is invincible. Singapore is a place suitable for family travel

review_text: 老舊了一些 能住 肯定要住一下  無邊泳池好
review_translated: It's a bit old, but if you can live there, you must stay in an infinity pool.

review_text: 很好，房間新裝修的。服務也很好
review_translated: Very good, the room is newly renovated. The service is also very good

review_text: 位置很好，服務熱情。設施稍有陳舊
review_translated: Great location, friendly service. The facilities are a bit old

room_type: Sands Premier King Gardens By The Bay View
review_text: 很難忘，購物遊玩很方便
review_translated: Very memorable, very convenient for shopping and sightseeing

review_text: 安排的房間很不錯，樓層高景色好！乾淨衞生！
review_translated: The room was very nice, high floor with a great view! Clean and hygienic!

review_text: 考慮周到，安排的很合理👍
review_translated: Thoughtful and well-arranged 👍

review_text: 酒店太大，一定要講清楚新的房間，提前訂。
review_translated: The hotel is too big, so be sure to clarify the new room and book it in advance.

review_text: 新加坡標誌性酒店，總要來一次，房間視野好，看日出日落，賞晚霞與星空，很喜歡這裏，。這裏真的很浪漫🤗
review_translated: This iconic hotel in Singapore is a must-visit. The room has a great view, allowing you to watch the sunrise and sunset, the sunset glow, and the starry sky. I love it here. It's really romantic here.

room_type: Sands Premier Suite King Gardens By The Bay View
review_text: 房間衞生乾淨 服務超級貼心 餐品種類多且好吃
review_translated: The room is clean and the service is very considerate. The food is varied and delicious.

review_text: 還得是金沙 風景無敵 泳池孩子非常喜歡 退房超級方便 我家娃説要是一個星期都住金沙就好了😂
review_translated: The view from the Golden Sands is amazing, and the kids love it. Checking out is super convenient, and my kid said it would be great if he could stay at the Golden Sands for the whole week.

review_text: 早餐很好，1樓和57樓都有。華人禮遇不錯。不會英文的長者家自己去入住也不會有問題。
review_translated: The breakfast is very good, available on both the 1st and 57th floors. The Chinese hospitality is good. Elderly people who don't speak English will have no problem checking in on their own.

review_text: 景色很不錯，房間很舒服，出腳方便，一樓自助餐很豐盛
review_translated: The view is great, the room is comfortable, easy to get around, and the buffet on the first floor is very rich

review_text: 酒店真是太漂亮了，絕對是到新加坡必住的酒店，前台員工非常專業和禮貌，剛好碰到一位台灣的服務員Jerry Auyang，留下來深刻的印象。另外酒店裡有**，還有高檔購物中心和各種小吃，真是太方便了。另外頂樓的無邊際游泳池絕對要打卡。
review_translated: This hotel is absolutely stunning and a must-stay in Singapore. The front desk staff was incredibly professional and polite. I even happened to meet Jerry Auyang, a Taiwanese waiter, who left a lasting impression. The hotel is also conveniently located near a casino, a high-end shopping mall, and a variety of eateries. The rooftop infinity pool is a must-see.

review_text: 帶多孩子出遊，選了金沙，衞生，服務各方面都很滿意，特別是無限次進出泳池，按摩池很棒，有機會再來。
review_translated: We traveled with many children and chose Sands. We were very satisfied with the hygiene and service, especially the unlimited entry and exit of the swimming pool. The massage pool was great and we would come again if we had the chance.

review_text: 空中花園很漂亮，無邊泳池更是令人驚歎
review_translated: The sky garden is beautiful and the infinity pool is amazing

review_text: 網紅酒店了，一站式服務，整體很棒
review_translated: Internet celebrity hotel, one-stop service, overall great

review_text: 頂層泳池太讚了，服務很好，下次還要繼續入住
review_translated: The rooftop swimming pool is amazing, the service is great, I will stay here again next time

review_text: 前台小姐姐非常Nice幫我們升級了行政套房，非常漂亮舒服，其他服務人員都很Nice, 非常好的一次體驗，下次來還要入住
review_translated: The lady at the front desk was very nice and helped us upgrade to an executive suite, which was very beautiful and comfortable. The other service staff were also very nice. It was a very good experience and I will stay here again next time.

review_text: 住在豪華大床房，視野開闊、景色無敵。
review_translated: Staying in a deluxe king-size room, you will have a wide view and an unbeatable scenery.

review_text: 乾淨方便服務okay
review_translated: Clean and convenient service okay

review_text:
設施：酒店設施舊
衞生：很好
環境：相當👌
服務：工作人員很熱情
review_translated: Facilities: Hotel facilities are old. Hygiene: very good. Environment: quite 👌. Service: The staff are very enthusiastic.

review_text: 位置得天獨厚，酒店服務非常不錯
review_translated: The location is unique and the hotel service is very good

review_text: 帶兒子過來體驗一下無邊泳池的。環境是沒得説的，景色也不錯，服務人員也非常熱情細緻，總體感覺挺滿意的。
review_translated: I brought my son here to experience the infinity pool. The environment is amazing, the scenery is great, the service staff are very enthusiastic and attentive, and I'm quite satisfied overall.

review_text: 新裝修的房間挺不錯，下次去新加坡還會選擇。
review_translated: The newly renovated room is quite nice and I will choose it again next time I go to Singapore.

review_text: 很漂亮的酒店，旁邊就是大商場和海邊，風景很美而去非常便利。自助餐食材很新鮮豐富、中餐廳的味道也很好。
review_translated: This hotel is very nice, right next to a large shopping mall and the beach. The scenery is beautiful and very convenient. The buffet ingredients are fresh and abundant, and the Chinese restaurant is also delicious.

review_text: 什麼都好就是登記入住時間太長
review_translated: Everything is good except that the check-in time is too long

room_type: Sands Premier Double Queen Gardens By The Bay View
review_text: 住了五天，各方面都很好
review_translated: Stayed for five days, everything was great

review_text: 房間衞生乾淨整潔環境優美服務周到，唯一的就是早餐，適合中國北方的遊客的食物太少，這是我感到遺憾的地方
review_translated: The room is clean and tidy, the environment is beautiful and the service is thoughtful. The only problem is the breakfast. There are too few foods suitable for tourists from northern China. This is what I regret.

review_text:
我對於酒店的枕頭和床很挑剔，這是我睡過最舒服的一次了。空調也不吹人，很舒服。
進門一插卡，窗簾打開的儀式感滿滿。
review_translated: I'm very picky about hotel pillows and beds, but this was the most comfortable I've ever slept in. The air conditioning wasn't harsh, so it was very comfortable. The curtains opened as soon as I entered the room, inserting a card, and it felt like a formality.

review_text: 房間整潔衞生，就是小了點，服務很好！
review_translated: The room is clean and tidy, but a little small. The service is great!

review_text: 實施齊全配套服務態度良好
review_translated: Implementation is complete and supporting services are good

review_text: 不錯的。景色也棒。就是退房時間太早
review_translated: Good. The view is great. But the check-out time is too early

review_text: 很棒的一次體驗，購物遊玩吃喝都齊全……
review_translated: A great experience, with shopping, entertainment, food and drink all available...

review_text: ￼還不錯，￼吃喝玩樂都有，￼就是有些貴
review_translated: ￼Not bad, ￼There is food, drink and entertainment, ￼but it is a bit expensive

room_type: Sands Premier King Gardens By The Bay View
review_text: 第一天住的房間隔音不好，投訴以後升級了景觀房很不錯！
review_translated: The room I stayed in on the first day had poor soundproofing. After complaining, I was upgraded to a room with a view, which was great!

review_text: 很豪華的酒店，帶父母出行，很開心。
review_translated: Very luxurious hotel, very happy to travel with my parents.

review_text: 非常好購物很方便環境很好。

review_text: 服務越來越差了 服務水平喝內地比已經反過來了
review_translated: The service is getting worse and worse. The service level is the opposite of that in the mainland.

review_text: 服務、衞生、餐飲、環境都很好

review_text: 必須入住的酒店，太美

review_translated: The first room was not soundproof and was too noisy. With the help of Ctrip, we were able to change rooms. The problem was solved. The outdoor pool was almost empty.

review_text: 房間可以直接看到馬六甲海峽。很棒。
review_translated: The room has a direct view of the Strait of Malacca. It's great.

review_text: 性價比太差，除了所謂的無邊泳池這個噱頭外，服務一踏糊塗。
review_translated: The value for money is too poor. Apart from the so-called infinity pool, the service is a mess.

review_text: 服務：非常好，值得再去
review_translated: Service: Very good, worth going again

review_text: 房間太舊，設備也差，性價比太差了
review_translated: The room is too old, the equipment is poor, and the price-performance ratio is too poor

review_text: 環境好 服務棒 不愧是新加坡最頂尖的
review_translated: Good environment and great service, it is worthy of being the best in Singapore

review_text: 好的，除了會説中文的人太少了之外
review_translated: Okay, except that there are too few people who can speak Chinese

review_text: 距離景點近，服務很好，日用品齊全，很舒服的居住體驗
review_translated: Close to attractions, good service, complete daily necessities, very comfortable living experience

review_text: 打卡之地，無邊泳池確實很有特色。
review_translated: As a place to check in, the infinity pool is indeed very unique.

review_text: 整體還不錯，雖然雙床都是1.2米的，但還是小了點，無邊泳池人超多
review_translated: Overall it's good. Although the twin beds are 1.2 meters long, they are still a bit small. The infinity pool is very crowded.

review_text: 很好，服務很到位，下次來新加坡出差還是會選擇金沙酒店，體驗感非常好，景色餐飲都很符合星級酒店標準，滿意
review_translated: Very good, the service is in place. Next time I come to Singapore for business, I will still choose the Sands Hotel. The experience is very good. The scenery and dining are in line with the standards of a star hotel. I am satisfied

review_text: 標誌性建築，性價比不高！
review_translated: Iconic building, great value for money!

review_text: 一分價錢一份服務，很舒服，很好玩
review_translated: One price one service, very comfortable and fun

review_text: 很好 服務態度 服務意識 都很好
review_translated: Very good service attitude and service awareness are very good

review_text: 除了貴，沒毛病，環境一流，購物一流，**就在樓下。
review_translated: Apart from being expensive, there is nothing wrong with it. The environment and shopping are first-class, and ** is just downstairs.

review_text: 新加坡最美的一個酒店~
review_translated: The most beautiful hotel in Singapore

review_text: 酒店接待，服務非常滿意
review_translated: Hotel reception, very satisfied with the service

review_text: 房間很舒服，出行很方便
review_translated: The room is very comfortable and travel is very convenient

review_text: 換了個房間，3號樓快點翻新好吧
review_translated: I changed the room. Building 3 should be renovated soon.

review_text: 游泳池印象最深 早餐豐盛 用餐環境極佳 視線很好
review_translated: The swimming pool was the most impressive. The breakfast was rich and the dining environment was excellent. The view was great.

review_text: 為了去游泳池訂的酒店，房間很大，很舒服。就是前台辦理入住等的時間太久。
review_translated: I booked this hotel to go to the swimming pool. The room was large and comfortable. The only problem was that the check-in time at the front desk was too long.

review_text:
設施：全面高檔
衞生：非常好
環境：高大上
服務：熱情好客
review_translated: Facilities: comprehensive and high-end Health: very good Environment: high-end Service: warm and hospitable

review_text: 非常好的好的設施，周圍很多值得的打卡地。服務也一流。早餐太敷衍，配不上這麼好的酒店。
review_translated: Excellent facilities, surrounded by many worthwhile places to visit. The service was also first-class. The breakfast was perfunctory and unworthy of such a good hotel.

room_type: Sands Premier King Gardens By The Bay View
review_text: 服務挺好，就人太多了，吃不消
review_translated: The service is good, but there are too many people.

review_text: 貴！貴！貴！貴！貴！

review_text: 二樓套房，臨街很吵，於是退房了

review_text: 就是人太多，這次住低層景觀一般，高層一些會更好

review_text: 還是那樣的好，但價格還是太高

review_text: 環境一流，住宿也一流。就是人多，服務一般。酒店頂層的餐館不錯，推薦一試

review_text: 在裝修比較吵，然後房間裏面的用品感覺也沒有幾年前的好了。
review_translated: The decoration is quite noisy, and the supplies in the room don't seem to be as good as they were a few years ago.

review_text: 孩子喜歡游泳，説實話就是衝著泳池去的，房間是真不怎麼樣，吃飯購物都很方便，打車也方便
review_translated: My kids love swimming. To be honest, we went there just for the pool. The room was not very good. It was very convenient for eating, shopping and taking a taxi.

review_text: 特別好，前台小姐姐還給升級了房間
review_translated: Very good, the front desk lady also upgraded the room

review_text: 酒店很現代化，位置不錯，交通方便。
review_translated: The hotel is modern, with a good location and convenient transportation.

review_text:
很好的體驗 給升級了房間 地點方便 酒店員工很nice 頂樓的無邊泳池更是贊 
酒店和商場在一起 吃飯購物也方便
review_translated: Very good experience. The room was upgraded. The location is convenient. The hotel staff is very nice. The infinity pool on the rooftop is even better. The hotel is next to the mall, which is convenient for dining and shopping.

review_text: Checkin太慢，有些吵咋，樓頂不錯，酒吧和泳池。房間也不錯
review_translated: Check-in was too slow and a bit noisy. The rooftop is nice with a bar and swimming pool. The room was also nice.

review_text: 很棒 空中花園太讚了下次去新加坡還會住這個
review_translated: The sky garden is amazing. I will stay here again next time I go to Singapore.

review_text: 房間很好，新裝修的，就是大堂人太多了，亂糟糟的。福物也還OK。

review_text: 房間很大，景觀也不錯，推薦

review_text:
設施：新加坡最好的酒店
服務：還行吧
review_translated: Facilities: Best hotel in Singapore Service: OK

review_text: 過年漲價一倍，仍然覺得不虧
review_translated: The price doubled during the Chinese New Year, but I still feel it's not a loss

review_text: 非常乾淨，孩子很喜歡，去哪裡都比較方便，下次還會選擇！
review_translated: Very clean, the kids love it, and it's convenient to go anywhere. I will choose it again next time!

review_text: 人非常多，適合喜歡熱鬧的人
review_translated: There are a lot of people, suitable for people who like lively

review_translated: The swimming pool upstairs is comfortable. This is my second time here. The price has doubled compared to eight years ago. It's too expensive.

review_text: 商場很好逛，挺方便的

review_text: 房間設備老舊，沒有浴缸！！太遺憾😔！

review_text: 房間不錯，就是有點老，交通便利，吃飯購物很方便
review_translated: The room is nice, but a bit old. The transportation is convenient, and it is very convenient for eating and shopping.

review_text: 值得推薦，就是太貴了，不然可以多住幾晚，真是高端酒店
review_translated: Highly recommended, but too expensive. Otherwise, I could have stayed a few more nights. It's a really high-end hotel.

review_text: 周邊環境和頂樓風光秀麗

review_text: 地理位置優越，環境優美！

review_text: 不錯，環境和服務都不錯！

review_text: 位置比較好，設施和服務一般

review_text: 很好，就是貴，一樓和57樓餐廳的飯菜味道不太適合中國人

review_text: 為朋友訂的，朋友説不錯

review_text: 一如既往得舒服，就是價格比之前去住的翻了一倍……

review_text: 很不錯啊 yop有yop的原因

review_text: 房間很舒服，窗外景色秀麗，服務人性化，

review_text: 酒店非常不錯，早餐很喜歡

review_text: 我媽説 貴的值得

review_text: 黃金位置，周圍遊玩方便

review_text: 房間挺乾淨 景色也不錯 以後還會去👍

review_text: 非常滿意。服務很好

review_text: 非常之好下次一定要去。不過價錢貴了點四千幾蚊人民幣1晚

review_text: 環境不錯，住着很舒服

review_translated: The US dollars I brought with me to the hotel were lost. I wonder if the cleaning staff took them away when they cleaned the room.

room_type: Sands Premier Double Queen Gardens By The Bay View

review_text: 喜歡金沙，情人節酒店節幫朋友訂的酒店，很喜歡，就是太貴了。每次喜歡去高空看落日同夜景，喜歡去金沙玩，希望每次同朋友都好運。

review_text:
飯店非常高級, 房間 view 很好, 而且底下有 casion 可以玩 24 小時非常方便
Room service 的餐點也很優秀
review_translated: The hotel is very upscale, the room view is great, and there's a cafe downstairs that's very convenient for 24-hour entertainment. The room service is also excellent.

room_type: Sands Premier Double Queen City View Room
review_text: W飯店的設計總是讓人覺得新穎潮流，這次家庭旅遊主要是要在聖淘沙島活動方便，加上飯店泳池和滑水道，交通方便也玩得開心
review_translated: The design of the W Hotel always makes people feel fresh and trendy. This family trip was mainly to enjoy the convenience of activities on Sentosa Island. With the hotel's swimming pool and water slide, it was convenient for transportation and fun.

room_type: Sands Bay Suite King Gardens By The Bay View
review_text: 濱海灣景觀房可以看到天空樹，超浪漫~無與倫比的美好體驗。trips上有包機場接送，下午茶，晚點心的組合包。可以體驗金沙裡面的餐廳。
review_translated: The Marina Bay view rooms offer a stunning view of the Skytree, a truly romantic and unparalleled experience. Trips also includes a combo package with airport transfers, afternoon tea, and evening snacks. You can also try out the restaurants at the Marina Bay Sands.

review_text: 一流的地點，一流的服務，十分方便的購物中心。
review_translated: Great location, great service, very convenient to shopping malls.

review_text: 人生一定要嚟一次 真係好靚￼
review_translated: I must come once in my life. It's really beautiful￼

review_text: 坡金沙酒店作為全球著名的地標建築和旅遊度假目的地之一，濱海灣金沙綜合度假酒店將給您帶來前所未有的尊貴體驗。舒適典雅的酒店客房讓你享受奢華，走進位於酒店57層
review_translated: As one of the world's most famous landmark buildings and tourist resort destinations, Marina Bay Sands Resort Hotel will bring you an unprecedented noble experience. The comfortable and elegant hotel rooms allow you to enjoy luxury and enter the 57th floor of the hotel.

room_type: Sands Premier Double Queen Gardens By The Bay View
review_text: 真的就是不便宜，但飯店用品都很有質感，有體驗過即可，景色漂亮、離花穹、雲霧林、擎天樹都不算遠，但吃東西要盡量避開用餐時間，人潮太多了
review_translated: It's really not cheap, but the hotel supplies are very high-quality. You can just experience it. The scenery is beautiful and it's not far from the Flower Dome, Cloud Forest, and Supertree. But try to avoid meal times when eating because there are too many people.

room_type: Sands Premier Double Queen Gardens By The Bay View
review_text: WiFi 訊號比較差，房間沒有沐浴露，已叫前台送小朋友刷牙用品及枕頭、但漏咗送要再次打電話
review_translated: WiFi signal is relatively poor, the room does not have shower gel, has asked the front desk to send children brushing supplies and pillows, but missed to send to call again

review_text: 完美的hotel 完美的服務 有吃 有玩 有喝 游泳池比去 超美無邊際 **也要去 會有免費10新幣喔 然後check in的小姐 服務超級好 然後還要去看水舞秀喔 我們去剛好是泰勒絲的 開心！
review_translated: Perfect hotel, perfect service, food, entertainment, and drinks. The swimming pool is even more beautiful than the infinity pool. You should also go there for a free 10 SGD. The check-in lady was super nice, and we also got to watch the water dance show. We went there just in time for Taylor Swift's happy hour!

review_text: 非常豪華的一家酒店，無邊際泳池非常漂亮，新加坡最豪華的酒店當之無愧，56樓空中花園景色優美的像一幅畫
review_translated: A very luxurious hotel with a beautiful infinity pool. It is undoubtedly the most luxurious hotel in Singapore. The 56th floor sky garden is as beautiful as a painting.

review_text: 物超所值的飯店，泳池、購物、餐廳，真的是新加坡地標
review_translated: Great value hotel, swimming pool, shopping, restaurants, it is really a landmark of Singapore

review_text: 非常感謝服務人員 幫我們升等至總統套房，Nice！
review_translated: Thank you very much to the service staff for upgrading us to the presidential suite, nice!

review_text: 酒店服務很好，早餐有兩個地點可以選擇，泳池景色絕佳。在頂樓兩面的night show都可以看到，非常好。
review_translated: The hotel service is very good, there are two breakfast locations to choose from, and the pool view is superb. You can see the night show on both sides of the top floor, which is very good.

review_text: 整體非常好
review_translated: Overall very good

room_type: Sands Premier Double Queen Gardens By The Bay View
review_text: 房間的風景正好看著燈光樹 床跟枕頭都非常舒服 飯店內許多名店 小孩睡著後還可以下樓去**玩一下 樓上的無邊際泳池風景真的很美，所有都很完美，只是最後一天在泳池結束後去56樓沖水換衣服。那邊沒有吹風機，雖然我們要去泳池前遇到了打掃人員問我們是不是要退房了，我說可以，但小孩的頭髮都在滴水 那天天氣是陰天 怕小孩感冒，也還沒11點退房時間 只好先返回房間吹一下頭髮 跟房務說一下情況 我們只要2三分鐘 頭髮吹乾就走 ，其中一個房務看著我們對我們不耐煩，房間他們也才剛進去打掃，若不是發生這情況我不會返回，這讓人覺得有點不舒服，
review_translated: The view from the room was perfect, overlooking the tree lights. The bed and pillows were very comfortable. There are many restaurants within the hotel, and after the kids fell asleep, you can go downstairs to play. The view from the infinity pool upstairs is truly stunning. Everything was perfect, except for our last day, when we finished swimming, we had to go to the 56th floor to shower and change clothes. There were no hair dryers there. Before we went to the pool, we met the cleaning staff who asked if we wanted to check out. I said yes, but my child's hair was dripping wet. It was cloudy that day, and we were worried about her catching a cold. It wasn't check-out time at 11:00, so we had to go back to the room to blow dry her hair. We explained the situation to the housekeeping staff, saying we only needed two or three minutes to dry our hair before leaving. One of the housekeeping staff looked at us impatiently, even though they had just come in to clean the room. If that hadn't happened, I wouldn't have returned. It was a bit unpleasant.

review_text:
各方面都不錯 
早餐人太多了
review_translated: Everything is good. There are too many people at breakfast.

review_text:
不愧是新加坡地標飯店，果然來了一定要住住看！
服務人員都非常親切地解決你每一個疑問與需求
無邊際泳池晚上視野超級棒！！！
早餐豐富到會難過自己怎麼只有一個胃
以後若來新加坡還會想再住的飯店～
review_translated: It's a landmark hotel in Singapore, and you absolutely have to stay here! The staff are incredibly friendly and helpful, answering every question and need. The infinity pool offers a fantastic view at night! The breakfast is so rich it makes me sad I only have one stomach. This is a hotel I'd definitely stay at again if I ever visit Singapore again.

review_text:
非常棒的飯店
我們選擇在新加坡的最後一晚入住
完美的景色與無邊際泳池
服務人員非常的熱情
還有準備特製小蛋糕給我們驚喜
真的非常棒
review_translated: This is a great hotel. We chose to stay here on our last night in Singapore. The view is perfect and the infinity pool is stunning. The staff were very welcoming and even prepared a special cake to surprise us. It was really great.

review_text: 主要是顶层无边泳池棒，房间裝修设置一般般，对不起房价。
review_translated: The infinity pool on the top floor is great, but the room decoration is just average, which is not worth the price.

review_text: 週邊景點設施很多，交也方便，但缺少認識環境的解說服務，必需不斷的訊問，才能順利進行，動線也不夠明朗，尚有改善的空間
review_translated: There are many scenic spots and facilities around, and transportation is convenient, but there is a lack of explanation services to help you understand the environment. You have to ask questions constantly to proceed smoothly. The movement lines are not clear enough, and there is still room for improvement.

review_text: 風景太美 給升級了特別漂亮的大房間  房間外面的大陽台拍出來的夜景很美
review_translated: The scenery is so beautiful that we upgraded to a very beautiful large room. The large balcony outside the room has a beautiful night view.

review_text: 服務人員很好，房間也很大很乾淨，與商場連結，要吃東西或購物都很方便，頂樓的觀景台跟游泳對於房客是免費的一定要去！
review_translated: The service staff is very good, the room is large and clean, and it is connected to the mall, which is very convenient for eating or shopping. The rooftop observation deck and swimming pool are free for guests, so you must go!

review_text:
很不錯 雖然第三棟也有年齡了 但維持很好 很乾淨  餅乾飲料都免費  
房務說 第一二棟剛裝修完  非常不錯  但冰箱飲料及餅乾都是要付費
review_translated: It's very nice. Although the third building is old, it's well-maintained and clean. Biscuits and drinks are free. Housekeeping said the first and second buildings were just renovated and are very nice. However, you have to pay for the drinks and biscuits in the refrigerator.

review_text: 服務非常好、設施很棒、還幫我們優先辦理入住👍
review_translated: The service is very good, the facilities are great, and they helped us check in first👍

review_text: 很棒 還會再去
review_translated: Great, will go again

review_text: 無邊際泳池好靚👍
review_translated: The infinity pool is so beautiful👍

room_type: Sands Premier King Gardens By The Bay View
review_text: 頂樓的無邊泳池是打卡熱點
review_translated: The infinity pool on the rooftop is a popular check-in spot

review_text:
超棒
此生必去
服務非常好
泳池太美啦
review_translated: Excellent! A must-go place! The service is excellent and the swimming pool is beautiful.

review_text:
超棒的經驗
工作人員態度超好，只住一天但出門後還會整理房間，行李會送到房間內，還會介紹附近的景點及介紹房間內設備。
review_translated: A great experience. The staff were very friendly. Although I only stayed for one day, they still cleaned the room after I left, delivered my luggage to the room, and introduced nearby attractions and the facilities in the room.

review_text: 非常貼心的酒店，不論服務或設施尤其是床都讓人覺得很舒服，下次還會再去🥰
review_translated: Very considerate hotel, no matter the service or facilities, especially the bed, it makes people feel very comfortable, I will go again next time 🥰

review_text: 一開始到飯店服務人員就馬上出來接待，雖然在等chick in的時間有比較久一點，但就有飯店人員送水，房間也很幸運被升級
review_translated: When we first arrived at the hotel, the hotel staff came out to greet us immediately. Although we had to wait a little longer for the chick to come in, the hotel staff brought us water and we were lucky enough to get an upgrade.

room_type: Sands Premier King Gardens By The Bay View
review_text: 服務不錯👍👍
review_translated: Good service 👍👍

review_text: 服務態度滿分！
review_translated: Full marks for service attitude!

review_text: 部分服務設施及周邊活動辦的不錯👌🏽
review_translated: Some service facilities and surrounding activities are well organized 👌🏽

review_text: 从酒店大堂到房間服務超赞。
review_translated: The service from the hotel lobby to the room was amazing.

review_text: 新加坡地標，￼服務和舒適度￼都毋庸置疑，￼五星的服務。
review_translated: A landmark in Singapore, the service and comfort are beyond doubt, five-star service.

review_text: 舒適 高檔 一樓早餐食材非常豐富 適合來體驗一次
review_translated: The comfortable and high-end breakfast on the first floor is very rich in ingredients and is suitable for a visit.

review_text: 地標，但飯店沒有5星感覺，又貴
review_translated: Landmark, but the hotel does not feel 5 stars and is expensive

review_text: 非常好的體驗
review_translated: Very good experience

review_text: 客人非常滿意
review_translated: The guests were very satisfied

review_text: 附近交通便利，服務態度好
review_translated: Convenient transportation nearby, good service attitude

review_text: 服務非常好
