review_translated: Very good service

review_text: 環境乾淨舒適。服務人員親切可愛。樓上游泳池，網紅打卡必去
review_translated: The environment is clean and comfortable. The service staff is friendly and lovely. The swimming pool upstairs is a must-see for internet celebrities

review_text: 蠻好的，服務很周到
review_translated: Very good, very thoughtful service

room_type: Sands Premier Double Queen Gardens By The Bay View
review_text: 房間很棒，高品質環境
review_translated: Great room, high quality environment

review_text: 因為疫情旅遊的人沒有以前多..就覺得沒有以往的熱鬧
review_translated: Because of the epidemic, there are not as many people traveling as before..so it feels not as lively as before.

review_text: 整體還需改善
review_translated: Overall needs improvement

review_text: 服務非常好，服務員親切
review_translated: Very good service, friendly waiters

review_text: 房間很大很漂亮
review_translated: The room is big and beautiful

review_text: 很棒的服務
review_translated: Great service
Like 👍🏻

room_type: Sands Premier King Gardens By The Bay View
review_text: О, это лучший отель в нашей жизни! У нас был забронирован номер Премьер, но в мой день рождения нам апгрейдили номер до Люкса. Какой же он шикарный! Мы охали и ахали. Я не хотела из него выходить, но надо было же и бассейн знаменитый посетить. В номере все продумано до мелочей: даже детский набор для душа дали и супер мягкие тапочки для ребенка. Много питьевой воды и капсульного кофе на любой вкус в большом количестве. Все в красивых пакетиках, в ванной мне не описать все просто поживите там минимум две ночи, потому что за одну ночь вы не успеете насладиться всем, что там есть! А когда мы заказали ужин в номер нам накрыли стол скатертью, и просто ах….
review_translated: Oh, this is the best hotel we've ever stayed at! We booked a Premier room, but for my birthday they upgraded us to a Suite. It's so luxurious! We were absolutely gasping. I didn't want to leave, but we had to visit the famous pool. Everything in the room was thoughtfully designed down to the last detail: they even gave us a children's shower set and super soft slippers for our little one. There was plenty of drinking water and capsule coffee for every taste. Everything was packaged beautifully. I can't describe everything in the bathroom—just stay there for at least two nights, because you won't have time to enjoy everything there is! And when we ordered dinner in our room, they set the table with a tablecloth, and it was simply wow...

review_text: При возможности побывайте в отеле. Повысили категорию номера на Люкс, так как 4 дня ранее у мужа был день рождения. В номере чисто, современно, халаты мягкие, косметика пахнет великолепно. На завтрак ходили в ресторан на 55 этаже, все вкусное, красивый вид. Обедали на бассейне, очень вкусная и большая порция Цезаря и смузи. А какой Негрони вечером на баре!))) Мы в восторге от отеля.
review_translated: If you have the chance, visit the hotel. We upgraded our room to a suite because my husband had his birthday four days earlier. The room was clean and modern, the robes were soft, and the toiletries smelled wonderful. We had breakfast at the restaurant on the 55th floor; everything was delicious, and the view was beautiful. We had lunch by the pool; the Caesar salad and smoothie were delicious and generous. And the Negroni at the bar that evening was fantastic! We absolutely loved the hotel.

review_text: Очень круто , сервис на высшем уровне, номера со всеми удобствами , колонка в номере , лед под алкоголь 👍, мелочь но приятно
review_translated: Very cool, top-notch service, rooms with all the amenities, a water pump in the room, ice for alcohol 👍, a small thing but nice

review_text: Приехали к 11, сразу выдали гостевые карты, чтобы пойти в бассейн. Очень милый персонал. К 13 номер был готов (пришло письмо на почту). В номере есть все необходимое, включая бритвенный станок и расчески. На верху смотровая бесплатно для гостей отеля. Бассейн работает с 6 утра, можно встретить рассвет.
review_translated: We arrived at 11 a.m. and were immediately given guest cards for use in the pool. The staff was very friendly. Our room was ready by 1 p.m. (I received an email with the details). The room has everything you need, including a razor and combs. There's a free observation deck at the top for hotel guests. The pool opens at 6 a.m., so you can catch the sunrise.

review_text: 非常に綺麗だった、プールは昼間、夜両方行くべき
review_translated: It was very beautiful, the pool is great both in the daytime and at night.

room_type: Sands Premier Double Queen Gardens By The Bay View
review_text:
設備清潔感サービス、とてもよかったです。
チェックインとチェックアウトはどちらも日本語対応ができる方が付いていただけて不安なく過ごせました。
一点改善を求めることは、朝の一番時間にシビアな時間帯に朝食ビュッフェのために30分ほど並ぶ羽目になったことです。
会場に入場するために長蛇の列ができていました。
次のフライトを控えているため早く切り上げないといけなかったのが残念でした。
review_translated: The facilities were very clean and the service was excellent. We had someone who could speak Japanese with us during both check-in and check-out, so we had no worries. The only thing we could improve is that we had to wait in line for about 30 minutes for the breakfast buffet at the peak of the morning. There was a long line to get into the venue. It was a shame that we had to leave early because we had to catch our next flight.

room_type: Sands Premier King Gardens By The Bay View
review_text:
大変素晴らしいお部屋でした。
今回は4部屋の予約をしました。1つは、ファミリーのスイートだった為、最高のお部屋でした。ただチェックイン15時を過ぎても掃除が終わってなく、入れたのは16時半頃でした。
他の部屋は、何とか15時には入れたので良かったです。
タワー1から3までのお部屋でバラバラでしたが、どの部屋も良かったです。また泊まりたいです。
review_translated: The rooms were wonderful. I booked four rooms this time. One of them was a family suite, so it was the best room. However, cleaning wasn't finished even after check-in time of 3 PM, so I couldn't check in until around 4:30 PM. I was able to check in the other rooms by 3 PM, which was great. The rooms were all different, from Tower 1 to Tower 3, but all were great. I'd love to stay here again.

room_type: Sands Premier Double Queen Gardens By The Bay View
review_text:
2박했는데요~ 직원분들 모두 친절하시고, 본인말을 고객이 이해 했는지 확인하시고, 이해안된것같으면 천천히 여러번 얘기해주십니다.
모든 직원분들이 다 좋습니다.
딸이 수영장 물속에서 놀다가 계단에 스쳐서 조금 다쳤는데
계속 확인하시고~ 시설관리자분들 계속 오셔서 어디서 다쳤는지 거기 상태가 어떤지 확인하고 또 확인하고~
괜히 유명한 호텔이 아닌가봐요. 고객을 응대하는 자세부터가 진짜 다릅니다. 다음에 또 가고싶습니다^^
review_translated: I stayed for two nights. The staff were all friendly and made sure I understood what I said, and if they didn't seem to understand, they explained things slowly and repeatedly. All the staff were great. My daughter was playing in the pool and got slightly hurt after brushing against the stairs, and they kept checking on her. The facility managers also came by frequently to check on her injuries and make sure she was okay. It's no wonder this hotel is so famous. Their customer service is truly exceptional. I'd love to go back again.

room_type: Sands Premier Double Queen City View Room
review_text: 파이자 스위트룸 & 서비스 최고입니다
review_translated: The Pfizer Suite & Service are the best

review_text: 良かったです
review_translated: It was good

review_text: とっても良かった！スキンケアを置いていないので持っていくべき！
review_translated: It was great! They don't have any skincare products so I should bring some!

room_type: Sands Premier Double Queen Gardens By The Bay View
review_text:
La experiencia de alojarse en uno de los mejores hoteles del mundo es única. Tanto el hotel como el servicio son fantásticos. Lo mejor, sin duda, es la pileta en el piso 57. El personal muy atento y simpático. Desayuno excelente.  


Es un verdadero privilegio haber vivido la experiencia de hospedarnos en uno de los mejores hoteles del mundo. El hotel y el servicio son excelentes. Lo mejor, sin dudas, es la pileta del piso 57. Las vistas desde las habitaciones en el piso 40 son increibles. El desayuno buffet en el lobby es excelente.
review_translated: The experience of staying in one of the best hotels in the world is unique. Both the hotel and the service are fantastic. The best, without a doubt, is the pool on the 57th floor. The staff is very attentive and friendly. The breakfast is excellent. It's a true privilege to have experienced staying in one of the best hotels in the world. The hotel and the service are excellent. The best, without a doubt, is the pool on the 57th floor. The views from the rooms on the 40th floor are incredible. The breakfast buffet in the lobby is excellent.

room_type: Sands Premier King Gardens By The Bay View
review_text: спасибо за прекрасный отдых! спасибо за повышение категории номера, это очень приятно, мы были счасливы пожить в отеле и посмотреть город!нам очень понравилось все! уборка на высшем уровне, отношение отеля к окружающей среде.
review_translated: Thank you for a wonderful stay! Thank you for the room upgrade, it was very nice. We were happy to stay at the hotel and see the city! We really enjoyed everything! The cleaning was top-notch, and the hotel was very environmentally friendly.

review_text:
ガチでめちゃくちゃよかった……!!
お部屋アップグレードしてもらってスイート行けたのでめちゃくちゃよかった
review_translated: It was really great...!! I got a room upgrade to a suite, so it was really great.

review_text: Must stay in Singapore! Prachtige kamer en vooral het skydeck is waanzinnig.
review_translated: A must stay in Singapore! Beautiful room, and the sky deck is especially amazing.

room_type: Sands Premier Double Queen Gardens By The Bay View
review_text:
部屋、食事処、インフィニティプール、どこをとっても最高レベルと感じます。
一方、日本語の案内がどこにも見当たらないのはまぁ時代なんでしょうかね。不便でした。
review_translated: The rooms, dining area, and infinity pool are all top-notch. However, I guess it's a sign of the times that there are no Japanese signs anywhere. It was inconvenient.

review_text:
シティビューで高層階に変更してくれて広いお部屋でした。が、25階に宿泊し27階からは工事中で時折ドリルの音やトンカチで打つ音が聞こえてきました。(夜は20時くらいまで、朝は９時から工事開始)
そのためか34階でのエレベーターの乗り入れも出来ず、わざわざ１階に降りて57階のインフィニティープールへ行きました。
またフロントで噴水ショーの時間も教えてくれたのですが、イベントがあり時間がずれてました。
案内するなら今日はイベントがあるからと言うべきです。
安い部屋とは言え高い宿泊代を払ってますので、もう少しアナウンスが欲しかったです。
review_translated: They upgraded me to a larger room with a city view and a higher floor. However, I stayed on the 25th floor, and construction was underway from the 27th floor, with occasional sounds of drilling and hammering. (Construction was ongoing until around 8 PM, starting at 9 AM.) Because of this, the elevator on the 34th floor was closed, so I had to go down to the first floor to access the infinity pool on the 57th floor. The front desk also told me the time of the fountain show, but it was off due to an event. If they were going to give me a guided tour, they should have mentioned that there was an event that day. Even though it was a cheap room, I was paying a high price, so I would have liked a little more announcement.

room_type: Sands Premier Double Queen City View Room
review_text: Goooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooood
review_translated: Goooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooood

review_text: Один из лучших отелей в Сингапуре, спасибо за отдых!
review_translated: One of the best hotels in Singapore, thanks for the stay!

review_text: Excelente hotel. Ótimo café da manhã. Localização privilegiada.
review_translated: Excellent hotel. Great breakfast. Prime location.

review_text:
泊まったタワーが工事中で日中は結構騒音が凄かったです。(承知の上で泊まりましたが)
日中は観光か上のプールにいたのでそこまで気にならなかったです。
値段は高かったですが良い思い出になりました。
フロントのスタッフさんもフレンドリーで、チェックイン中の会話の中で私が好きな映画の話をしたら、その映画の画像をタブレットに映してくれて嬉しかったです。
review_translated: The tower where I stayed was undergoing construction work, which made it quite noisy during the day (although I was aware of this when I stayed there). Since I spent the day sightseeing or in the upper pool, it didn't bother me that much. It was a bit pricey, but it was a great experience. The front desk staff were also friendly, and when I mentioned my favorite movie during check-in, they showed me an image of the movie on their tablet, which I really appreciated.

review_text: 가격이 사악하지만 싱가포르 여행 중 한번은 숙박 하는걸 추천함
review_translated: The price is steep, but I recommend staying here at least once during your trip to Singapore.

review_text:
신혼여행으로 다녀왔습니다🌝
가든스 더 베이 뷰의 스위트룸 너무 환상적이었고 어메니티도 전부 불가리라 최고였어요
인피니티 풀에서의 수영도 너무 좋았어용
다시 가고 싶어요❤️
review_translated: I went there for my honeymoon🌝 The suite at Gardens the Bay View was fantastic and all the amenities were Bulgari, which was the best. Swimming in the infinity pool was also great. I want to go back❤️

review_text:
息子の誕生日で宿泊。
フロントでは2アップグレード、部屋には誕生日ケーキと最高のおもてなしでした。
review_translated: We stayed here for my son's birthday. We were given a 2-star upgrade at the front desk and a birthday cake in the room, which was the best hospitality we've ever had.

room_type: Sands Premier Suite King City View
review_text:
말해 뭐합니까. 호텔은 너무너무 좋습니다.
서비스도 좋았지만 조금 더 일찍 공항 샌딩/픽업 서비스에 대해 말씀해주셨으면 좋았을 뻔했네요.

사전에 문의하려고 했는데 무조건 예약한 곳을 확인하고 예약자 이름, 예약 번호부터 확인해서 살~짝 기분은 안좋았고
트립닷컴에서 예약한건에 대한 내용은 확인할 수 없다고 해서 공항 픽업서비스를 따로 예약했다가 부랴부랴 취소했거든요.
그래도 꼼꼼하게 챙기려고 하는 것 같아서 넘어가도록 하겠습니다.
review_translated: What can I say? The hotel is absolutely wonderful. The service was great, but I wish they had told me about the airport drop-off/pick-up service a little earlier. I tried to inquire in advance, but they insisted on checking my reservation, my name, and my reservation number. I was a little annoyed. They also said they couldn't confirm my reservation on Trip.com, so I booked the airport pickup service separately and then hurriedly canceled it. Still, they seem to be very thorough, so I'll let that slide.

review_text:
やはり5つ星ホテルなだけあり、サービスが最高級でした！
誕生月ということもあり無料で部屋のランクアップしてもらいました😍
レストランは予約していった方がいいかもしれません。
プールにはガウンを持っていくことをオススメします！
review_translated: As expected of a 5-star hotel, the service was top-notch! Since it was my birthday month, they upgraded my room for free! 😍 It might be a good idea to make reservations at restaurants. I recommend bringing a robe to the pool!

review_text: 모든것이 완벽했습니다. 다시 싱가포르를 방문해도 또 예약을 해야 하는 분명한 이유가 있습니다. 너무나도 좋았습니다.
review_translated: Everything was perfect. There's a definite reason I'd book here again if I ever visit Singapore again. It was just so good.

review_text:
宿泊者専用のインフィニティプールが最高でした。
映え写真間違えなし！

プールで映え写真を撮るには人があまりいない時間を狙って下さい。
オープンと同時5:00-6:00
クローズのギリギリ23:00-24:00
がオススメの時間帯が確実です。

日焼け止めも無料のポンプがあるので忘れても大丈夫です。
ココナッツの香りが良い匂いでした。

今回、このプールで映え写真を撮るのが目的で宿泊しましたがサービス最高です。
アメニティ等、掃除も部屋のテレビ画面で注文できます。
お水もたくさんくれます。
ミニバーもお菓子も無料です。
review_translated: The infinity pool, reserved for guests only, was amazing. It's guaranteed to take some amazing photos! To take some amazing photos at the pool, try to go when there aren't many people around. The best times to visit are right when the pool opens, from 5:00-6:00, or right before closing, from 11:00-12:00. There's also a free pump of sunscreen, so it's okay if you forget. The coconut scent is lovely. I stayed here with the sole purpose of taking amazing photos at the pool, and the service was excellent. You can order amenities and cleaning services from the TV screen in your room. They also provide plenty of water. The minibar and snacks are free.

review_text:
Perfekt als Zwischenstopp. Singapur ist eine Reise wert.
11/10
review_translated: Perfect as a stopover. Singapore is worth a trip. 11/10

review_text:
3번 타워에 묵게 되었는데 공사중일거라 했는데 공사 소음은 없었어요. 테일러 스위프트 싱가포르 공연 기념 분수쇼도 있어서 좋았어요. 덕분에 호텔비용이 너무 올랐네요

주위 환경이나 시설은 너무 좋았습니다.

휘트니스 센터가 좀 멀리 떨어져 있고 수영장이 사진찍기 용이라 수영을 할수 없어서 운동을 겸해서 숙박을 고려 한다면 메리트가 많이 떨어지는 호텔 입니다.
review_translated: I stayed in Tower 3, and while I was told there would be construction going on, there was no construction noise. There was also a fountain show commemorating Taylor Swift's Singapore concert, which was nice. The hotel's price went up significantly, but the surroundings and facilities were excellent. The fitness center is a bit far away, and the pool is for photo opportunities only, so swimming isn't allowed. So, if you're considering staying for exercise, this hotel is not worth it.

review_text: 호텔 위치나 인피니티풀이 너무 좋네요~ 야경이 쫙~~👍👍비싸도 하루쯤은 꼭 묵어야하는 호텔이예요
review_translated: The hotel location and infinity pool are great~ The night view is amazing~~👍👍 Even though it's expensive, it's a hotel you should definitely stay at least one day.

review_text: Tempat nya strategis. Akses nya mudah. Nyaman bersih dan luas
review_translated: Strategic location. Easy access. Comfortable, clean, and spacious.

review_text: 싱가폴 랜드마크 하루 이상은 꼭 지내보는게 좋아여
review_translated: I recommend spending at least a day at Singapore's landmarks.

room_type: Sands Premier Double Queen Gardens By The Bay View
review_text: Все было супер, понравилось всё, отличное местоположение
review_translated: Everything was great, I liked everything, great location

review_text: Bom,piscina lindíssima
review_translated: Well, beautiful pool

review_text:
立地もサービスも最高でした！チェックインフロントには日本語を話せる方もいて安心しました。(常時いらっしゃるかは分かりませんが…)
写真は夜のインフィニティプールからの景色です。
従業員さんは、立ち止まっていたりするとすぐ声をかけて助けてくれます。また泊まりたいです。
review_translated: The location and service were both excellent! I was relieved to find someone at the check-in front desk who spoke Japanese. (I'm not sure if they're always there, though.) The photo shows the view from the infinity pool at night. The staff were always quick to call out and help me if I was standing still. I'd love to stay here again.

review_text: 싱가포르 최고의 호텔이였어요. 수영장도 좋았고, 전망대 무료이용, 삼판보트 무료이용까지 최고였어요. 다음에 또 숙박하고 싶어요.
review_translated: This was the best hotel in Singapore. The pool was great, and the free access to the observation deck and sampan boat rides were all top-notch. I'd love to stay here again.

review_text:
最高でした。
チェックインの時に、数日後に誕生日ということをお祝いしてくださり、急遽その日の夜に素敵なケーキをご用意してくださいました。とても幸せな時間でした。
review_translated: It was amazing. When I checked in, they celebrated my birthday in a few days and quickly prepared a wonderful cake for me that evening. It was a very happy time.

review_text:
최고의 서비스와 수영장을 가진 호텔입니다
일박 숙박 비용이 비싸지만 한 번쯤은 투숙할 가치가 있는
호텔이라고 생각합니다
review_translated: This hotel has the best service and swimming pool. It is expensive for a night's stay, but I think it is worth staying at least once.

review_text:
마리나베이샌즈에서의 숙박은 정말 최고였습니다.!
뷰도 최고고, 야간 수영은 정말 좋았고, 룸 업그레이드도 좋았습니다.
좋은 추억 가지고 갑니다. 땡큐 쏘마치 에브리띵
review_translated: My stay at Marina Bay Sands was truly amazing! The view was amazing, the night swimming was fantastic, and the room upgrade was a bonus. I'll be leaving with great memories. Thank you, Somachi, everything.

review_text:
옥상 수영장 하나 보고 갔습니다. 
매우 만족
오전 오후 밤의 전망이 다 다릅니다. 
객실은 다른 호텔과 비슷
다음에 또 방문 예정
review_translated: I visited the rooftop pool. I was very satisfied. The views were different in the morning, afternoon, and night. The rooms were similar to other hotels, and I plan to visit again.

room_type: Sands Premier Suite Double Queen City View
review_text: Это лучший отель в Сингапуре!
review_translated: This is the best hotel in Singapore!

review_text:
뷰가 너무 예뻤고, 꼭대기에서 야경을 바라보는 수영장에서 재밌게 놀수있어서 좋았습니다. 
수영하고 룸에서 저녁시켜먹을수 있어서 편리했습니다.
review_translated: The view was beautiful, and it was great to be able to enjoy the pool from the rooftop while looking out at the night view. It was convenient to be able to order dinner in my room after swimming.

review_text: Отель полностью соответствует заявленному уровню. Роскошный номер Студио с шикарныым видом на город. Идеальная чистота. Безупречный сервис. Бассейн на крыше работает с 6 утра до полуночи!
review_translated: The hotel lives up to its promise. A luxurious studio room with a stunning view of the city. Immaculately clean. Impeccable service. The rooftop pool is open from 6 a.m. to midnight!

review_text: Excelnte lugar y único
review_translated: Excellent and unique place

review_text: 리셉션 친절하고요, 방 깨끗하고 가든 뷰 최고에요! 인피니티풀도 시설, 편의성, 전망 너무 좋았어요. 풀바 음식도 가성비 좋았고요.
review_translated: The reception was friendly, the room was clean, and the garden view was fantastic! The infinity pool was fantastic, with great facilities, convenience, and a great view. The pool bar food was also great value.

review_text:
호텔 안에서 휴식-쇼핑 모두 가능합니다.
깔끔하고 좋았어요.
낮의 수영장도, 밤의 수영장도 만족스러워습니다.
review_translated: You can relax and shop within the hotel. It was clean and nice. I was satisfied with both the daytime and nighttime pools.

review_text:
妻と義母へ宿泊をプレゼントしました。たまたま空室があったようで
とても喜んでくれましたし、次回は自分自身も宿泊してみたいです
review_translated: I gifted my wife and mother-in-law a stay at the hotel. They were very happy as there happened to be a room available, and I would like to stay there myself next time.

review_text: MRTとのアクセスについては、ベイフロント駅との相性は完璧だが、空港からの移動となるとマリーナベイからのアクセスもあると思うので、今後の発展に期待。
review_translated: In terms of access to the MRT, it is perfectly compatible with Bayfront Station, but if you are traveling from the airport, I think you can also access it from Marina Bay, so I look forward to future developments.

review_text: Топовый отель. Но оооочень дорого мл
review_translated: Top hotel. But very expensive.

review_text: 랜드마크답게 긴 말이 필요 없는 서비스와 시설을 갖췄습니다. 객실은 싱가포르 도시를 만끽할 수 있는 시티뷰를 추천합니다.
review_translated: As befitting a landmark hotel, it boasts services and facilities that speak for themselves. We recommend rooms with city views, offering a panoramic view of Singapore's cityscape.

review_text: Sinceramente non sono mai stato in una camera così bella e accogliente come al Marina Bay Sands. Ci hanno fatto anche un upgrade gratuito, dandoci una suite; la vista dall’infinity pool è mozzafiato. Consigliatissimo anche per il rapporto qualità prezzo.
review_translated: Honestly, I've never stayed in a room as beautiful and welcoming as the one at the Marina Bay Sands. They even gave us a free upgrade to a suite; the view from the infinity pool is breathtaking. Highly recommended, especially for the price.

review_text: 직원서비스도 좋고 싱가포르에서 꼭 가보고싶던 호텔이라 만족했어요.
review_translated: The staff service was good and I was satisfied as it was the hotel I had always wanted to visit in Singapore.

review_text: 말이 필요없는 마리나베이샌즈~ 바로 뒤에 가든스베이가 있어서 산책겸 구경하고 바로 연결된 몰에 가서 밥먹고 ***하고 ! 마무리로 전망좋은 꼭대기 수영장에서 수영하면 완벽 그 자체입니당! 아 다만 지은지 오래되가서 리모델링한 쪽 가는게 좋을 것 같아요 추천합니다
review_translated: Marina Bay Sands needs no introduction~ Gardens Bay is right behind it, so you can take a walk and see the sights, then go to the connected mall for a bite to eat, and ***! To finish, take a swim in the rooftop pool with a great view. It's perfect! However, since it's been built a long time ago, I recommend going to the remodeled side.

review_text:
살면서 여태 다녀온 호텔중 가격대비 최악인 서비스인 곳
“yes” 보다 “no” 라는 대답이 더 많은 호텔
싱가포르의 최고의 호텔이라고해서 여행내내 이 호텔에 묵었지만 이 호텔에 대한 기억이 안좋아서 두번다시 싱가포르에 안갈듯하다
아 그리고 하루 숙박 한화 100만원돈인데 객실 엄청 좁음
review_translated: This is the worst hotel I've ever stayed at in terms of price/service. There were more "no" answers than "yes" answers. I stayed at this hotel throughout my trip because it was said to be the best hotel in Singapore, but I don't have good memories of this hotel, so I don't think I'll ever go back to Singapore. Oh, and it costs 1 million won per night, but the room is very small.

review_text:
タクシーがつかまらなくて結局MRTを利用しました。
ロビーに椅子が欲しいです。
部屋でのサービスはとてもよかったです。
review_translated: I couldn't get a taxi so I ended up taking the MRT. I wish there were more chairs in the lobby. The service in the room was very good.

review_text:
깔끔하고 편했어요
이동하기에도 좋고, 직원분들 너무 친절합니다
객실에서 뷰도 좋으며, 룸서비스 강력 추천하는 곳이에요
review_translated: It was clean and comfortable. It was easy to get around. The staff were very friendly. The view from the room was great. I highly recommend the room service.

review_text: 너무 너머 좋았어요🙏🏻😍😍 마리나베이 최고에여 싱가폴에 간다면 꼭 들려야하는 숙소 같아요 전망도 너무 좋았고 조식도 수영장도 다 완벽한 호텔이었습니다 ㅎㅎ
review_translated: It was so great🙏🏻😍😍 Marina Bay is the best. It seems like a place you must stay if you go to Singapore. The view was great, and the breakfast and pool were all perfect. ㅎㅎ

review_text:
말해뭐해 진짜 좋아요… 뷰도 가든뷰 환상이에요
비싼만큼 호텔 수영장이 진짜 너무 좋아서 밤수영, 낮수영 다 즐기는 걸 추천해요 그리고 최대한 부대시설 많이 이용하세용
룸은 조금 올드한 느낌이긴 해요,,
review_translated: What can I say, it's really good... The view is fantastic, the garden view. As it's expensive, the hotel pool is really great, so I recommend enjoying both night and day swimming. And use the facilities as much as possible. The room feels a bit old,,

room_type: Sands Premier Double Queen City View Room
review_text: Lieu de séjour exceptionnel à tous points.
review_translated: An exceptional place to stay in every way.

review_text: Ну очень большой отель!))
review_translated: Well, this is a very big hotel!))

review_text: 私が宿泊した部屋の窓からはガーデンズ・バイ・ザ・ベイを見ることができて、憧れの屋上のプールにも入れてとても良い思い出になりました。
review_translated: I could see Gardens by the Bay from the window of the room I stayed in, and I was able to enjoy the rooftop pool, which I had always wanted to try, and it was a wonderful memory.

review_text: Хороший отель. Хорошие виды с басейна на 51 этаже. Обязательно надо посетить данный отель.
review_translated: A good hotel. Great views from the pool on the 51st floor. A must-see.

review_text:
素晴らしいの一言です。
部屋はとにかく綺麗です。眺めも素晴らしい。
インフィニティ・プールも本当に素晴らしい。朝食も美味しい。
シンガポールには観光地が沢山ありますが、宿泊すること自体が素晴らしい経験になると思います。
review_translated: It's simply amazing. The rooms are absolutely beautiful. The views are amazing. The infinity pool is also amazing. The breakfast is delicious. There are many tourist attractions in Singapore, but I think staying here is a wonderful experience in itself.

review_text:
Super buen hotel,disfrute
mucho,gracias
review_translated: Super good hotel, I enjoyed it a lot, thank you

review_text:
스카이킹뷰 정말 최고
직원들 하나같이 완전친절
스펙트라쇼 방에서 그냥볼수있고
미니바 무료
방이 51층이라 인피니티풀 이용도 금방이었음
수영장에서 주문해먹는 음식도 참 맛있었고
조식뷔페도 맛없는게 없었음
아기한테 룸키를 기념으로 가져가게줬는데
우리아들 넘 좋아했음
싱가폴여행은 역시 마리나베이샌즈👍👍
review_translated: Sky King view is really the best. All the staff are very friendly. You can just see the Spectra Show from the room and the minibar is free. Since the room was on the 51st floor, it was easy to use the infinity pool. The food ordered at the pool was delicious and there was nothing bad in the breakfast buffet. I gave the room key to my baby as a souvenir and my son loved it. When traveling to Singapore, Marina Bay Sands is the best👍👍

review_text:
値段意外は申し分ありませんでした！
日本の物価が問題かと。また泊まりたいと思えるような思い出となる旅行となりました。
review_translated: Other than the price, everything was perfect! I guess the cost of living in Japan is the problem. It was a memorable trip that made me want to stay here again.

review_text: Великолепный отель! Лучший в Сингапуре, всем советую хотя бы раз побывать в этом месте
review_translated: This hotel is amazing! The best in Singapore, I highly recommend everyone to visit this place at least once.

review_text: 처음방문인데 체크인부터 너무친절하셨고 룸컨디션도 최고였습니다~! 인피니트풀장도 너무좋았고 재방문의사 또있네요!! 1박이너무너무 아쉬웠습니다
review_translated: This was my first visit, and the staff were so friendly from the moment I checked in, and the room was in excellent condition! The infinity pool was also fantastic, and I would definitely come back again! I only had one night, but it was such a shame.

review_text:
インフィニティプールに入りたくて泊まりました！
素晴らしいホテルでした。
ロケーションも良いですが、清潔感があり展望の眺めも良くて価値のあるホテルだと思います
review_translated: I stayed here because I wanted to swim in the infinity pool! It was a wonderful hotel. The location is great, but it's also clean and has a great view, so I think it's a great value.

review_text: 5성급 호텔인 이유가 있었네요. 최고입니다~
review_translated: There's a reason it's a 5-star hotel. It's the best!

room_type: Sands Premier Double Queen City View Room
review_text: お部屋、景観、食事、サービス全て最高でした。
review_translated: The room, the view, the food and the service were all excellent.

review_text:
마리나베이 샌즈 호텔 직원 모두 친절하고 시설도 좋았습니다. 가든뷰로 밤 7:45,8;45에 있는 수퍼트리쇼를 숙소에서 멋지게 감상햇어요. 동쪽방향이어서  일출도 즐길 수 있었고 인피니티 풀이 mba값어치를 다한 듯 합니다. 다음에 가게 되면 가든스더베이 쇼핑센터를 다 즐기며 알차게 시간을 보내야겠어요. 

굳이 단점이라면 욕실은 커서 좋은데 샤워기가 따로 없어서 좀 불편하고 mbs몰에 푸드코트 거리도 멀고 불편했어요. 

트립닷컴에서 예약진행 확정 잘 해주어 잘 다녀왔습니다.
review_translated: The staff at the Marina Bay Sands Hotel were all friendly, and the facilities were great. The garden view allowed us to enjoy the Supertree Grove show at 7:45 and 8:45 p.m. from our room. The east-facing room also offered a sunrise view, and the infinity pool was worth the extra money. Next time I visit, I'll definitely make the most of Gardens the Bay shopping center. If I had to pick a downside, it would be that the bathroom, while large and nice, lacked a separate shower, which was a bit inconvenient. The food court at MBS Mall was also a bit far away, which was inconvenient. Trip.com was very helpful in confirming my reservation, so I had a great time.

review_text: 싱가포르 가면 꼭 가여 한다고 해서 가봤습니자. 방은 그저 그렇구 수영장은 최고입니다 ㅎㅎ 재밌게 놀다왔어요 !! !!!
review_translated: I went there because they said I had to go there when I went to Singapore. The room was just okay, but the pool was the best haha. I had a great time!! !!!

review_text: お部屋アップグレードしてくださり良い思い出になりました。サービスも最高でした。また利用したいです！！！
review_translated: The room upgrade was a great memory. The service was also excellent. I would love to use this hotel again!!!

review_text: 싱가포르 여행시 반드시 묶어야 하는 곳.. 가든뷰의 전망이 너무 좋앗고, 인피니티풀에서 야경도 너무 좋았습니다. 다음번에도 또 가려고 합니다.
review_translated: A must-visit place when traveling to Singapore. The view from the garden view room was amazing, and the night view from the infinity pool was also amazing. I plan to go back again next time.

review_text:
プールに入りたくて宿泊しました。
一番安いプランで4階でしたが
ガーデンバイザベイが見えました。
チェックインもすごい列だったのですが、
奥のカウンターに案内してもらいスムーズでした。
チェックアウトもクレカでデジポット支払いしてればルームキーを入れればokでした！
ただ、レースのカーテンが閉まらないという不具合がありましたが英語が堪能ではないし、もう一つは閉まったので別に問題なかったですが５つ星なのでその辺の確認はして欲しかったです。
review_translated: I stayed here because I wanted to go swimming in the pool. I got the cheapest plan and was on the fourth floor, but I could see Gardens by the Bay. There was a huge line for check-in, but I was guided to the counter in the back and it went smoothly. Check-out was also smooth, as long as I paid with my credit card and inserted my room key! However, I did have an issue with the lace curtains not closing, but I'm not fluent in English, and the other one closed, so it wasn't a problem, but as this is a five-star hotel, I wish they had checked that out.

review_text: 위치야 말할 것이 좋습니다 인피니티 풀에서 바라보는 야경이 숙소 가격을 말해줍니다 방도 좋고 뷰도 좋습니다 입실 시 시간이 좀 소요됩니다 다음에 다시 오고 싶네요
review_translated: The location is excellent. The night view from the infinity pool speaks volumes about the value of the accommodation. The room is nice and the view is good. It takes a while to check in. I would like to come back again.

review_text:
Все круто. Но
Номера старые. 
Все + делает конечно же бассейн на крыше.
Из за него стоит в него приехать точно.
review_translated: Everything's great. But the rooms are dated. The rooftop pool is definitely a plus. It's definitely worth the visit.

review_text:
랜드마크 수영장뷰와 직원들 서비스좋고 조식메뉴다양하고 즉석요리많아 조식은 추천할만하다
하지만 침대삐걱거리고 소리나서 수면의질떨어지고 이불도 5성급치고 푹신한느낌 하나도 없었다
그리고 수영장이용후 지금까지 온몸이 가렵고 알레르기가 생겼다
review_translated: The landmark pool view, the staff service, the variety of breakfast menu, and the many freshly cooked dishes make breakfast worth recommending. However, the bed creaked and made noise, which reduced the quality of sleep, and the blanket was not soft at all for a 5-star hotel. And after using the pool, my whole body was itchy and I had allergies.

review_text:
호텔 수준은 명성에 걸맞게 아주 높았습니다. Amenity가 페라가모.. 금번 숙박은 조식은 포함하지 않아 조식을 경험하지 못한 부분이 좀 아쉽습니다. 
인피니티풀도 아주 만족했습니다. 가격이 높은점 제외하고 싱가포르 출장이나 여행 시 한번쯤 경험해 보시면 좋은 호텔이라고 생각됩니다.
review_translated: The hotel's standard was very high, living up to its reputation. The amenities were Ferragamo... Breakfast wasn't included with my stay, so I was a little disappointed I couldn't experience it. I was also very satisfied with the infinity pool. Aside from the high price, I think this is a great hotel to stay at least once during your trip to Singapore.

review_text: พนักงานบริการดีมากทุกคน บนสระว่ายน้ำช่วงเย็นคนเยอะ ไปตอนเช้าจะได้ภาพสวยกว่า ห้องใหญ่มาก วิวสวย สิ่งอำนวยความสะดวกครบ โดยรวมดีมาก แต่บริเวณโถชำระมีคาบเลอะนิดหน่อย ทุกอย่างในห้องเป็นอัตโนมัติ
review_translated: The staff are all very good. The pool is crowded in the evening. Go in the morning for a more beautiful picture. The room is very large, the view is beautiful, and the facilities are complete. Overall, very good, but there is a little stain in the toilet area. Everything in the room is automatic.

review_text:
가본 호텔중 최고였습니다 
밥도 수영도 위치도 최고 🫶🏻
우연히 가본곳이지만 일박당 가격이 백만원이 넘었어도 불구하고
너무 좋았슴 !}❤️🔥❤️🔥
review_translated: It was the best hotel I've ever been to. The food, swimming pool, and location were all the best 🫶🏻 I happened to go there, but even though the price per night was over a million won, it was still great!}❤️🔥❤️🔥

room_type: Sands Premier Double Queen Gardens By The Bay View
review_text: ナイス👍️プランがあれば今年再度利用したい
review_translated: Nice👍️I would like to use it again this year if there is a plan

review_text:
최고에요
모든 편의시설이 있으니 날씨에 상관없이 편하게 즐기다 왔네요
먹거리 쇼핑 수영장 키지노 없는게 없습니다ㅎ
대만족이에요
review_translated: It's the best. It has all the amenities, so I was able to enjoy myself regardless of the weather. There's nothing missing, from food and shopping to a swimming pool and a casino. I'm very satisfied.

review_text: 침대 위에 작은 거미가 나와서 별 하나 뺐어요 테라스에는 도마뱀이 돌아다녔는데 이정도는 감수 할 정도로 시설과 뷰가 너무 좋았습니다! 서비스도 너무나 좋았구요 호텔 내에서 모든 걸 다 해결할 수 있는게 최대 장점이에요
review_translated: I took off one star because there was a small spider on the bed. There was a lizard running around on the terrace, but the facilities and view were so good that it was worth it! The service was also excellent, and the fact that everything was taken care of within the hotel was the best part.

review_text:
최고의 경험! 
처음 예약할 땐 비용 때문에 고민했지만
다시 싱가포르에 방문하게 된다면 
꼭 마리나베이샌즈에 다시 묵고 싶어요.

멋진 뷰와 좋은 시설 최고의 서비스
완벽한 하루를 만들어줘서 고맙습니다
review_translated: The best experience! I was hesitant about the price when I first booked, but if I ever visit Singapore again, I'd definitely stay at Marina Bay Sands again. The views were stunning, the facilities were excellent, and the service was top-notch. Thank you for making my day perfect.

review_text: 가격만큼 멋지고 시설좋고 우와~~~ 할만한 호텔입니다^^ 비싼값을 합니다! 특히나 인피니티풀은 정말 멋져요~ 낮과 저녁 모두 다른 분위기에요
review_translated: It's a hotel that's worth the price, with great facilities and a wow~~~ ^^ It's worth the price! The infinity pool is especially amazing~ The atmosphere is different during the day and at night.

review_text:
싱가폴이 여행이시라면 비싸지만 꼭 추천드릴 호텔입니다.

청결,친절,교통 빠질것없고 그중에서 꼬대기에있는 인피니티풀장과 스카이파크는

최고의 경험을 갖게 될것입니다.
review_translated: If you're traveling to Singapore, this hotel, though pricey, is highly recommended. Cleanliness, friendliness, and convenient transportation are all top-notch. The infinity pool and Sky Park at the base of the tower are truly exceptional experiences.

review_text: 옷장에는 정체모를 물이.. 샤워실 벽에는 여자 긴머리가 덕지덕지.. 옷장만 해도 그냥 그러려니쓰려고 했는데.. 머리보고는 도저히 안되겠어서 룸체인지 요청.. 가든스베이뷰에서 하버뷰로.. 더 좋아진건지는 모르겠다. 옮긴 방에서도 옷장바닥에 정체모를 물이.. 하아 그냥 썼다.. 나머지 고객 응대등은 다 좋았다.
review_translated: There was some unidentified water in the closet.. A woman's long hair was all over the shower room wall.. I was just going to leave the closet alone.. but after seeing the hair, I couldn't stand it anymore, so I requested a room change.. From Gardens Bay View to Harbor View.. I don't know if it got any better. In the room I moved to, there was some unidentified water on the closet floor.. Sigh, I just used it. The rest of the customer service was good.

review_text:
너무 멋있는 경치를 볼 수 있어좋았어요
또 오고 싶은곳입니다.
조식은 종류가 다양했지만
다른 나라 음식을 잘 먹지 못하는 편이라
먹는 음식들만 먹었어요
과일과 빵도 종류가 많아요
review_translated: It was great to see such a beautiful view. I'd love to come back. The breakfast had a variety of options, but since I don't usually eat food from other countries, I only ate what I could find. There were also a variety of fruits and breads.

review_text: เป็นโรงแรมที่สวยแต่ตึก1ที่ได้พักเก่าแล้ว ตึก2จะใหม่กว่า สิ่งอำนวยความสะดวกให้มาไม่ครบต้องขอเอง พนักงานต้อนรับพูดเร็วตอนแนะนำโรงแรม บอยเบล์บริการดีมาก แนะนำหลายอย่างเลย
review_translated: It's a beautiful hotel, but Building 1 is old. Building 2 is newer. The amenities are incomplete, so you have to ask for them yourself. The receptionist spoke quickly when introducing the hotel. Boybel provided excellent service and recommended many things.

review_text: ホテルも綺麗で最高でした。プールも素敵でした。たくさん食べ物屋さんもあり良かったですが混んでいるので予約必須です。
review_translated: The hotel was beautiful and great. The pool was lovely. There were plenty of restaurants, but they were crowded so reservations were essential.

review_text: Gooooooooooooood
review_translated: Gooooooooooooooood

review_text:
部屋に入った途端多分ですが排水溝からの匂いがしたのがとても残念でした。
あと、固定式のシャワーがとても使いづらかった。
あとは、場所も景色も文句なしです。
review_translated: The only disappointment was that as soon as I entered the room, I could smell something, probably from the drain. Also, the fixed shower was very difficult to use. Other than that, the location and the view were perfect.

review_text:
두말하면 잔소리 너무 너무 좋았습니다^______^
부모님과 함께 8월 중순에 또 갈 예정입니다!!
벌써 설레이네요~~ ㅎㅎ
review_translated: In short, it was so, so good^______^ I'm planning to go again with my parents in mid-August!! I'm already excited~~ ㅎㅎ

review_text: 誕生日に最高の思い出をありがとうございました。チェックインカウンターのハンさんいろいろとありがとうございました。とても楽しい時間でした。
review_translated: Thank you for the wonderful memories on my birthday. Thank you to Han at the check-in counter for everything. I had a very enjoyable time.

review_text: チェックインのとき、アップグレードしていただきました。とても広くてシャワーの水圧もよかったです。宿泊者専用のプールは少し寒かったですが、温水ジャグジーがあったのでそこで暖まれました。
review_translated: I was upgraded when I checked in. The room was very spacious and the shower had good water pressure. The pool for guests was a little cold, but there was a heated jacuzzi so I was able to warm up there.

review_text:
싱가포르 여행이 처음이라면 무조건 1박은 묵으시는 편을 추천합니다. 
특히 아이를 동반한 가족이라면, 
쇼핑몰과 음식점 기타 부대시설 및 
하이라이트 수영장까지. 너무 좋아요. 어느나라에서도 경험못한 전망입니다. 
단, 수질은 안 좋아요!
review_translated: If this is your first time visiting Singapore, I highly recommend staying at least one night. Especially for families with children, the hotel offers a shopping mall, restaurants, and other amenities, including a swimming pool. It's truly amazing. The view is unlike anything you've experienced anywhere else. However, the water quality is not great!

review_text: 최고의 호텔 강추 ~~~^^♡♡
review_translated: Best hotel recommendation ~~~^^♡♡

review_text:
さすが一流ホテル　すべての対応が完璧でした

中階層のガーデンビュー宿泊でも　充分楽しめました

平日でしたので　混雑とも無縁でした
review_translated: As expected of a first-class hotel, everything was handled perfectly. I enjoyed my stay in a mid-floor garden view room. It was a weekday, so it wasn't crowded.

review_text: 최고였습니다. 남편 생일이라고 요청사항 남겼는데 룸 업그레이드와 케익선물까지 해주셔서 싱가포르에서의 첫 여행을 기분좋게 시작할 수 있었습니다.
review_translated: It was the best. I made a request for my husband's birthday, and they even gave me a room upgrade and a cake, which made my first trip to Singapore feel great.

review_text: 친절하고 너무 좋았습니다.  아이 생일 케이크 이벤트 부탁드렸는데  들어주시고^^   하루말고  이틀할걸  약간에 후회가 있었네요 ㅎ
review_translated: They were so kind and helpful. I asked for a child's birthday cake event and they accepted it^^ I regretted not doing it for two days instead of one.

review_text:
호텔수영장이 정말 유명한데 수영하는 사람보다는 전부 사진찍으려는 사람이 가득해요 수영은 오히려 여유로워서 좋습니다. 객실은 생각보다 작아요. 디럭스룸은 저층에 배정해줍니다 그래도 만족스러웠어요 수영장은 낮에가면 정말 사람이
가득합니다.
review_translated: The hotel pool is really famous, but it's usually full of people taking pictures rather than swimming. Swimming is actually more leisurely, which is nice. The rooms are smaller than expected. Deluxe rooms are on the lower floors, but I was still satisfied. The pool is really crowded during the day.

review_text:
최고였음.
무료로 룸업글도해줘서 너무 좋은방에서 묵었네요.
정말 좋은여행이고 숙소였습니다.
괜히 mbs mbs그러는게 아니네요
review_translated: It was the best. They even gave me a free room upgrade, so I stayed in a really nice room. It was a truly wonderful trip and accommodation. They don't call themselves MBS for nothing.

room_type: Sands Bay Suite King Gardens By The Bay View
review_text: Все было просто супер
review_translated: Everything was just super

review_text: 너무좋았어요~ 사진은 트윈뷰입니다~
review_translated: It was so good~ The photo is a twin view~

review_text: 호텔 컨디션은 오래된 느낌이 나지만 서비스는 최고입니다. 또 가고싶어지네요. 인피니트 풀은 매일 아침 점심 저녁으로 가도 질리지 않습니다.
review_translated: The hotel's condition feels a bit dated, but the service is top-notch. I'd love to go back. I never get tired of the infinity pool, no matter how many times I go there, morning, lunch, or dinner.

review_text:
非常に良かった。
チェックインに多少時間が掛かった。
屋上のプールが良い。
review_translated: The room was very clean and the staff were friendly.

review_text:
全てが最高でした。
客室数が多いので特別なお部屋があるのかどうかわかりませんが、お部屋から植物園のイルミネーションショーも見れて良かったです。
また泊まりたい。
review_translated: Everything was great. There are so many rooms, I'm not sure if they have any special rooms, but it was great to be able to see the botanical garden illumination show from my room. I'd love to stay here again.

review_text: ดีมาก ประทับใจ
review_translated: Very good, impressive.

review_text:
전체적으로 탁 트인 뷰라 너무 마음에 들었습니다 (객실의 가든스 바이 더 베이 뷰나 인피니티 풀의 뷰, 스카이파크 전망대 등..?).
체크인 전부터 체크인 후의 짐 맡겨두기까지 세심한 서비스 응대로 많은 도움을 받았습니다!
다음에 또 방문하고 싶어요 :)
review_translated: I loved the unobstructed views throughout (like the Gardens by the Bay view from my room, the infinity pool view, the Skypark Observation Deck, etc.). From before check-in to after check-in, the attentive service was incredibly helpful, even offering luggage storage! I'd love to visit again! :)

review_text: 低層階でしたが、ガーデンズバイザベイ側だったので景色が綺麗でした。インフィニティープールは人が多かったですが、日中も夜も素敵でした。プールにもタオルがあったので助かりました。また夜の便の飛行機だったので、チェックアウト後にジムのシャワーを借りれたのは有り難かったです。
review_translated: Although we were on a lower floor, the view was beautiful as it faced Gardens by the Bay. The infinity pool was crowded, but it was lovely both day and night. There were towels available at the pool, which was helpful. Also, since we had a night flight, we were grateful to be able to use the gym shower after checking out.

review_text: 편의시설 많아서 좋고, ***, 몰, 수영장 방은 좁 작아요. 조식 훌륭하구요, 체크인 시간이 3시 정도인데 사람이 너무 많아 3시 40분에 들어갔습니다. 직원 분들 너무 응대 잘해주시고 체크 아 웃할때도 좋은시간 보냈냐고 물어보고 아주 친절합니다. 전반적으로 서비스,  위치, 조식 ,수영장 모두 훌륭합니다.
review_translated: It's great because there are a lot of amenities, including ***, a mall, and a swimming pool. The rooms are small. The breakfast is great. Check-in time is around 3:00 PM, but it was so crowded that I checked in at 3:40 PM. The staff were very accommodating, and when I checked out, they asked if I had a good time and were very friendly. Overall, the service, location, breakfast, and pool were all excellent.

review_text: 듣던대로 정말 멋진 수영장을 가진 호텔입니다. 다음에 가족과 다시한번 오고싶은 호텔입니다. 그리고 호텔과 음식점 쇼핑가 모두 연결되어있어 편해요
review_translated: As I've heard, this hotel has a truly wonderful pool. I'd love to come back with my family again. And it's conveniently located, with restaurants and shopping all connected to the hotel.

room_type: Sands Premier Double Queen City View Room
review_text:
部屋の中にウイスキーボトルとグラスが置いてあり、子連れには危険かなと思いました。
ホテル内の案内表示の矢印がわかりにくいです。展望台や、ガーデン、***に行くのに迷ったらかなり歩きます。
それ以外は最高に良いホテルでした⭐︎
review_translated: There was a whiskey bottle and glasses in the room, which I thought might be dangerous for families with children. The signs in the hotel were confusing. If you get lost, you'll have to walk quite a bit to get to the observation deck, garden, and other attractions. Other than that, it was a fantastic hotel.

review_text: Expérience inoubliable dans un hôtel magnifique. Tout est splendide dans la chambre, la vue sur le garden by the bay, la gentillesse du personnel.
review_translated: Unforgettable experience in a magnificent hotel. Everything is splendid in the room, the view of the garden by the bay, the kindness of the staff.

review_text: 호텔은 너무 좋았어요~ 거의 7-8년전에 금액보다는 2~3배 올랐지만 그만큼 시설도좋고 서비스도 좋네요^^ 싱가폴와서 마리나베이 안묵었으면 너무 후회합니더! 꼭 비싸더라도 여기서 1박하세요!!! 1박을 여기서하고 나머지를 조금 저렴한 호텔에서 묵는것도 팁입니다ㅎㅎ 마리나베이 쇼핑몰이 가까워서 우선 좋았어요! 거의 하루에 한번씩 간거같아용ㅎㅎ 딘타이펑도 맛있고 지하에 푸드코트도 갈만해요! 다양한 음식 있어서 좋았습니당
review_translated: The hotel was so nice~ It's 2-3 times more expensive than it was 7-8 years ago, but the facilities and service are just as good^^ If you came to Singapore and didn't stay at Marina Bay, you'd regret it so much! Even if it's expensive, definitely stay here for one night!!! A tip is to stay here for one night and stay at a slightly cheaper hotel for the rest of the timeㅎㅎ It was great because Marina Bay Shopping Mall was close by! I think I went there almost once a dayㅎㅎ Din Tai Fung is also delicious, and the food court in the basement is worth going to! It was nice because there was a variety of food.

review_text: 너무좋았어요^^ 간단한스몰토크에 이어 룸업그레이드까지 가든뷰가 너무 환상적이었어요, 다른곳은 얼음인심도 없는데 얼음인심에 각종 서비스까지 너무 환상적이예요!
review_translated: It was so great^^ From the simple small talk to the room upgrade, the garden view was fantastic. Other places don't even have the kindness of an ice cream shop, but this place is fantastic with all the services!

review_text:
คุณภาพบริการดีเยี่ยมเลยครับ
สมแล้วกับราคามี่เสียไปจริงๆครับ
อ่านวิวเต็มที่ google map นะครับ ลองหาดู 555+
review_translated: The service quality is excellent. It's worth the price. Read the full view on Google Maps. Try searching for it. 555+

room_type: Sands Premier King Gardens By The Bay View
review_text: นี่เป็นการมาสิงคโปร์ครั้งที่สอง￼ คิดไม่ผิดจริงๆที่เลือกพักที่นี่ ￼ ทุกอย่างมันลงตัวมาก
review_translated: This is my second time in Singapore. I really made the right choice to stay here. Everything is perfect.

review_text: Seru dah itu aja
review_translated: That's fun, isn't it?

review_text:
역시 싱가폴의 랜드마크입니다
무조건 꼭 하루 이상 묵는걸 추천해요
인피니티풀은 매일 하시는게 좋습니다
창밖으로 보이는 머라이언파크는 정말 장관입니다
review_translated: It is definitely a landmark of Singapore. I definitely recommend staying at least one night. It is recommended to use the infinity pool every day. The Merlion Park seen from the window is truly spectacular.

review_text:
วิวสวยมาก
จองเป็นห้องวิวสวนมองไปเห็นการ์เด้นบายเดอะเบย์สวยมากค่ะ เช็คอินเช็คเอ้าท์รวดเร็วดีค่ะ พนักงานในทุกส่วนของโรงแรมสุภาพ ยิ้มแย้มแจ่มใสดี พนักงานทำความสะอาดได้มีการมาถามความเรียบร้อยว่าขาดตกบกพร่องตรงไหนมั้ย ซึ่งเป็นการใส่ใจลูกค้ามากค่ะ เตียงนอนนุ่มนอนสบาย สะอาดมากค่ะ แต่ในเรื่องสระว่ายน้ำปูกระเบื้องด้วยสีเข้ม พอวันไหนท้องฟ้ามืดครึ้มทำให้ดูว่าน้ำไม่สะอาด ผู้คนบริเวณสระว่ายน้ำเยอะมากค่ะ ดูวุ่นวาย ลูกค้าบางกลุ่มมาเป็นครอบครัวพูดคุยกันเสียงดัง ปล่อยให้เด็กๆกระโดดน้ำหรือตีน้ำกระจายใส่คนอื่น ซึ่งถ้าใครต้องการพักผ่อนแบบสบายๆถือว่าไม่เหมาะค่ะ
review_translated: The view is very beautiful. I booked a room with a garden view overlooking the beautiful Gardens by the Bay. Check-in and check-out were fast. All staff in the hotel were polite and smiling. The cleaning staff came to ask about the cleanliness of the room, which is a great way to care for customers. The bed was soft and comfortable. It was very clean. However, the swimming pool was tiled with dark colors. On days when the sky was dark, the water looked unclean. There were a lot of people around the pool, which looked chaotic. Some customers came as families, talking loudly and letting their children jump in the water or splash water on others. If you want to relax comfortably, this is not the place.

review_text: 정말 살면서 한번쯤은 가보고 싶던 호텔을 허니문을 통해 와보게 되었습니다 생각했던것보다 더 좋았고 나중에 기회가 된다면 또 오고싶네요 ~ 발리로 넘어가기전 하루만 숙박을 해서 조금 아쉽지만 다음에는 싱가폴로 여행을 오고싶네요 ~
review_translated: I really wanted to visit a hotel at least once in my life, and I got to visit it during my honeymoon. It was better than I expected, and I would like to come back again if I have the chance. It's a bit disappointing that I only stayed for one day before going to Bali, but I would like to visit Singapore next time.

review_text: 予想通り、最高！
review_translated: As expected, great!

review_text:
以前も宿泊しましたが、サービス、設備ともに大満足のホテルです。
特にジュースやお水がフリーでお水は多すぎるくらい置いてあるのが嬉しい。

チェックアウトもデポジットで預けたカードで決済できるので、部屋のカードを返すだけ、とかなり便利になってました。
review_translated: I've stayed at this hotel before, and I'm very satisfied with both the service and the facilities. I especially like the free juice and water, and the abundance of water they provide. Check-out is also convenient, as you can pay with the card you left as a deposit, so all you have to do is return the room card.

review_text: สวยๆๆๆ
review_translated: Beautiful!

review_text: Wir sind zwei Nächte geblieben bei einem Stop-Over, hauptsächlich um einmal in dem sagenumwobenen Pool zu schwimmen. Das ist auch in der Tat spektakulär, dafür hat sich der Aufenthalt gelohnt. Allerdings sind die Preise happig, Übernachtung und ebenso Essen / Trinken am Pool muss man sich leisten können und wollen. Die Zimmer sind angemessen (inkl. kostenfreier Nespressomaschine / -kapseln), im Foyer war es für ein Hotel dieser Preisklasse viel zu wuselig, und entspannend ist es am Pool auch nicht (Vorsicht bei den Selfie-Sticks…). Dafür ist man zu Fuß im Garden at the Bay und in der zum Hotel zugehörigen Mall. Und man konnte halt einmal dort sein, wo ganz Singapur zwangsläufig hinguckt: im Pool über der Stadt.
review_translated: We stayed for two nights as a stopover, mainly to swim in the legendary pool. It is indeed spectacular, and it was worth the stay. However, the prices are steep; you have to be able and willing to afford accommodation and food and drinks by the pool. The rooms are adequate (including a free Nespresso machine and capsules), but the lobby was far too busy for a hotel in this price range, and the pool isn't particularly relaxing either (watch out for the selfie sticks...). However, you can walk to the Garden at the Bay and the hotel's attached mall. And you get to be where the whole of Singapore is inevitably looking: in the pool above the city.

review_text: 친절한 스태프에 깨끗한 시설, 넓은 방, 예쁜 뷰까지 완벽한 호텔이었습니다
review_translated: It was a perfect hotel with friendly staff, clean facilities, spacious rooms, and a beautiful view.

review_text: スイートルームを利用したが、感動の一言だった。部屋からの景色、部屋の機能性ともにトップクラスで文句なし。
review_translated: I stayed in a suite room and was completely impressed. The view from the room and the functionality of the room were top-notch, so I have no complaints.

review_text: Super Hotel sehr groß viel los der Pool ist echt der Wahnsinn
review_translated: Great hotel, very big, lots going on, the pool is really amazing

review_text:
싱가포르 가시면 첫날 무조건 가세요! 
수영장은 말하기 입 아프고요 새벽 6시부터 수영장 이용 가능하니 체크인 전에 수영장 놀고 계세요 슈퍼트리 바로 이동 가능한 길도 있고 몰 안에 식당 카페 토스트가게 쇼핑할 곳 *** 등등 다 연결되어 있어서 너무 편해요 직원들도 한결같이 친절합니다
review_translated: If you're visiting Singapore, you absolutely must visit on your first day! The pool is so much fun to talk about, and it's open from 6 a.m., so you can enjoy it before check-in. There's also a direct path to the Supertree, and it's conveniently connected to restaurants, cafes, toast shops, and other shopping options within the mall. The staff are consistently friendly.

review_text: Super Hotel , les enfants étaient ravis. La piscine a coupé le souffle.
review_translated: Great hotel, the kids were thrilled. The pool was breathtaking.

room_type: Sands Premier King Gardens By The Bay View
review_text:
今回、初めて利用させて頂きました。
Tower2の35Fガーデンビュー側に宿泊でした。入り口ドアを開けてビックリ。自動で室内点灯、同時にカーテンの自動開閉と窓いっぱいに広がる素敵なロケーション。ピカピカな室内、アメニティ何を取っても最高でした。
かの有名な屋上プールも利用しましたが、妻と二人で、まさか自分達がここで泳いでいる事が夢のようでした。また是非利用させて頂きます。勿論スタッフ皆さんの対応も最高でした。
review_translated: This was my first time staying at this hotel. I stayed on the garden view side of Tower 2 on the 35th floor. I was surprised when I opened the entrance door. The lights in the room automatically turned on, the curtains automatically opened and closed, and the window had a wonderful view of the location. The room was sparkling clean, and the amenities were top-notch. My wife and I also enjoyed the famous rooftop pool, and it felt like a dream that we were swimming there. I will definitely stay again. Of course, the staff were all incredibly helpful.

review_text: just okok
review_translated: just reasons

review_text: 싱가포르에서 묵는다면 하루는 여기서 묵어야한다고 생각해요. 인피니티풀은 하루종일 있어도 행복하고, 객실에서 보는 뷰도 멋있어요. 상점들이 많아서 하루종일 놀기도 좋고 비싼돈을 들여야하지만 꼭 가야하는 곳이에요.
review_translated: If you're staying in Singapore, I think you should spend a night here. The infinity pool is a delight to spend all day at, and the view from the room is amazing. There are plenty of shops, so you can spend the whole day there. It's a bit pricey, but it's definitely worth a visit.

review_text: Top Hotel. Gute Lage, toller Pool mit Aussicht, mega Frühstück und schöne Aussicht.
review_translated: Top hotel. Good location, great pool with a view, amazing breakfast, and beautiful views.

review_text: サービスもとても良かった
review_translated: The service was also very good

review_text:
言わずと知れた、シンガポールを代表する屋上プールのホテル。
大抵のことは調べれば出てくると思うので、個人的な感想や口コミにあまり出てこない情報を。

シャンプー、コンディショナー、ボディソープ、ボディミルクはロベルトカバリ。
チェックインや朝食の受付は、ピーク時に行ってしまうと長蛇の列に並ぶ羽目になります。
私が行った時は、チェックイン→10〜11時、朝食→9時過ぎくらいには行列が出来ていました。

昔はあったらしい日本語専用チェックインカウンターは無くなっているようです。今でもブログにはあると書かれていたりするので注意。
review_translated: It goes without saying that this hotel boasts one of Singapore's most iconic rooftop pools. I'm sure you can find most information if you do some research, so I'll just share some personal impressions and information that doesn't often appear in reviews. The shampoo, conditioner, body soap, and body milk are from Roberto Cavalli. Check-in and breakfast can be long if you arrive at peak times. When I visited, there was a line for check-in between 10 and 11 a.m. and for breakfast around 9 a.m. The Japanese-only check-in counter, which used to be there, seems to be gone now. Be aware that some blogs still claim it's there.

review_text:
ここのホテルは保証金かかりますがとてもよかったですルームサービスもおいしくいただきました
上層階じゃなくてもインフィニティプールあるのでどこの部屋もあまり変わらないです
review_translated: This hotel requires a deposit, but it was very good. The room service was also delicious. Even if you're not on the upper floors, there's an infinity pool, so all the rooms are pretty much the same.

review_text:
마리나베이 역시 장난아니네요 ㅎㅎㅎ 시설 친절함 모두 만족스러워요 
근데 객실선택을 잘하세요 뷰가 달라요~가든뷰 씨티뷰 등
그리고 꼭 마리나베이지하로 내려가서 쇼핑도 해보세요
review_translated: Marina Bay is no joke either hahaha I am satisfied with the facilities and friendliness. But choose your room carefully. The views are different~ Garden view, city view, etc. Also, be sure to go down to Marina Bay Basement and do some shopping.

review_text: отель просто класс 👍
review_translated: The hotel is simply awesome 👍

review_text:
마리나베이샌즈 다녀왔습니다
1박에 90에 금토예약했고 타워3에서체크인하고타워3객실38층 배정받았어요
방안에서 슈퍼트리쇼 관람가능했어요
수영장은 이용해볼만 합니다
라이즈 뷔페 조식도 맛있어서 한시간반 이용했어요
review_translated: I visited Marina Bay Sands. I made a reservation for 90 per night on Friday and Saturday, checked in at Tower 3, and was assigned a room on the 38th floor. I was able to watch the Supertree Show from my room. The pool was worth using. The Rise Buffet breakfast was also delicious, so I used it for an hour and a half.

review_text:
국내 어떤 5성급 호텔과도 쉽게 견줄수 없는 호텔입니다!

확실히 큰 돈을 지불한 만큼 서비스도 그렇고 모든게 다 만족이네요!

전혀 후회되지 않습니다 :)
review_translated: This hotel is unrivaled by any five-star hotel in Korea! I paid a lot of money, and the service and everything else were truly satisfying! I have absolutely no regrets :)

review_text: 두번째 방문 마리나베이샌즈~ 넘 좋았어요^^ 루푸탑수영장 최고잖아요. 비가오는 날이었지만..날씨가 좀 추웠지만 넘 멋진 뷰와 호텔체크인시 뷰가 넘 좋은 룸을 배정받아 정말 더욱 최고였답니다. 조식도 너무 맛있었고 직원분들도 정말 친절하구요
review_translated: My second visit to Marina Bay Sands~ It was amazing^^ The rooftop pool was the best. It was a rainy day...and a bit cold, but the view was amazing, and when I checked in, I was assigned a room with a great view, which made it even better. The breakfast was delicious, and the staff was really friendly.

review_text: 낮은층 예약했는데 나름 고층으로 배정해줘 슈퍼트리뷰를 봤습니다 직원들 친절하고 관광하기 위치좋아요 수영장 말할것도 없이 좋구요 야경 환상적입니다! 전망대 요가도 참여했는데 일출과 함께하는 요가 너무 멋진 경험이였어요~
review_translated: I booked a lower floor, but they put me on a higher floor. I checked SuperTribe's reviews. The staff were friendly and the location was great for sightseeing. The pool was absolutely amazing, and the night view was fantastic! I also tried yoga at the observatory, and it was a wonderful experience watching the sunrise.

review_text: 객실 내부랑 다른 시설들 모두 깔끔하고 직원분들 모두 친절하셔서 너무 좋았어요!!!! 인피니티풀에서 보는 야경이 너무 예뻐서 또 가고싶네요ㅠ
review_translated: The room interior and other facilities were all clean, and the staff were all very friendly, so it was great!!!! The night view from the infinity pool was so pretty, I want to go againㅠ

review_text:
最高のホテルでした！
ホテルの中での過ごし方も提案していただき、とても楽しく過ごせました！
review_translated: It was the best hotel! They also gave us suggestions on how to spend our time in the hotel, so we had a great time!

review_text:
가든스뷰를 선택했는데 뷰가 너무 좋았습니다
가격이 좀 과다한거같지만 싱가폴 최고의 호텔이라 할만하네요 가격만 좀 저렴하면 또가고싶습니다
review_translated: I chose the Garden View and the view was amazing. The price may seem a bit high, but it's definitely the best hotel in Singapore. I'd love to go back if the price was a little cheaper.

review_text: Sin duda la mejor opción. En Singapur la atención y servicio de primera
review_translated: Without a doubt the best option. In Singapore, the attention and service are first-class.

review_text: 호캉스로 최고이며 시설관리, 직원친절도 어느 하나 빠짐없이 너무 좋았습니다.
review_translated: It was the best for a staycation, and the facilities and staff were all excellent.

review_text:
최고의 호텔.. 짐을 미리 가져다 주는 서비스.. 감동..

친절하고.. 서비스 좋았습니다.

보증금 200달러.. 카드결제했는데.. 아직 환불안해주시네요..

언제쯤 되려나~~^^
review_translated: The best hotel... The service that brought my luggage in advance... I was impressed... The service was friendly... The deposit was $200... I paid by credit card... But they still haven't refunded it... I wonder when it will be~~^^

review_text: 방이 생각보다 넓어요 그리고 고층객실 배정해줘서 좋았습니다. 인피티니풀 이용도 편리했구요. 아쉬운건 조식...조식 가성비 별로에요
review_translated: The room was larger than I expected, and I was happy to be assigned a high-floor room. The infinity pool was also convenient. The only disappointment was the breakfast... it wasn't very good value for money.

room_type: Sands Premier Double Queen Gardens By The Bay View
review_text: 최고의 숙소
review_translated: Best accommodation

review_text:
とにかく素敵なホテルでした。
シンガポールに行くなら、是非泊まらないといけないなと思います。
プール、ロケーション、モーニング最高でした。
review_translated: It was a wonderful hotel. If you go to Singapore, this is a must-stay. The pool, location, and breakfast were all excellent.

review_text: 結婚2周年記念日で宿泊しました。ケーキも準備して下さり、満足の宿泊が出来ました。インフィニティプールも、満喫出来ました。
review_translated: We stayed here for our 2nd wedding anniversary. They even prepared a cake for us, and we were very satisfied with our stay. We also enjoyed the infinity pool.

review_text: 너무 좋아요! 1박 비용이 너무 비싸서 숙박 예약까지 많은 고민을 했지만 결론적으로는 너무너무 만족한 숙박입니다. 비싼값을 하는 서비스에 환상적인 인피니티풀까지, 싱가포르에 간다면 꼭 1박은 경험하길 추천합니다
review_translated: I loved it! The price for one night was so high that I hesitated a lot before booking, but ultimately, I was incredibly satisfied. With the fantastic infinity pool and the service worth the price, I highly recommend staying here for at least one night if you're visiting Singapore.

review_text:
싱가포르 가시면 한번씩은 꼭 갔다오세용
처음에는 비싸서 가는게 맞나 싶었는데 저는 가길 잘했다고 생각했어요 .. 꼭 수영장은 가보세용!
review_translated: If you go to Singapore, you should definitely go there at least once. At first, I thought it was expensive so I wondered if it was worth going, but I think I made the right decision.. You should definitely go to the swimming pool!

review_text:
言うまでもなく最高のホテルでした。
屋上プールはホテル予約者しか使えないので、注意！
ガーデンバイザベイも屋上から見えるし、モーニングビュッフェも屋上で気持ちよかったです。
review_translated: Needless to say, it was a fantastic hotel. Please note that the rooftop pool is only available to guests with a reservation! You can see Gardens by the Bay from the rooftop, and the breakfast buffet was also very pleasant.

review_text:
별로라고 하시는 분들도 계셨지만,, 저는 너무 만족했습니다.
트윈베드도 슈퍼싱글 두개로 좁지 않았고, 가든즈 바이더 베이 뷰도 너무 아름다웠어요.
호텔에서 나가 쇼핑몰의 마트도 멀지 않아서 좋았고, MBS 코인이 적립되서 그걸 쓸수있는것도 좋았어요.
호텔 수영장도 횟수 시간 제한없이 이용하고, 수건도 계속 교체가 되었고,
5성급 호텔이지만 외부의 식당에서 먹는 맥주값과도 큰 차이없어서 가격도 합리적이라는 생각이 들었습니다.

단지, 여러 나라를 상대로 하는 호텔인만큼 조식의 경우 위생이나 시설은 좋았지만,
먹고싶다고 생각되는 음식이 없었던건 아쉬워요. (이건 개인의 취향인거구요.)

호텔 체크인전에 마리나베이샌즈 회원을 먼저 가입하시고 그전에 체크인을 하시면
MBS 코인적립을 받을 수 있어요. (저는 반대로 해서 못받았네요)
review_translated: Some people said it wasn't great, but I was very satisfied. The twin beds were two super singles, so they weren't cramped, and the view of Gardens by the Bay was beautiful. The convenience store in the shopping mall wasn't far from the hotel, which was nice. I also appreciated the MBS Coins I could use. There were no time limits on the number of times I used the hotel pool, and towels were constantly replaced. Even though it's a 5-star hotel, the price wasn't much different from beer at an outside restaurant, so I thought the price was reasonable. However, as expected from a hotel that caters to many different countries, the breakfast, while hygienic and well-equipped, didn't have the food I wanted. (This is a matter of personal preference.) If you sign up for a Marina Bay Sands membership before checking in, you can earn MBS Coins. (I did the opposite, so I didn't receive any.)

review_text:
꿈만같았던 마리나베이센즈호텔
너무 최고엿어요
진심 또가고싶…😭
상가포르도 너모조았고 모둔게 다다 좋았읍니다
review_translated: The Marina Bay Sands Hotel was like a dream, it was the best, I really want to go again... 😭 Singapore was also so pretty, everything was great

review_text: 정말 서비스면 서비스 위치면위치 다 좋았다요. 굳이 얘기하자면 샤워 헤드가없고 해바라기만있어서 물 방향조절이 아쉽네요 ㅋㅋ
review_translated: The service and location were all really good. If I had to say something, it would be a shame that there was no shower head, only a sunflower, so I couldn't control the water direction.

review_text: 마리나베이샌즈는 싱가포르 최고의 호텔답게 서비스 청결 위치 시설 모두 최고였습니다!! 다음에도 또 묵고 싶네요 ㅎㅎ
review_translated: Marina Bay Sands is Singapore's best hotel, and the service, cleanliness, location, and facilities were all top-notch!! I'd love to stay there again.

review_text: 달리 할말이 없습니다 최고입니다. 편하게 쉬고 놀다가 갈 수 있도록 모든것이 빈틈없이 준비되어 있습니다 직원들의 서비스 수준도 최고입니다 대접받는 느낌 제대로 느낄 수 있습니다
review_translated: There's nothing else to say. It's the best. Everything is impeccably prepared for you to relax and enjoy yourself. The staff's service is also top-notch. You'll feel truly pampered.

review_text: 인피니티풀 만으로도 숙소 비용 다 한 것 같음.
review_translated: I think the infinity pool alone was worth the entire cost of the accommodation.

review_text: 정말 좋아요 또 가고 싶어요
review_translated: I really like it. I want to go again.

review_text:
진짜 최고의 호텔입니다.
라운지 이용하려고 스위트 룸으로 예약했어요.
원래는 가든뷰였는데 신혼여행왔다니까 시티뷰로 바꿔줬어요.
어메니티는 에르메스.
웰컴 초콜릿과 과일도 줬어요
수영장은 진짜 최고입니다
review_translated: This is truly the best hotel. I booked a suite to use the lounge. It was originally a garden view, but since we were on our honeymoon, they changed it to a city view. The amenities were Hermès. They even gave us welcome chocolates and fruit. The pool was truly amazing.

review_text:
깨끗하고 너무 좋아여
싱가폴에서 안가면 안되는 호텔입니다 :)
새벽늦게 체크인했는데 친절하고 좋아여
신혼여행이였는데 좋은 추억 만들었네요
review_translated: It's clean and great. It's a hotel you can't miss in Singapore :) I checked in late at night, but the staff were friendly and nice. It was my honeymoon and I made good memories.

review_text: 살면서 한번은 꼭 가야될 호텔이라고 봅니다!!
review_translated: I think this is a hotel you must visit at least once in your life!!

review_text: 수영장은 정말 싱가포르에 가면 한번쯤 가볼만 한 것 같습니다! 룸 뷰도 너무 좋았고 싱가포르에 묵었던 숙소들 중에 제일 만족했습니다!
review_translated: The swimming pool is definitely worth a visit when you visit Singapore! The view from the room was amazing, and it was the most satisfying accommodation I've stayed at in Singapore!

review_text: Checkin시 tubbath가 있는지,가능한 20층 이상의 고층을 꼭 요구하세요
review_translated: When checking in, be sure to request a high floor (20th floor or higher) with a tubbath.

review_text: 위치도 너무 좋고 얼리체크인까지 친절히  도와주셔서 편안히 잘 이용했습니다. 다소 가격이 비싸다 싶지만 루프탑 인피니티풀은 정말 평생 잊지 못할 아름다운 추억을 만들기에 최상의 장소인 듯 합니다. 다음에도 꼭 다시 이용할 예정입니다.
review_translated: The location is perfect, and the friendly staff even helped me with early check-in, making for a comfortable stay. While the price may seem a bit steep, the rooftop infinity pool is the perfect place to create unforgettable memories. I'll definitely be back again.

review_text:
시설은 싱가폴내에 따라 올 호텔이 거의 없지요.

다만 가격이 너무 비싸다는 단점...

그 이외에는 단점이 거의 없습니다. 한번쯤은 꼭 머물 만한 호텔입니다.
review_translated: The facilities are comparable to those of almost any other hotel in Singapore. The only drawback is the steep price... Other than that, there are virtually no downsides. This is a hotel worth staying at least once.

review_text:
시설이 넘 좋아요
신혼여행으로 다녀왔어요
수영장이 훌륭하네요
그리고 어디든지 가기 쉬워서
위치가 좋아서 몰 구경하기도 좋아요
review_translated: The facilities are great. I went there for my honeymoon. The pool is great. And the location is great because it's easy to get to anywhere, so it's great for shopping.

review_text:
정말 너무나 좋은 시설과 서비스에 만족합니다
조식은 조금 아쉽습니다
review_translated: I am very satisfied with the excellent facilities and service. The breakfast was a bit disappointing.

review_text:
予想以上のお部屋でした！！
部屋に入るとカーテンが自動で開くのですが、夜になっても部屋に入ると一回一回開くので少し大変でした笑
チェックイン後に1時間ほどショッピングに行きました。
帰ってくると使ってない枕が倒れていたり枕元に水とコップが移動させられていたり、ゴミがなくなっていたり…
日本ではチェックイン後に勝手に入られることはないですが、部屋にいなくても勝手に従業員の方が入られるようです。
動かしていないものが動いていたのでフロントに確認しましたが、ゴミだけがなくなっていたわけではなく、場所が変わっていたりしたので少しその点が怖かったです。
他はよかったです！！
review_translated: The room was better than I expected!! The curtains open automatically when you enter the room, but even at night they had to open every time you entered the room, which was a bit of a hassle lol. After checking in, I went shopping for about an hour. When I came back, the unused pillow had been knocked over, the water and cups had been moved next to the pillow, and the trash was gone... In Japan, no one enters your room without your permission after checking in, but it seems that employees can enter your room without your permission even if you're not there. Things that I hadn't moved had moved, so I checked with the front desk, but it wasn't just the trash that had gone missing, it had also been moved, so that was a bit scary. Everything else was good!!

review_text: 진짜 인생에서 한번은 가보세요  호텔 서비스  경치  수영장  조식  전부 마음에들었습니다.
review_translated: You really have to go there at least once in your life. I loved everything about the hotel, the service, the view, the pool, and the breakfast.

review_text:
신혼여행으로 왔어요 세계적 호텔답게 서비스 , 음식, *** 너무 좋더라구요.. 일단 직원들이 너무 친절해요 특히 프론트 데스크 직원분이요 ㅎㅎ
어느호텔을 가든 그렇게 친절한곳은 처음이에요 
너무 좋았습니다.
review_translated: I came here for my honeymoon. As expected from a world-class hotel, the service, food, *** were all great. First of all, the staff were so friendly, especially the front desk staff. This is the first time I've been to a hotel that was so friendly. It was great.

review_text: 시설도 좋고 싱가포르 오면 필수로 예약해여할것같아용 ㅎㅎㅎ 굿굿
review_translated: The facilities are good and I think you should definitely make a reservation when you come to Singapore. Good, good.

review_text: โรงแรมรอบนี้คือบริการดีมากกก ด้วยความไปทำงานมีวันว่างก็ต้องทำงานในห้องไม่อึดอัดเลย บรรยาการดีมากเลย
review_translated: The hotel service this time was very good. Since I was going to work and had a free day, I had to work in the room. It wasn't cramped at all. The atmosphere was very good.

review_text: 너무 좋아요~~ 또오고싶당ㅜ
review_translated: I love it so much~~ I want to come againㅜ

room_type: Sands Premier Double Queen Gardens By The Bay View
review_text: 말할 필요도 없이 좋습니다...서비스가 최고였어요
review_translated: Needless to say, it was great...the service was top notch.

review_text:
좋은 호텔 덕분에 즐거운 여행을 했습니다
체크인 해주신 분의 배려 덕분에 리노베이션된 좋은 객실에서 숙박했습니다.
많은 배려에 감사드립니다.
다음에 또 방문하겠습니다.
review_translated: Thanks to the great hotel, I had a pleasant trip. Thanks to the thoughtfulness of the person who checked me in, I was able to stay in a nice, renovated room. Thank you for your kind consideration. I will visit again next time.

review_text: MBS... 말모말모... 너무 좋았습니다 직원들 중에 한국인도 꽤 있어서 잘하면 한국인한테 편하게 체크인 받을 수 있어요. 체크아웃 후에 샤워장 이용하려면 체크아웃 전에 미리 데스크에 시간 예약해놔야 합니다. 참고하세요!
review_translated: MBS... I can't help but say it... It was really great. There are quite a few Korean staff members, so if you're nice, you can easily check in with a Korean. If you want to use the shower after checkout, you must reserve a time at the desk before checkout. Please note!

review_text: 굿굿굿추천
review_translated: Good, good, good recommendation

review_text: Freundliches Personal, bequemes Bett, geräumiges Bad. Wir bekamen ein gratis Upgrade in eine Suit! 😍
review_translated: Friendly staff, comfortable bed, spacious bathroom. We got a free upgrade to a suite! 😍

review_text:
최대한 고층으로 해달라고 요청드렸는데 챙겨주셔서 전망이 너무 좋았습니다. 그리고 여자친구가 생일이라 케이크도 하나 챙겨주셔서 잘 먹었어요
위치도 당연히 너무 좋고, 시설도 좋아서 수영장에서 하루종일 잘 놀았습니다.
review_translated: I requested a room on the highest floor possible, and they accommodated me, giving us a truly breathtaking view. And since it was my girlfriend's birthday, they even brought her a cake, which she enjoyed. The location was, of course, fantastic, and the facilities were great, so we had a great time at the pool all day.

review_text:
싱가포르에ㅇ가면 반드시 들러야할곳!
수영장은 인터넷에서 보는것과 다르게 더 웅장합니다
시설은 일부 낙후되어있어도 충분히 즐길만함
review_translated: A must-visit when visiting Singapore! The pool is even more magnificent than it appears online. While the facilities are somewhat outdated, they're still enjoyable.

review_text: Maravilhosa experiência!
review_translated: Wonderful experience!

review_text: 最高でした。スタッフも優しく丁寧で特別感を味わうことができました。空調もちょうど良く、快適でした…。
review_translated: It was fantastic. The staff were kind and polite, and I felt special. The air conditioning was just right and comfortable.

review_text:
기가막혀
싱가포르에서 여기 안가면 왜가남
review_translated: It's amazing. Why not go here in Singapore?

review_text:
너무나 친절한 호텔입니다
특히 보이 아저씨 가 나이가80이상 되보여서
짐도 우리가 직접들고 팁도드리고 왔어여
주변 밤문화도 가까워서 ㄱㄱ
review_translated: It's a very friendly hotel. In particular, the owner, Mr. Boy, seemed to be over 80 years old, so we carried our luggage ourselves and even gave him a tip. It's close to the nightlife, so it's good.

review_text:
시티뷰를 앞선 호텔에서 볼거니깐 그리고 수영장에서 볼거니깐 디럭스 뷰룸 킹으로 예약해서 47층 하버뷰방으로 갔는데 시티뷰 할 껄 그랬나봅니다. 
시티뷰 봐도 봐도 질리지 않네요 ㅎㅎ 
아침 조식도 맛있었고요. 공사중이라 소음이 발생될 수도 있다고 했는데 전혀 못 들었습니다. 
방은 특색이 없었지만 인피니티 풀과 전망대는 좋았어요. 하지만 역시 만**이나 리*칼튼 호텔에서 MBS를 보는 게 더 멋진 것 같아요~
review_translated: I booked a Deluxe King Room with a city view and a view from the pool, so I went to the 47th floor harbor view room. I should have gotten the city view. I never get tired of the city view. The breakfast was delicious, too. They said there might be some noise due to construction, but I couldn't hear anything. The room wasn't anything special, but the infinity pool and observatory were nice. However, I think the MBS view from the Man** or R*Carlton Hotel is even better.

review_text: 全てが大満足です。また期待と思います。
review_translated: I am very satisfied with everything. I look forward to coming back.

review_text: 컨디션 서비스 최고였어요
review_translated: The condition service was excellent

review_text:
호텔내부는 오래됐구요
뷰는좋습니다
냉장고에 물건을 놓고왔습니다ㅜㅜ 아~~~
review_translated: The interior of the hotel is old, but the view is nice. I left something in the refrigerator. Ah~~~

review_text: Sehr gut
review_translated: Very good

review_text:
한국인분이 친절하게설명해주시고
너무편하고 좋았어요
감사드려요
길도알려주시고 정말친절하세요
다음에또간다면뵙고싶어요 ❤️❤️❤️
review_translated: A Korean person kindly explained everything to me and it was so convenient and nice. Thank you. He even gave me directions and was really kind. I want to see you again next time I go. ❤️❤️❤️

review_text: 最高でした。またシンガポールに行った際は利用したいです。特に屋上のプールからの眺めはとても綺麗でした。
review_translated: It was great. I would like to stay here again when I go to Singapore. The view from the rooftop pool was especially beautiful.

review_text: 타워3는 리뉴얼 전이라 시설이 약간 노후되었습니다. 수영장과 전망대는 멋져요. 하루정도는 숙박할 가치가 있습니다.
review_translated: Tower 3 is still undergoing renovations, so the facilities are a bit outdated. The pool and observation deck are stunning. It's worth staying for a night or so.

review_text:
인피니티풀 멋졌구요. 뷰좋아  좋은 추억되었어요
다만 1층이 너무 복잡하니 체크인층을 바꾸면 좋겠어요
review_translated: The infinity pool was amazing. The view was great and it made for a great memory. However, the first floor was too crowded, so I wish they'd changed the check-in floor.

review_text:
가든뷰로 트리쇼도 룸에서 보고
수영장도 아침저녁으로 갔네요
언제 또 오겠냐 하는 심정으로 열심히 사진찍다왔네요
시설이나 서비스는 너무 만족합니다
다들 친절하시고 짐 보관 서비스도 훌륭하고요
직원분들이 너무 과하게 많다고 느낄만큼 서비스에 빈틈이 없어요
저희가 룸에 물건을 두고왔는데
이메일 문의하니 10분만에 답장이 왔고
물건을 찾으러 갔을때도 너무 친절하게 전달해주셨어요
비싼데는 이유가 다 있는법이져...
review_translated: I saw the tree show from my room with a garden view and went to the pool in the morning and evening. I took a lot of pictures, thinking, "When will I come back?" I am very satisfied with the facilities and service. Everyone is friendly, and the luggage storage service is excellent. The service is so impeccable that it feels like there are too many staff. We left something in the room, but when we inquired by email, we received a reply within 10 minutes, and when we went to pick it up, they were very kind and delivered it to us. There is a reason why it is expensive...

review_text: Es war.fantastig
review_translated: It was fantastic

review_text:
잉단 하루동안 마리나에서 놀고 먹기 좋아요 ! 
그래도 방만 생각하면 비싸지만 수영장, 펍 이용하려면 ㄱㅊㄱㅊ 한 박은 하는ㄱ
review_translated: It's great to spend a day at the marina and eat! It's a bit pricey considering the room itself, but if you want to use the pool and pub, it's worth it.

review_text: 최고입니다ㅅㅂㅅ.ㅅㅍㅅㅂㅈㅂㄷㅂㅈㅂㄷㅂ.ㅌㅂㄷㅂㄷㅂㄷ.ㄷ.ㄷㅂㄷㅂㄷㅂㄷㅅㄷㅂㄷㅂㄷㅂㄷㅂㄷㅅㄷㅅㄷㅅㄷㅂㄷ
review_translated: It's the best ㅅㅂㅅ.ㅅㅍㅅㅂㅈㅂㄷㅂㅈㅂㄷㅂ.ㅌㅂㄷㅂㄷㅂㄷ.ㄷ.ㄷㅂㄷㅂㄷㅂㄷㅅㄷㅂㄷㅂㄷㅂㄷㅅㄷㅅㄷㅂㄷ

review_text: 최고입니다 역시 마리나베이샌즈
review_translated: Marina Bay Sands is the best.

review_text: サービス、施設とも最高でした。また、行きたいホテルです。
review_translated: The service and facilities were excellent. I would definitely like to visit this hotel again.

review_text:
호텔 쾌적하고 너무 좋아요 직원들도 친절하고
수영장도 잘 이용했습니다. 흠을 꼽아보자면 물줄기가 너무 절약형으로 나오는 정도.
review_translated: The hotel was comfortable and great. The staff was friendly, and I enjoyed the pool. If I had to pick a flaw, it would be that the water flow was a bit too economical.

review_text: 너무 좋았어요 ! 깔끔했습니다~ 확실히 싱가폴 대표 호텔인 이유가 있어요!
review_translated: It was so nice! It was so clean. There's definitely a reason it's Singapore's representative hotel!

review_text: 최고가격 만큼 좋아 보이네요. 다음에 추천합니다.
review_translated: It looks as good as the best price. I recommend it next time.

review_text: 너무 만족도가 높았던 곳입니다.
review_translated: It was a place with a very high level of satisfaction.

review_text: 매우 좋은 호텔이지만 가격이 많이 올랐네요. 그 점을 제외하면 다 좋습니다.
review_translated: It's a very nice hotel, but the prices have gone up a lot. Other than that, everything else is great.

review_text:
역시 명불허전이다
꼭 하루정도는 묵어볼 만한 호텔입니다
위치가 가장 좋았고
review_translated: As expected, it lives up to its reputation. It's definitely a hotel worth staying at least one day. The location was the best.

review_text: 왜 싱가포르의 1순위 호텔인지 알았습니다. 야경 꼭 보세요 수영장 꼭 가세요 수영장에서 야경도 꼭 보세요.
review_translated: I see why this is Singapore's #1 hotel. Be sure to check out the night view, go to the pool, and enjoy the night view from the pool.

review_text: Monument à faire même pour une nuit
review_translated: Monument to visit even for one night

review_text: 가격 빼고는 훌륭합니다
review_translated: Excellent except for the price

review_text: 수영장 전망이 최고네요
review_translated: The pool view is the best.

review_text:
すごく綺麗なホテルでした。
朝ごはんもビュッフェ方式で美味しかったです。
review_translated: It was a very beautiful hotel. The breakfast buffet was delicious.

review_text: Превосходно
review_translated: Perfect

review_text: 호텔 위치나 시설은 다 좋았지만 슬리퍼에서 생선 냄새가 나서 슬리퍼 착용을 하지 않았습니다.
review_translated: The hotel location and facilities were all good, but I didn't wear my slippers because they smelled like fish.

review_text: 편리해요 깨끗해요
review_translated: It's convenient and clean.

review_text: 정말 완벽한 호텔이었습니다! 청결은 물론 서비스도 최고였습니다. 더 있고 싶을 정도로 좋았어요ㅜ 돈이 아깝지 않았습니다!
review_translated: This was a truly perfect hotel! Not only was it clean, but the service was also top-notch. It was so good I wanted to stay longer. It was worth every penny!

review_text:
정말 시설, 접근성, 뷰 모든것이 최고였어요~
높은 층에서 보는 가든뷰는 야간에도 최고였고 수영장 이용도 편리했어요.
review_translated: The facilities, accessibility, and view were all top-notch. The garden view from the high floors was great even at night, and it was convenient to use the pool.

review_text: 하루 숙박은 필수입니다
review_translated: One night stay is required

review_text: Всё прошло на ура
review_translated: Everything went great

review_text: C’était trop bien
review_translated: It was so good

review_text: 좋네요 비싸서그렇지 ㅎㅎㅎ
review_translated: It's good, but it's expensive haha

review_text: 호텔멋지고좋아요
review_translated: The hotel is nice and nice

review_text: 뷰 서비스 위치 모두 굿이였어요👏🏻👏🏻
review_translated: The view, service, and location were all good👏🏻👏🏻

review_text: 친절하고 좋은 서비스와 훌륭한 위치입니다.
review_translated: Friendly, good service and great location.

review_text: 좋아요~~
review_translated: Okay~~

room_type: Paiza Premier Suite King Sea View
review_text: the room is tidy but just look a little smaller than the actual size, but good thing is the butler is giving us free upgrade. food served at the Paiza lounge very premium and nice presentation
review_translated: the room is tidy but just look a little smaller than the actual size, but good thing is the butler is giving us free upgrade. food served at the Paiza lounge very premium and nice presentation

review_text: 造價最貴的建築
review_translated: The most expensive building

review_text: Marina Bay Sands — это знаковый отель Сингапура, и его расположение просто идеальное! Вокруг красивые виды на залив, удобный доступ к метро и основные достопримечательности — прямо у порога.
review_translated: Marina Bay Sands is an iconic Singapore hotel, and its location is simply perfect! It boasts beautiful bay views, convenient MRT access, and key attractions right on your doorstep.

room_type: Sands Premier Double Queen Gardens By The Bay View
review_text: Very friendly and the food is really good I like the ambience and the staff are approachable
review_translated: Very friendly and the food is really good I like the ambience and the staff are approachable

review_text: Seamless check in as always. The only hotel my guests from China stay when they in Singapore. Great location to any where on the Island😀

room_type: Sands Premier Suite King Gardens By The Bay View
review_text: I want to sincerely thank Ping Ping at Marina Bay Sands for making our anniversary truly special. Her warm and attentive service during check-in set the tone for a memorable stay. She went above and beyond by providing detailed directions to Chijmes and other attractions, which made our experience even better. Thanks to her, we were able to enjoy our anniversary without any worries. Ping Ping’s exceptional service is a big reason why our stay was so wonderful!
